title:

Marketing & Communications Intern
- job post
description:
Marketing & Communications Intern
Take your next career step at ABB with a global team that is energizing the transformation of society and industry to achieve a more productive, sustainable future. At ABB, we have the clear goal of driving diversity and inclusion across all dimensions: gender, LGBTQ+, abilities, ethnicity and generations. Together, we are embarking on a journey where each and every one of us, individually and collectively, welcomes and celebrates individual differences.

As a Marketing & Communications Intern for Electrification business, you will be responsible for supporting staff communications team in document administrative tasks and other event organizing tasks. Reporting to Communications Manager, you will be producing and drafting presentations, word docs and excel sheets on requested content, including graphic designing. This position is based in Hanoi, Vietnam.
Your responsibilities
Supporting team in translating media releases, internal and external news reports, articles, memos, news and other necessary document
Searching and mentoring relevant information of market including GDP, CPI, and another index
Supporting the Communications Manager with collecting information, data, following up with relevant stakeholders for needed inputs
Supporting with internal and external events organizing work, which includes working with vendors and relevant stakeholders, booking, arranging meetings, calls, logistics arrangements
Other duties as assigned
Your background
Senior Students or fresh graduates holding university degrees in communication/marketing/journalism or related majors
Accumulative GPA is minimum at 7.0/10 or 2.5/4.0
Good teamwork and interpersonal skills
Able to take initiatives, and willingness to grow in the organization
Good English translating & speaking skills
Benefits
Accident insurance
Transportation Allowance
More about us
ABB Smart Power is a global technology leader, with products and solutions that make power supplies smart, connected and protected. Its intelligent products and solutions make power more competitive by improving the energy efficiency, productivity and reliability of almost any operation. We look forward to receiving your application (documents submitted in English are appreciated). If you want to discover more about ABB, take another look at our website www.abb.com. Recruitment Agencies please be aware that this role is being managed by the internal ABB Talent team directly. We will reach out to our preferred agency partners should we require support. Your adherence to our process is appreciated Work model: hybrid #LI-hybrid

Nhân Viên Social Marketing
- job post
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: 8 - 12 triệu VNĐ)
Xây dựng chiến lược, sáng tạo nội dung để phát triển hệ thống Social (Facebook, Instagram, Youtube, Linkedin,..).
Lên kế hoạch, sản xuất, biên tập, xuất bản và chia sẻ các nội dung tương tác hàng ngày trên hệ thống mạng xã hội của công ty.
Theo dõi, nghiên cứu và phân tích hoạt động của các đối thủ cạnh tranh trên các kênh Social.
Thu thập, phân tích số liệu và insights của người dùng trên các mạng xã hội để có tối ưu hợp lý.
Báo cáo, phân tích hiệu quả công việc theo campaign/ tuần/ tháng để đánh giá hiệu quả và có đề xuất phù hợp cho hệ thống Social.
Phối hợp với các phòng ban khác để thực hiện công việc theo yêu cầu của cấp trên.
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Lương cứng: 8.000.000 -12.000.000 VNĐ + Thưởng
Các loại bảo hiểm mặc định BHXH, BHYT, BHTN và Bảo hiểm sức khỏe mở rộng
Cơ hội phát triển bản thân với các cơ hội tham gia các hoạt động đào tạo nâng cao trình độ
Được training on job và được luân chuyển sang các vị trí khác để học tập và phát triển hơn.
Lộ trình phát triển rõ ràng.
Môi trường làm việc thoải mái, khuyến khích sự sáng tạo và tư duy làm chủ.
Được trao quyền để thử sức với mọi ý tưởng và phát triển bản thân tối đa.
Tham gia BHXH, BHYT sau 2 tháng thử việc.
Phụ cấp bao gồm: hỗ trợ phí gửi xe hàng tháng, hỗ trợ ăn trưa, …
Hưởng các chế độ, chính sách phúc lợi của Công ty như dịp Lễ, Tết dương lịch, thâm niên, sinh nhật, ốm đau, hiếu hỷ, …
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm 1-2 năm từng làm vị trí tương tự ở các trung tâm đào tạo Tiếng Anh, Toán, kỹ năng mềm cho trẻ em sẽ là một lợi thế lớn
Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Báo chí, Marketing, PR hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan.
Có 1 năm kinh nghiệm tại vị trí Chuyên viên Social Media hoặc các vị trí tương đương.
Có kinh nghiệm và kiến thức trong việc quản lý các kênh Social Media.
Có khả năng tiếng anh là một lợi thế.
Có hiểu biết căn bản về Marketing, công cụ Marketing.
Có khả năng viết nội dung và giao tiếp tốt.
Năng động, sáng tạo, nhiệt tình.
Có khả năng sử dụng phần mềm thiết kế hoạch edit video
Chủ động, sáng tạo trong công việc.
Chịu được áp lực cao, nhiệt tình, có trách nhiệm.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Nội Dung,Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Social Marketing

Đại Học
1 - 2 năm

title:
Marketing Executive/ Brand Executive (Experienced,Hanoi)
- job post
company: Công ty cổ phần Diana Unicharm
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: 12 - 22 triệu VNĐ)
Directly report to: Brand Manager & Japanese Manager (Head of Consumer Marketing).
Working with research agencies to to conduct marketing research projects, monitoring marketing trends and identifying potential areas;
Conceptualizing thematic marketing campaigns;
Coming up with ideas for new package designs of products;
Supervising the sign off of marketing literature and campaigns, liaising with legal and compliance personnel;
Monitoring product distribution and consumer reactions through focus groups and market researches;
Coordinating the launch program to external as well as internal employees;
Competition tracking and benchmarking;
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Salary & Bonus: Attractive, competitive.
Performance Appraisal: Every year & the other salary adjustment/increase according to the Company policy.
Opportunity to work in a strong global Corporation with dynamic and professional working environment and many chances for training and development.
Working hour: from Monday to Friday; Annual leave: 12 days /year, after 2 working years extra 2 days (officer level) & 3 days (manager level).
Free lunch served at Company canteen, daily tea-break…
Team building & Company activities: monthly/quarterly team building, New Year Party, Summer holidays, sports activities: Football, Yoga, Ping-pong, badminton…
Insurance Benefits: Compulsory Insurance (social, health, unemployment insurance), Personal Accident Insurance, Health Care Insurance.
Other benefits: 20/10; 8/3 Gifts, , Birthday Gift, using company products, Annual heal check, other benefits (travel & transportation, telephone, business trip...) according to the Company policy.
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
JOB REQUIREMENT:
Workplace: Head Office of Diana Unicharm JSC, Linh Nam str, Hoang Mai, Ha Noi
Bachelor Degree, Master Degree from Marketing, Commerce, Economic, Business, ,Advertising/Media, Mass Communications or equivalent ..
From 1-2 years of Experience in Marketing (FMCG sector is an advantage).(Bonus point for: Hands-on experience of on ATL, BTL, Events, meetings, Outdoor and other promotional activities; Understand creative designing; Coordination with agency and vendors...;)
Good analytical skills, Creative, positive;
Very good oral & written Vietnamese and English (equivalent to Ielts 6.0 and up);
Good interpersonal skills; Able to work independently and as part of a team.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Quản Trị Thương Hiệu (Branding),Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Truyền Hình/Báo Chí,Truyền Thông/PR

title:
Marketing Data Analyst
- job post
description:
About the Role:
We are looking for someone who is curious, energetic, teamwork-oriented and has a willingness to elevate the performance of the team as a whole through an exceptional ability to research and turn data into insights. The Marketing Consumer and Data Analyst will help to develop and maintain dashboards, perform ad-hoc reporting based on business need, provide actionable insights based on data, and provide strategic support to the Marketing and Affiliate Teams. This position serves as an expert in digital marketing data sources, analysis and modeling. The ideal candidate will be able to manage multiple data sources and identify process improvements in how the data is tracked and reported.
The duties can be performed from any part of the world as long as you are ok to follow the Singapore time zone.
RESPONSIBILITIES:
· Consumer and Marketing Data Analytics
· Develop and implement data solutions and statistical models to improve the speed and effectiveness of business decisions
· Gather business requirements, design data structures, and develop code if needed to manage and report data using a diverse set of tools
· Collect, cleanse, analyze and provide data for digital marketing efforts Use data narratives and KPI’s to identify insights, trends, and business opportunities and effectively present these to stakeholders
· Interpret data and create ongoing and ad hoc report to interpret data and create ongoing and ad hoc reports Identify data and process improvement opportunities by monitoring existing metrics, analyzing data and partnering with internal teams as needed Develops data sets to enable self-service data analysis within the broader marketing organization
· Plan and implement marketing attribution models within a multi-channel advertising environment using data from Google, and other marketing automation software
REQUIREMENTS:
Critical requirements
· VN Nationality
· English language proficiency
· A minimum of 2 years experience working with digital marketing data in Online gambling or gaming industry
· Google Analytics knowledge
· Basic knowledge of search engine advertising tools (Google, Bing, Yahoo) and bid management systems (Adwords, DoubleClick, Search Ads 360, Google Analytics, Tag Manager etc.)
· Proficiency with Search Engine reporting tools (DoubleClick, Google Analytics, SEMRush, etc.)
· Advanced Excel/Google Spreadsheets/Data base capabilities
· Strong proficiency with Powerpoint/Google Slides
· Self-directed with a passion to continue to learn and grow, embracing the continuous improvement approach (define-measure-analyze-improve-control)
· Very strong teamwork orientation
· Ability to work with virtual, global teams across multiple time zones
· Strong project management skills
· Strong analytical skills
Desired but not required knowledge or capabilities
· Create and maintain data dashboards with visual software such as PowerBI/Google Data Studio using data from marketing platforms such as Google Analytics, Search Ads 360, Brightedge and other marketing data platforms.
· Previous experience in one of the following industries is a must:
-Gambling
-sports betting
-Mobile gaming
-E-sports
-Marketing processes understanding
· Amenable to Remote Work Permanently
Compensation:
VND25,000,000 to VND30,000,000
5days/week
12 days VL plus 7days VN Holidays
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: 25,000,000₫ - 30,000,000₫ per month
Experience:
Digital Marketing Data in Gaming Industry: 2 years (Preferred)
Language:
English (Preferred)

title:
Technical Success Manager (m/f/x) Online Marketing 100% remote
- job post
description:
As Technical Account Manager you will support our internal and external clients in online marketing campaigns configuration. We are working on our own proprietary solution that is the main point of client’s Marketing Technology Stack, integrating data from various services and delivering this data to external providers.

Tasks

Analyzing client websites to make sure they have the data needed for online marketing campaigns.
Setting up, running, checking, and turning off various services for clients.
Solving issues with these services.
Working with our developer teams to handle reported problems, configure services, improve existing solutions, and brainstorm new ones.
Checking problem reports and passing them to the right teams with initial analysis results.
Looking at services from external vendors that we haven't used yet when we need them.
Completing tasks with clear documentation for reference in the future.
Opportunity to become the go-to person for a particular area of our knowledge base and manage internal team documentation.
Actively participating in team meetings where we all discuss team matters (Governance Meeting).
Requirements

You should know about internet browsers (understand what happens when you enter a website URL and hit "Enter").
You should be comfortable using Developer tools in browsers (able to analyze network traffic and inspect data layer - like JavaScript variables and DOM elements variables).
You should be familiar with Online Marketing tools, such as:
Principles of Tag management systems (like Google Tag Manager, which is a must, and others like Tealium or Commanders Act)
Analytics tools like Google Analytics
Online Marketing platforms, like Google Ads, Facebook Advertising, and others (Criteo, Google Marketing Platform, Microsoft Advertising, etc.)
Consent Management Platforms (CMP) like Usercentrics, Klaro, OneTrust, Didomi
You should have some knowledge of SQL (to write basic queries for database data retrieval).
You should have some understanding of JavaScript (or a willingness to learn) to handle monitoring code implementation (tracking data, processing, using variables from DOM or URL).
You should be knowledgeable about online privacy topics, especially regarding tracking codes and Privacy Enhanced Technologies in various browsers.
Fluency in English is a must.
You should be able to document your work so that you or anyone else can pick up where you left off and retain valuable information for future reference (knowledge capture).
Understanding processes related to IT service management (like ITIL) is a plus.
You should be a good team player, adhering to mutually agreed-upon rules and be able to communicate on technical topics with both technical and non-technical individuals.
Knowledge of the German language is an added advantage.
You'll help maintain the team and company's positive image.
You should understand and support the team's vision, to which you will be contributing.
Benefits

Work in a global team.
remote work first company.
Competitive pay.
Enjoy perks like a MultiSport card and private health coverage.
Grow professionally with learning opportunities.
Join a friendly, energetic team with a laid-back work environment.

title:
Social Content Marketing
- job post
description:
Phúc Lợi
Bảo hiểm
Du Lịch
Thưởng
Chăm sóc sức khỏe
Đào tạo
Tăng lương
Mô Tả Công Việc
I. MỤC TIÊU CỦA VỊ TRÍ
VNDIRECT đang tìm kiếm ứng viên tiềm năng cho vị trí Social Content Marketing có nhiệm vụ xây dựng, sáng tạo nội dung và biên tập các sản phẩm nội dung về sản phẩm dịch vụ giao dịch chứng khoán trên các nền tảng truyền thông số, từ đó phát triển các chỉ số hiệu quả của các sản phẩm nội dung, tăng tương tác và thu hút khách hàng sử dụng sản phẩm dịch vụ của Công ty.
II. VAI TRÒ CHỨC NĂNG & NHIỆM VỤ CHÍNH
Triển khai chiến dịch marcom về sản phẩm dịch vụ giao dịch chứng khoán của Công ty trên các nền tảng kênh số.
Sáng tạo, biên tập nội dung, sản xuất nội dung inbound, SEO, các nội dung trên nền tảng social (facebook, instagram, youtube..) và hệ thống nền tảng truyền thông của Công ty, phù hợp với từng đối tượng và điểm chạm hành trình của khách hàng.
Đề xuất các ý tưởng marcom nhằm tăng nhận diện sản phẩm và thu hút khách hàng tiềm năng sử dụng sản phẩm dịch vụ chứng khoán thông qua các nền tảng kênh số.
Phối hợp cùng bộ phận designer, video production, product specialist, digital... để sản xuất nội dung trên nhiều định dạng.
Báo cáo, theo dõi hiệu quả và phát triển các chỉ số truyền thông (lượng xem, lượng đọc, truy cập...) của các nội dung trên nền tảng mạng xã hội.
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
1. Trình độ học vấn:
Ưu tiên ứng viên có chứng chỉ Marketing/ Truyền thông tiếp thị/ PR/ Truyền thông/ Báo chí/ Văn... những chuyên ngành có liên quan đến sáng tạo nội dung truyền thông.
Ứng viên có kiến thức cơ bản về tài chính, chứng khoán là một lợi thế.
2. Kinh nghiệm làm việc:
Ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm về sáng tạo nội dung/ PR/ Marketing/ Truyền thông…
3. Kiến thức/ Năng lực chuyên môn/ Kỹ năng:
Có khả năng sáng tạo và kỹ năng viết tốt
Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập, làm việc nhóm tốt;
Có khả năng giao tiếp, lắng nghe & học hỏi;
Khả năng nắm bắt nhanh và vận hành các nền tảng công cụ truyền thông số;
Có khả năng nắm bắt nhanh về các sản phẩm Đầu tư, Tài chính.
4. Năng lực cốt lõi
Có hệ tư tưởng và tư duy phù hợp với giá trị cốt lõi của VNDIRECT (IPAM & 4C) (Tìm hiểu thêm tại website VNDIRECT)
IV. CHẾ ĐỘ ĐÃI NGỘ
1. Cộng đồng những người làm nghề chính trực và dấn thân phụng sự
Môi trường làm nghề tài chính chuyên nghiệp.
Làm việc với tinh thần làm chủ, sáng tạo và thách thức.
2. Thu nhập theo năng lực
Thu nhập xứng đáng theo năng lực và giá trị đóng góp.
Được xem xét và đánh giá điều chỉnh thu nhập hàng năm.
Trong 02 tháng thử việc hưởng 85% thu nhập, được truy lĩnh 15% sau khi ký hợp đồng chính thức (tương đương 100% trong thời gian thử việc).
Tham gia BHXH, BHYT, BHTN theo đúng quy định luật lao động.
Các bảo hiểm sức khỏe và bảo hiểm tai nạn 24/24.
3. Tổ chức học tập và văn hóa sôi nổi
Không gian làm việc mở với trang thiết bị hiện đại.
Các hoạt động văn hóa, thiện nguyện phong phú và sôi nổi.

title:
Business Development Manager [ Bình Thạnh - HCM ]
- job post
description:
Job description:
As the Business Development Manager, you will play a crucial role in identifying and pursuing new business opportunities to achieve the company's revenue targets. You will be responsible for prospecting and generating leads, nurturing client relationships, and closing deals. Your focus will be on building a strong sales pipeline and establishing strategic partnerships to drive business growth.
1. New Business Development:
Identify and target potential clients through various channels, including cold calling, networking, referrals, and industry events.
Conduct thorough market research and analysis to understand client needs, market trends, and competition.
Develop and execute effective sales strategies and tactics to generate new business opportunities.
Build and maintain a robust sales pipeline, actively managing leads through the sales cycle.
2. Client Relationship Management:
Build and maintain strong relationships with key decision-makers and stakeholders.
Conduct effective sales presentations and services demonstrations to showcase our web app production and digital marketing services.
Understand client requirements and propose tailored solutions to address their specific needs.
Negotiate contracts, pricing, and terms of agreements to ensure mutually beneficial outcomes.
3. Partnership Development:
Identify and pursue strategic partnerships with complementary businesses and industry influencers.
Collaborate with the marketing team to develop joint marketing initiatives and co-branded campaigns.
Attend industry conferences, events, and trade shows to expand network and build brand visibility.
4. Sales Performance Tracking and Reporting:
Utilize CRM software or other sales tools to track leads, opportunities, and sales activities.
Analyze sales data, generate reports, and present insights to senior management.
Regularly review and evaluate sales performance against targets, identifying areas for improvement and implementing corrective actions.
Job requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, or a related field.
Proven experience in business development, sales, or a related role, preferably in the web app production and digital marketing service industry.
Strong track record of meeting or exceeding sales targets and driving business growth.
Excellent knowledge of sales principles, techniques, and tools.
Exceptional communication, negotiation, and presentation skills.
Ability to build and maintain relationships with clients at various levels.
Strong networking and relationship-building abilities.
Self-motivated and target-driven with a results-oriented mindset.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to identify market trends and capitalize on business opportunities.
Proficiency in CRM software and sales performance tracking tools.
Fluency in both written and spoken English.
Job workplaces:
Hồ Chí Minh - Việt Nam
Job level:
Trưởng phòng
Job industry:
Bán hàng & Phát triển/Quản lý kinh doanh

title:
Marketing Data Analyst (Part-time)
- job post
description:
VỀ BUZZMETRICS
Buzzmetrics là một công ty thành viên thuộc YouNet Group - tổ hợp Công Nghệ Mạng Xã Hội (SocialTech) mang lại giá trị cho doanh nghiệp trong các hoạt động Bán hàng, Tiếp thị và Vận hành.
Được thành lập năm 2013, Buzzmetrics tiên phong mang lại giải pháp nghiên cứu và phân tích dữ liệu mạng xã hội, nhằm giúp doanh nghiệp đến gần hơn với người tiêu dùng Bắt nguồn từ ý tưởng: "Mạng xã hội là thế giới ảo - nơi mọi người sống cuộc sống thứ hai của họ", Buzzmetrics tồn tại nhằm giúp doanh nghiệp đạt được những kết quả kinh doanh tốt hơn thông qua thấu hiểu sâu sắc người tiêu dùng trên mạng xã hội.
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
Sử dụng hệ thống của công ty để phân loại các nội dụng, bình luận, thảo luận trên MXH đối với các chiến dịch quảng cáo
Phân loại các nội dung theo các tiêu chí khác nhau (tích cực, tiêu cực hoặc trung lập)
Hoàn thành đúng khối lượng công việc theo deadline của mỗi project
YÊU CẦU
Nếu bạn là sinh viên năm 1,2,3
Yêu thích lướt mạng xã hội, cập nhật tin tức và theo dõi bình luận
Đang tìm kiếm 1 công việc part-time online tại nhà để có thể tăng thêm thu nhập cho bản thân
Có thể làm online tại nhà 25h - 30h/ tuần và lên công ty ít nhất 1-2 buổi/ tuần để trao đổi công việc và training
Có thể làm việc và đi theo project ít nhất 6 tháng

title:
Nhân viên Nhập liệu online
- job post
company: PHÁT TRIỂN THỊ TRƯỜNG CÔNG NGHỆ MEGA
description:
Giới thiệu:
Phát Triển Thị Trường Công Nghệ Mega là công ty Cổ phần đang hoạt động lĩnh vực Dịch vụ khách hàng tại TPHCM. Hiện tại chúng tôi đang cần tuyển vị trị trí "Nhân viên Nhập liệu online" với các kỹ năng như Không Cần Kinh Nghiệm, Chủ Động, Cẩn Thận. Bạn sẽ được hưởng các chế độ phúc lợi như Phụ Cấp, Hoa hồng khi làm việc tại Phát Triển Thị Trường Công Nghệ Mega.

Nội dung công việc:
Nhập liệu - Nhập dữ liệu văn bản có sẵn vào phần mềm của công ty (và Mỗi nhân viên sẽ có một tài khoản riêng để truy cập vào phần mềm nhập liệu của công ty.
Hằng ngày nhân viên cty sẽ gửi xuống tài liệu số liệu ,dữ liệu yêu cầu mình làm việc .
Công việc chính là đánh máy nhập liệu chính xác trên phần mềm hệ thống đúng theo mẫu văn bản dữ liệu theo yêu cầu .
Rà soát lỗi, đảm bảo tính chính xác cho tất cả dữ liệu đã nhập
Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan Marketing phần mềm để triển khai các hoạt động theo kế hoạch khi cần thiết
(Vd: Hỗ trợ chạy quảng cáo phần mềm ,hỗ trợ tương tác tải + đăng ký tài khoản phần mềm công ty đưa xuống ...)
Công việc sẽ có nhân viên hướng dẫn mọi người trong quá trình làm việc ,làm việc theo hình thức nhóm
Thời gian làm việc của mình sẽ vào lúc : 8h40 - 17h00 ,từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6 hàng tuần ( thời gian linh động )
Sau khi em làm quen với công việc em có thể tự làm công việc theo thời gian linh động của mình
Hiện tại công ty có cho nhân viên mới thử việc training Online trong vòng 3 ngày cty và công ty vẫn sẽ trả lương trong buổi training
Sau 3 ngày công ty sẽ xem xét năng lực và trách nhiệm của em đối với công việc và đôi bên thỏa thuận thì công ty sẽ ký kết hợp đồng chính thức.
Lương cơ bản 8.000.000vnd + phụ cấp + hoa hồng ( hưởng các quyền lợi )
Yêu cầu
Độ tuổi từ 22 trở lên
Địa điểm làm việc: Hà Nội, Đà Nẵng, TPHCM
Lương: 8000K - 10000K VND một tháng
Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian
Yêu cầu: Chứng Minh Nhân Dân (CMND), Cover Letter
Quyền lợi: Hoa hồng, Phụ Cấp
Hạn nộp: 2023-12-05
Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc
Bằng cấp: Không yêu cầu
Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Tư vấn - CSKH
Số lượng cần tuyển: 10
Giới tính: Nữ

title:
Sales Representative
- job post
description:
Join Our Global Team - Work from Home Opportunity!
Company: Amazon Lubricants
Location: UAE (Headquarters)
Position: Sales Representative from diverse regions
Work Hours: 4 hours/day
Compensation: Salary + Commission
Are you a motivated individual with a passion for automotive excellence? Amazon Lubricants is actively seeking enthusiastic Sales Representatives from diverse regions, including Russia, Tunisia, Africa, Vietnam, Sri Lanka, Uzbekistan, Kazakhstan, Latin America, and Morocco etc to join our dynamic global team! Experience the thrill of working from the comfort of your home and contribute to a global success story.
Role Description:
This is a part-time remote role for a Professional Sales Representative. The successful candidate will be responsible for identifying potential clients, promoting products, and securing sales through email and other virtual communication platforms.
Qualifications:
Strong sales skills with proven experience in B2B sales and lead generation techniques.
Excellent written and verbal communication skills, particularly in English.
Proficiency in Microsoft Suite, including PowerPoint, Excel, and Word.
Ability to work independently and remotely.
Technical competence with industrial oils and lubricants is a plus.
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, Engineering, or a related field.
Benefits:
Competitive salary + commission structure.
Global exposure with a reputable company.
Flexible work hours.
To apply, send your resume to amazonlubricantsandgrease@gmail.com.
Loại hình công việc: Bán thời gian
Câu hỏi tuyển dụng:
How do you ensure effective communication and relationship-building with potential clients through virtual platforms?
Describe your experience in identifying and qualifying potential leads in the B2B sales environment.
How would you approach reaching out to new clients in a remote sales setting? What methods would you utilize to establish rapport and build trust with potential customers?

Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Lương, thưởng trả theo năng lực đóng góp
Đánh giá lương 06 tháng 1 lần;
Chế độ phúc lợi siêu canh tranh (Khám sức khỏe, Du lịch trong nước và quốc tế, ....);
Tham gia vô số sự kiện siêu thú vị (Sinh nhật Công ty, Intecom Idol, Intecom Olympic, Teambuilding ...);
Môi trường nhân sự trẻ, văn phòng không mở.
Được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ Ưu tiên theo Luật Lao động Việt Nam (BHXH, BHYT...)
Được tham gia thường xuyên các khóa đào tạo nội bộ, đào tạo nội bộ, đào tạo bên ngoài để phát triển kỹ năng, cập nhật mới nhất các xu hướng công nghệ.
Cơ hội làm việc và gắn bó lâu dài trong công ty Công nghệ và Truyền thông hàng đầu Việt Nam để phát huy tối đa năng lực của bản thân và phát triển nghề nghiệp.
Thời gian làm việc: 8h30 - 17h30, Từ thứ 2 - thứ 6.
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề
Yêu cầu công việc:
Xây dựng và thực hiện các chiến dịch quảng cáo digital cho game Mobile/PC.
Phân tích và đánh giá các chỉ số quảng cáo, tối ưu hóa hiệu quả quảng cáo, thị trường, thị hiếu người dung, mang lại user chất lượng cao.
Làm việc với các đối tác cung cấp quảng cáo và các dịch vụ digital
Thực hiện các chiến dịch quảng cáo Facebook Ads, Google Ads, Tiktok.
Phân tích nhu cầu người tiêu dùng, thị trường và xây dựng các chương trình marketing online.
Tìm hiểu thêm về Digital marketing tools, Multimedia, nắm bắt, chọn lựa và cập nhật những xu hướng Digital Marketing đang nổi trội trên thị trường
Ưu tiên ứng viên:
Có kinh nghiệm chạy volume và ngân sách lớn
Đã từng chơi nhiều thể loại game và có khả năng phân tích, đánh giá gameCó niềm yêu thích với các dòng game Casual, Dancing, giải trí, thời trang...vv...
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Digital Marketing,Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Truyền Thông/Báo Chí,Truyền Thông/PR

title:

- job post
description:
Job Advert Details
Some careers grow faster than others.
If you’re looking for a career that will give you plenty of opportunities to develop, join HSBC and your future will be rich with potential. Whether you want a career that could take you to the top, or simply take you in an exciting new direction, HSBC offers opportunities, support and rewards that will take you further.

Global Functions (GFs) play a vital role in supporting the bank’s Global Businesses and offer a broad range of career opportunities in areas from legal, risk and finance to human resources, sustainability, marketing and communications. Their operational and functional teams around the world help HSBC’s Global Businesses to operate efficiently and effectively on a day-to-day basis. They also focus on controls and governance to reduce risk and protect the Group’s reputation.

We are currently seeking a high calibre professional to join our team as an Internship, Communications and Strategic Branding.

Principal responsibilities:

Translate (English - Vietnamese) communications and branding materials
Support in building communication content
Support in media relations
Support in terms of designing work on communications materials
Support with TMLA for HSBC logo to be used in communications and branding activities in Vietnam
Support with processing contracts with third parties

Qualifications
Requirements:
Fluent and proficient in English and Vietnamese language
Writing skills preferred
Good in Canva usage and have a sense of creativity
Think fast and act fast, hardworking, resilient, supportive and willing to learn on the job, interpersonal skills and communications skills
Being a student from universities/educational institutions (not graduated yet)
Ability to intern full-time in 6 or 9 months is a plus

You’ll achieve more when you join HSBC.

http://www.hsbc.com/careers

HSBC is committed to building a culture where all employees are valued, respected and opinions count. We take pride in providing a workplace that fosters continuous professional development, flexible working and opportunities to grow within an inclusive and diverse environment. Personal data held by the Bank relating to employment applications will be used in accordance with our Privacy Statement, which is available on our website.

Issued by The Hongkong and Shanghai Banking Corporation Limited

Job Description & Summary
The Marketing and Communications (M&C) team at PwC undertakes a wide range of internal and external marketing campaigns to fulfil the practice’s business requirements. Dynamic and fast-paced, the team’s success rests on developing strategies and campaigns, working with team members and across lines of service to identify marketing opportunities through proactive market analysis and studying competitor information.
We are pleased to invite qualified and passionate candidates to apply for full-time intern position (three months minimum) in Marketing & Communications as part of our M&C team based in Hochiminh.
This position will provide the right candidate with a great opportunity to gain experience in doing marketing and communications for a major brand, access to PwC’s global network of resources, further on-the-job training opportunities, a great corporate culture, as well as a monthly stipend.
Digital marketing : Support content management and graphic design for various digital channels including website management, social media and email marketing;
Event support: Provide support to events, mostly on digital platforms such as Zoom, Webex, MS Teams, including but not limited to event communications, logistic, event report;
Creative services: Support the design and production of marketing materials in both English and Vietnamese such as proposal templates, presentations, thought leadership reports, posters, event materials etc
General marketing & communications support: Assist the team on other fronts of marketing and communications work when needed, including with: translation, market research, branded merchandise, stock management and other admin tasks

Fresh graduate/ senior in business, marketing or communication major
Strong writing skills with proven experience in English – Vietnamese translation work

title:

- job post
description:
Job Description:
Development of a share-growth-oriented marketing & category plan that seizes opportunities in product renovation, pricing strategy, competitor activities, customer/channel (e.g. convenience format, discounter) specific needs
Represent consumer (insights), brand strategy and product quality requirements on the crossfunctional discounter team
Develop & lead implementation of activation platforms and ideas based on the brand vision plan working with ICF communication teams and agencies for RM, PR, BTL for the brand
Translate marketing & category plan into a business framework and optimise commercial opportunities (identify threats). Feed into monthly and annual planning processes.
Develop and implement 12-18 month portfolio roadmap including product range & quality, brand build, value delivery for consumers, pricing & affordability, range extension.
Pro-actively feed market, category and customer requirements into platform innovation projects
Champion optimal launch of innovation platform
Work with communication team to ensure single minded communication message is created in line with the brand building communication plan, consistent with category needs.
Monitor and review effectiveness of innovation and renovation programme to inf orm future plans.
Ensure continued focus on and support of innovation platforms once launched.
Management of marketing budgets within agreed targets and align with customer advertising activities.
Other tasks assigned by line manager
Job Requirements:
3-4 years classic brand management experience in an FMCG environment.
Business management and brand development experience
Unilever is an organisation committed to equity, inclusion and diversity to drive our business results and create a better future, every day, for our diverse employees, global consumers, partners, and communities. We believe a diverse workforce allows us to match our growth ambitions and drive inclusion across the business. At Unilever we are interested in every individual bringing their ‘Whole Self’ to work and this includes you! Thus if you require any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of your application so that we can support you through your recruitment journey.

Dezan Shira & Associates (DSA) is a specialist foreign direct investment practice with a pan-Asia presence. The firm has grown into one of Asia's most versatile full-service consultancies with over 28 offices in China, Vietnam, Singapore, and India. DSA primarily provides legal, tax, and operational advisory to international corporate investors.
The firm publishes business news and analysis through its subsidiary Asia Briefing (AB), which produces articles and magazines for China, Vietnam, ASEAN, and India. Digital Marketing Intern will mainly Assist with digital marketing, management and operational organization of Dezan Shira & Associates (DSA) and Asia Briefing (AB) services and products.

Job Description
Organize and maintain DSA/AB's social media networks, including Twitter, Facebook and LinkedIn (strong English writing skills are needed here)
Create and update reports to analyse social media performance
Update, maintain and manage the firm's subscriber database
Assist with the creation, editing and promotion of DSA/AB multimedia content
Provide digital support for miscellaneous DSA/AB projects, partnerships and initiatives
Provide SEO support to AB editorial team
Qualifications and Skills
Background in marketing/business/media/PR, including a strong interest in digital media
Passion for social media and digital communications
Ability to multi-task and work independently under deadline
Detail oriented, possess strong communication and organizational skills and have an outgoing personality
Understanding of Asia's business environment, including an interest in its legal, tax and business environment
Good knowledge of Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, additional competence in Adobe Design Suite, Photoshop, Illustrator, InDesign a strong plus
Fluent in English (both written and spoken); Chinese language skills a plus
Availability to commit to a 4-6 months internship

#Location: Ha Noi#
JOB DESCRIPTION
A new an exciting position has just opened up at Niteco for a Content Entry Assistant. If youve got a great eye for detail, a good working knowledge of Content Management Systems (CMS) and love working as part of an international team, this is the job for you!
The daily responsibilities include:
Receive content and input to Content Management Systems (CMS)
Edit images to showcase clients products well and consistently
Recommend SEO best practices and optimize content for search engines
Create pages to showcase product promotions or new campaigns
Coordinate with clients marketing & content teams in English to discuss website content update requests
For this particular opening, the selected candidate will be engaged to be a Content Publishing Executive for Electrolux being one of the valuable partners of Niteco. The assignment is currently estimated for a period of 6 months starting from November 2023. We will keep successful candidates posted of further development beyond May 2024.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
A bachelors degree
Excellent written and oral English proficiency
Excellent interpersonal skills and a problem-solving nature
Proficiency in Microsoft Office package, especially Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint
Have knowledge of Content Management.
The ability to work in a structured and organized way
The ability to work well in a team, and take directions and work independently when needed
Great attention to detail
Willingness to learn
BENEFITS AND WORKING ENVIRONMENT:
Attractive salary with bi-yearly review, 13th-month bonus, performance bonus, public holiday bonuses, birthday gift, employee service awards up to $1,000.
A clear career path with proper training courses, workshops, fully sponsored certificate exams.
Extensive AON health insurance (during labor contract) and accident insurance (during probation) in addition to the state-mandated health insurance.
Professional, flexible & dynamic working environment with colleagues of different nationalities that is open-minded, creative, supportive, friendly, and encouraging.
Regular communication from Management on the companys strategy, development plan, and new opportunities for employees.
Opportunities to join global technical conferences.
Bright working space with modern facilities including the newest software.
Employees and families are engaged and taken care of by the company via Trade Union activities.
Summer vacation at 5-star resort.
Sports & cultural activities all year around to strengthen both your physical & mental health.
NICEF - our own Charity program where our employees raise funds and help people with difficulties in Vietnam.

title:
Freelance Translator Opportunities
- job post
description:
STAR Group
Ranked as the world’s sixth largest Language Service Provider, STAR Group (Ramsen, Switzerland) has more than 30 years experience in various areas of translation and localization, firmly establishing its position as a single-source supplier of multilingual information services to international corporations.
STAR Group prides itself in a global network with 47 offices in 31 countries on 5 continents, employing nearly 1,000 full-time specialists, handling more than 180 languages, supported by a wide range of long-standing partners and suppliers.
As a subsidiary of STAR Group, STAR Vietnam Translation & Software Co., Ltd. (STAR Vietnam) is always looking for the very best freelance translators with quality translation in Vietnamese (from English), English (from Vietnamese), Vietnamese (from German), and other Southeast Asian languages, including Thai, Bahasa Indonesia, Bahasa Malaysia, Tagalog, Burmese and Khmer to join our freelance/in-house Translation Teams in Vietnam. We are currently interested in freelance translators and post-editors with experience in the following sectors:
Business Sector: IT-related, Computer Software & Hardware, Internet-related
Industrial Sector: Industrial/Printing, Oil Drilling Equipment
Automotive Sector: Leading European, Japanese & American Manufacturers
Consumer Brands Sector: Consumer Marketing, Electronics, Luxury Goods
Life Science Sector: Medical, Pharmaceuticals & Cosmetics
Legal/Government, Financial, Banking, Petroleum, Technical, Constructions Sectors
If you are an experienced and motivated freelance translator, with a solid translation background, you could be joining our freelance team and enjoying the many benefits that freelance work with STAR Vietnam offers.
To apply, please submit your CV, Freelance Translator Application Form to our Translation Service’s Management Team. If your qualifications meet our requirements, you will be contacted and receive a translation test to complete. We look forward to hearing from you!

Email to our Freelancer’s Management Team: sales.vietnam@star-group.net

Có khả năng nghiên cứu và tìm hiểu về các công cụ mới, liên tục cập nhật các thuật toán mới để cải thiện quá trình triển khai công việc
Theo dõi, tổng hợp báo cáo, đánh giá hoạt động SEO và xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh trong quá trình SEO
Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của lãnh đạo
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Tốt nghiệp Đại học ngành Marketing, CNTT hoặc những chuyên ngành liên quan.
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí SEO tối thiểu 03 năm.
Có kiến thức và hiểu biết sâu rộng về các công cụ phân tích website như Google Analytics, Google Search Console, SEMrush, Ahrefs,…
Có kỹ năng phân tích và xử lý vấn đề tốt.
Chăm chỉ, sáng tạo và có tinh thần học hỏi cao.
Hiểu biết về mạng xã hội, thành thạo các công cụ chat, các phần mềm văn phòng.
Là người trung thực, nhân cách tốt, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao, có khả năng giao tiếp tốt, có tinh thần tập thể và có ý thức tốt trong công việc

title:
Content Marketing Executive (Expat)
- job post
description:
Job Description
You will work as part of the marketing team to promote the company’s services – which primarily consist of software development for eCommerce businesses. You will plan, create and promote content (written, visual and audio). This role involves a lot of writing and editing, so impeccable English language skills are essential. There’s a lot of room for creativity in the role so it would suit a dynamic self-starter brimming with ideas.
Strategy; work with the Head of Marketing to define and deliver the content marketing strategy.
Content creation; create content (blogs, e-books, whitepapers, podcasts, video, webinars, thought leadership articles) to be used at every stage of the funnel with a focus on being helpful.
Inbound marketing; follow the inbound marketing methodology to optimise content for search.
Public relations; help PR team with PR content creation and strategy
Content promotion; use social channels to promote content, manage our monthly newsletter and write guest blogs.
Analysis; share analytics and reports about how our content marketing efforts are performing

Requirements
Content marketing experience for a B2B technology business or news publication is desirable.
Ability to build a content marketing strategy and also love being hands on
Excellent English writing skills and ability to communicate at all levels.
You’ll be able to show success in building an inbound marketing engine and have a good understanding of SEO.
Previous experience of using Hubspot (or similar) would be an advantage
Audio production and graphic design skills not essential but would be an advantage

Benefits
– Attractive salary package
– Salary review twice a year
– Flexible working hours (between 7:30am – 7:30pm on staff’s preference)
– Premium health care up to $3,000/year
– Annual company trip inside or outside Vietnam

title:
Brand/Communication Planner
- job post
description:
Lương:
Thỏa thuận
Địa chỉ:
Hà Nội
Hạn nộp hồ sơ:
Không có

Sao Kim Group cung cấp giải pháp toàn diện về xây dựng thương hiệu từ xây dựng chiến lược, thiết kế thương hiệu, kế hoạch truyền thông thương hiệu. Với 12 năm hoạt động, hơn 10000+ khách hàng, 65+ nhân sự tài năng tại Hà Nội, HCM, Sao Kim đang là sự lựa chọn hàng đầu của các thương hiệu Việt.
Tóm tắt nhiệm vụ: Vị trí Brand/Communication Planner chịu trách nhiệm từ tiếp xúc, nghiên cứu khách hàng để tư vấn, lập kế hoạch chiến lược, thuyết phục khách hàng. Giám sát việc thực hiện chiến lược đồng thời cung cấp thường xuyên các dịch vụ của Sao Kim cho khách hàng.
PHẠM VI CÔNG VIỆC:
Phối hợp với team Account để gặp gỡ khách hàng và nhận brief.
Xây dựng và trình bày trước khách hàng branding/communication proposal.
Thu thập dữ liệu, thực hiện nghiên cứu tại bàn hoặc nghiên cứu định tính phục vụ cho đề xuất chiến lược.
Xây dựng chiến lược thương hiệu, chiến lược truyền thông và kế hoạch thực thi truyền thông thương hiệu.
Tham gia trình bày và thuyết phục khách hàng cho đến khi đạt đồng thuận.
Phối hợp chặt chẽ với Account/Media/Creative để đảm bảo việc thực thi kế hoạch.
Phối hợp với các đối tác media, digital để triển khai và giám sát triển khai kế hoạch truyền thông thương hiệu.
Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu vị trí.
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC:
Tốt nghiệp chuyên ngành marketing, truyền thông.
Có tối thiểu 01 năm nghiệm làm tư vấn chiến lược tại các agency hoặc 2-3 năm kinh nghiệm trong các vị trí tương tự tại client.
Có nền tảng vững chắc về chiến lược thương hiệu, chiến lược truyền thông và các kênh marketing (cả ATL & BTL).
Có kiến thức về nghiên cứu thị trường, khả năng thực hiện các nghiên cứu định tính và phân tích định lượng.
Biết và sử dụng tốt các công cụ, mô hình sử dụng trong tư vấn thương hiệu.
Thành thạo kỹ năng xây dựng tài liệu, proposal, pitching.
QUYỀN LỢI
Lương thưởng hấp dẫn xứng đáng với năng lực
Thưởng cho tất cả các ngày lễ lớn và lương tháng 13
Thưởng theo dự án hoàn thành
Đầy đủ chế độ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN
Tuần làm việc 5 ngày, nghỉ thứ 7 chủ nhật
Làm việc trong văn phòng đẹp, sáng tạo
Được tham gia thường xuyên các chương trình team building, company trip
HỒ SƠ ỨNG TUYỂN GỒM
Cover letter
CV
Hồ sơ gửi qua email tới planner.job@saokim.com.vn . Chúng tôi sẽ phản hồi ngay khi nhận được hồ sơ của bạn.

title:
MARKETING EXECUTIVE
- job post
description:
Full time
Hô Chi Minh
We are a Swiss company, setting-up a new factory in Vietnam to produce paint booth filters. The Marketing Specialist will be responsible for executing effective marketing strategies, assisting with campaign development, analyzing the effectiveness of each campaign and
developing our lead generation programs.
JOB DESCRIPTION
Conduct market research and analyze trends to identify new marketing opportunities
Develop, implement, and track marketing programs such as email, social media, or digital campaigns, and events
Collaborate with other internal teams (e.g. product and sales) to develop and monitor strategic marketing initiatives
Analyze and report on the performance and efficiency of campaigns
Develop and create marketing materials, such as sales and product collateral, and ensure brand guidelines are met
Write, proofread, and edit creative and technical content across different mediums
JOB REQUIREMENTS
Bachelor’s degree in business administration, marketing, communications, or a related field
Good command of English in speaking and writing
2-5 years of experience in marketing
Excellent analytical skills and a knack for data analysis
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Skilled in writing and editing content with an attention to detail
Strong prioritization, organization, and project management skills
Ability to travel as necessary
You correspond to this description? You want to join a manufacturer that is at the time of human size and renowned internationally? We would be happy to receive your application form.

title:
Constellation | Copywriter Trainee
- job post
description:
Company Description
We help grow many of the world's most iconic brands at Leo Burnett. We help grow even more of the world's most talented people. You'll find at Leo Burnett an agency built on ideas and dependent upon the people behind them. A culture that doesn't just respect creativity but cherishes it. And a community where the path you choose is your own, the places you can go limitless. We believe creativity has the power to transform human behavior, and we use ours to help our clients' brands discover their "human purpose" and play meaningful, active roles in people's lives.
Job Description
Collaboration and creation works related to content across multiple platforms would be your main responsibility as a Copywriter Trainee
To fulfill the role which requires close working with Creative team and other cross function to support campaigns
There are some specific editorial guidelines that you will need to notice as well
Qualifications
Last-year student or fresh graduate
Good command of English & Vietnamese writing & speaking skills is a MUST
Background in Communication, Journalism, Marketing, or Business is preferred
Having a creative Portfolio is preferred or you can attach your writing samples and/or any creative works to your application.
Basic knowledge related to social media, content writing. Experience in IMC Campaigns is plus.
Having a passion to kick-start your career in the advertising industry as a Copywriter
Work independently as well as in teamwork with partners
Strive to deliver work within the time frame
Being open-minded to new experiences and perspectives
Additional Information
An off-beat perspective and the courage to look at challenges.
Responsible and dedicated.
A cheerful, humble individual who is very willing to learn every day, easy to manage and highly collaborative.
Someone who is honest, responsible, down to earth, hardworking, and passionate.

title:
Marketing Intern
- job post
description:
The Marketing team is looking for a Marketing Intern together with us to build Chợ Tốt Xe (Vehicles Category) as the leading car & motorcycle marketplace in Vietnam.
Key Responsibilities:
Brand awareness on social:
Take ownership of the fan page Chợ Tốt Xe which includes responding to comments and user queries, building up editorial calendars, developing detailed content, and growing the fan page as a user community engagement.
Monitor social listening to measure & optimize brand health on social, which includes proactively staying updated with the latest social media trends & best practices and then adapting accordingly.
Projects management:
Brainstorm with other team members to build up innovative concepts for MKT campaigns, and branding activities and get involved in the execution of the creative works.
Plan & operate media execution on social media platforms (Facebook, Instagram, Tiktok, Youtube, …), external communication (OOH, PR, influencers, KOL/KOC, …), and internal channels (push note, automation messages, display, …) to ensure timely, relevant, and engaging content.
Conduct research to study user behaviors, and user insights & provide analytic support for brand activities planning and reporting, including market research & brand performance.
Prepare monthly reports, campaign deep-dive analysis, key takeaways for learnings, and presentation materials as and when needed.
Support in preparing materials (gifts, prints, logistics, paperwork, ...) for marketing activities and other ad-hoc duties as assigned.
Qualifications:
Data-driven and growth mindset. Have critical thinking, logical thinking, and a genuine curiosity in the vehicle marketplace.
Proactive & productive. Be hungry to learn, multi-tasking, not hesitant to fail fast learn fast, step ahead to go the extra mile, and bounce back easily.
Confidence to speak up for ideas. Dare to think out of the box for innovative content yet balanced with campaign objectives.
Teamwork and can-do attitude. Open-minded to take challenges and no hesitation in making extra efforts to support team members for the common goals of MKT teams.
Has the ability to effectively communicate information when working closely with Copywriters, Designers, and BA from the Vertical team.
Advanced Excel skills, Google Analytics. Familiar with social media platforms such as Facebook, TikTok, YouTube, and Instagram.
It’s a plus if you have graduated or are studying in Marketing, Business, Journalism, Communication, or a related field.
BENEFITS OF WORKING WITH US:
Chợ Tốt MKT team is a full-stack team that can deliver strategic planning, creative development to media, and event execution. We work closely with other business teams to achieve business goals through innovative brand actions and communication campaigns. When you will be a part of the MKT team, you will have a chance to:
+ Work with our experienced marketers who have a background in top agencies in Vietnam and across functions of MarCom and MarTech as branding, digital, growth, creative, design, …
+ Join all steps of an MKT campaign and work in a full-stack agency, including finding the strategic communications, building a big idea, developing the media strategy, and optimizing & monitoring the effectiveness of each media channel.
+ Our team is supportive of each other and to help and assist when needed. We’re here to help with a tricky task, but also to crack a joke once in a while. This makes working here more pleasant and inviting.
+ Even more, we are together to create creative works & deliver modern marketing strategies to be recognized at reputable awards such as MMA Smarties, BSI Awards, …
Help you acquire marketing skills and provide you with knowledge of various marketing strategies, especially in branding & social media fields.
You will get to work with our experienced staff and practice what you learn. With engaging and challenging work, you will be able to master your skills quickly.
You will grow with the FRUIT values that are Fast Growth, Responsibility, User-first, Integrity, and Team.
Our modern offices serve perfectly for a relaxed, yet productive work environment.
You can join plenty of Sharing and Learning activities, regular team-building, and company parties.
Thank you for taking the time to read our job description and thank you in advance if you decide to apply for this position. Shortlisted candidates will be contacted within 2 weeks of application, otherwise, we might meet when another chance arises.

title:
Marketing & Communication Internship
- job post
description:
About Schoolab
Schoolab is an Innovation Studio.
We train, advise and support our clients and partners towards responsible innovation by activating the entrepreneurial and collaborative qualities of their collaborators. We rely on an international community of more than 1,000 entrepreneurs, managers, academic experts and students who gather on its digital platforms and open innovation spaces.
Since 2005, Schoolab has accelerated more than 400 corporate projects, incubated over 700 startups and has trained over 10,000 talents.
Our offices are located in Paris, San Francisco, and Ho Chi Minh City, and our teams have operated missions in over 24 countries.
Driven by a mission to support impact projects, Schoolab brings sustainability at the heart of our projects.
Schoolab Asia (based in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam) is now looking for their next marketing and communication intern.
You are creative and passionate about innovation? Do you want to work in a friendly and fast-paced environment, to work on a 360° communication strategy? Do you want your work to contribute to meaningful projects?
Then this is the internship for you!
Job description
Each day at Schoolab is new and different!
Your main mission will revolve around…
Working hand in hand with the management team in designing the marketing strategy for Schoolab Asia.
Defining and implementing the communication plan: from content creation (visuals, videos, website articles…) to social media management (Facebook and LinkedIn)
Supporting Program and Project Managers in their events organization (communication, logistics, photos and vidéos…)
Participating in the writing of the monthly newsletter
… and you will also provide transversal support to our Project and Program Managers when needed:
Supporting on workshop preparations
Coordinating specific innovation program communications
Supporting on operational process continual improvement
The skills we are looking for
A good level of Business English (C1 level - IELTS 7 or equivalent), to produce content with autonomy.
While all academic backgrounds are welcomed to apply, the position will focus on marketing and communications and therefore a first experience in graphic design tools (Canva, Figma…) and basic marcom understanding is required.
You like creating engaging content and to think outside the box
A team player, with the ability to communicate to internal and external stakeholders.
Good time management and proactivity
Internship Benefits
Internship compensation: 4,000,000 VND per month
Remote work: can work up to 2 days/week from home
Get trained on innovation methodologies (Design Thinking, Lean startup, …) and gain a unique hands-on experience within an international team.
Other information
The position is based in Sala, District 2, HCMC (Vietnam)
Full-time position (40h/week) - 6 months contract
Recruitment process
1- Interview with Schoolab’s Marketing Manager
2- Interview with Schoolab Vietnam Country manager
3- Starting date: As soon as possible
Job Types: Internship, Full-time
Salary: 4,000,000₫ - 7,000,000₫ per month
Ability to commute/relocate:
Ho Chi Minh City: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)

title:
Content Executive
- job post
description:
TeamMarketing
Tình trạngĐang mở
Nơi làm việcRemote
Loại hình công việcFull-time

About CyStack
CyStack is a pioneering cybersecurity company based in Vietnam. We specialize in developing innovative security products for businesses and individuals, including the bug bounty platform WhiteHub, the password manager Locker, and the automated vulnerability scanner CyStack Web Security.
CyStack's award-winning solutions focus on data protection, cyber attack prevention, and security risk management for enterprises. Our exceptional researchers are renowned speakers at top cybersecurity conferences and skilled bug hunters, acknowledged in the Hall of Fame of Global Tech Giants for discovering critical vulnerabilities.
About the team and role
The Content Team is part of the Marketing department at CyStack. This specific position within the team is dedicated to the writing and editing of content related to our project: Locker Password Manager, along with other responsibilities encompassing press releases, product documents, and articles for our websites, blogs, and social networks.
You will
Remote working position - collaborate with teams for effective online coordination.
Develop a marketing plan aligned with project goals and vision.
Write and publish various types of content for the project's website, landing pages, and social media.
Create marketing copy for product advertisements, industry-related blog posts, and social media promotions.
Monitor and analyze social and website metrics to improve marketing strategies.
Generate content for websites, fan pages, newsletters, Twitter, LinkedIn, and other marketing channels.
Manage content channels (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, website, email, etc.) and run social media campaigns for increased audience engagement.
Collaborate with in-house or external creative agencies for designing marketing materials such as scripts for videos.
Additional duties will be discussed during the interview.
You may be a suitable candidate for this role if you
Have a minimum of 1 year of experience in a similar position in the software or tech sector.
Hold a Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, Journalism, Economics, or a relevant discipline.
Possess familiarity with social media and web analytics tools (e.g., WebTrends), and having a strong knowledge of the market, competitors, and industry trends is advantageous.
Demonstrate a fundamental understanding of content marketing tactics, including digital advertising and social media marketing.
Exhibit creativity and commercial awareness.
Are proficient in Microsoft Office, PDF software, and Photoshop.
Can thrive in a fast-paced international environment and handle large-scale business challenges.
Preferably, have an overall IELTS score of 6.0 or higher.
Benefits
Competitive salary along with social insurance and a 13th-month salary.
Exciting opportunities to create meaningful contributions in a rapidly expanding company within a thriving industry, collaborating with passionate and experienced colleagues.
An inspiring and supportive work environment, fostering strong connections with other technology companies.
Additional benefits include premium health insurance and yearly travel trips.
How to apply
We recruit for all of our vacancies on a rolling basis, so we strongly suggest you apply as early as possible.
We look forward to receiving your CV/Resume, which should include the following information:
Name
Education and work experience
Achievements, awards, certificates
A photo of the IELTS certificate or equivalent (if any)
A portfolio of any relevant work (in English)
A link to your LinkedIn profile (if any)
Links to the blogs you’ve managed (if any)
Links to the writing pieces that show your editorial skills (if any)

Please send your CV/Resume to hr@cystack.net with the title [Job application] Content Executive - Your full name
For more information contact: Mr. Thanh – HR Management. Tel: +84 832 447 899

title:
Virtual Marketing Assistant / Remote Project Coordinator
- job post
description:
This is a 100% remote position. You choose the time you work and your hours, subject to a minimum of 20 hours per week.
About Us, The Company:
We are the proud creators of two diverse product lines: Fine Vintage Jewelry and Online Education, specializing in Taxation and Financial Education. Our mission is clear: to supercharge our sales and boldly conquer new horizons. At present, our primary selling platforms are Etsy and Udemy, and we harness the power of social media to fuel traffic to these channels. But here's the kicker: we're not just content with the status quo. We're determined to 10x our existing sales and venture into more lucrative selling platforms, including our very own websites.
Responsibilities:
- Edit instructional videos using Camtasia and other AI tools to enhance video quality
- Convert these instructional videos into viral videos/shorts/reels for YouTube and other social media channels and upload them
- Create social media calendar, create viral posts and manage the posting
- Do keyword research and tag research to optimize YouTube and other social media channel contents
- Do Etsy listing SEO
- Perform research on given topics and use tools like ChatGPT to convert content into a preferred format (ex: research paper, report, a video script…)
- Provide administrative support to the team by managing calendars, scheduling appointments, and coordinating meetings
- Assist with project coordination, including tracking progress, updating documents, and communicating with team members
- Utilize Google Suite to create and edit documents, spreadsheets, and presentations
- Perform clerical tasks such as data entry, filing, and organizing documents
Requirements:
- Master at Camtasia editing or can demonstrate ability to edit videos if using other software
- Strong computer literacy with proficiency in Microsoft Office Suite (Word, Excel, PowerPoint) or Google Workspace
- Excellent organizational skills and attention to detail
- Ability to handle multiple projects and prioritize tasks effectively
- Strong English written and verbal communication skills
- Previous experience as a virtual assistant or in a similar administrative role is preferred
- Fast learner and strong drive to do the task/project each day a little better than yesterday
- Quickly adapt and use new tools such as ChatGPT to optimize work within your responsible areas
Educational Requirements:
- College graduates in Marketing or Business Administration or Operations Management
- Or currently in a Master or higher degree program
To Apply:
To apply, please submit a Resume AND a Cover Letter outlining your qualifications and why you’re the best candidate for the job. Prefer if you can show a portfolio that showcases your ability to edit videos, do SEO and keyword research, as well as research/writing ability.
If you’ve other job(s), are in school or have other commitments, please demonstrate how you will be able to schedule and maintain the minimum requirement of 20 hours a week working for us.
As a Virtual Assistant, you will have the opportunity to work remotely and provide valuable support to our team. If you are organized, detail-oriented, and have excellent communication skills, we would love to hear from you. Apply today to join our dynamic team!
Job Types: Part-time, Full-time, Contract
Pay: 8,000,000₫ - 15,000,000₫ per month
Expected hours: 40 per week
Education:
Bachelor's (Preferred)
Experience:
Virtual Assistant: 1 year (Preferred)
Camtasia: 1 year (Preferred)
Keyword Research: 1 year (Preferred)
Etsy Listing SEO: 1 year (Preferred)
Website SEO: 1 year (Preferred)
ChatGPT: 1 year (Preferred)
Google Suite: 1 year (Preferred)
Marketing: 1 year (Preferred)
Language:
English (Preferred)

description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Đến 12 triệu VNĐ)
Lập check-list công việc cho từng sự kiện
Chuẩn bị các hạng mục phục vụ cho sự kiện tổ chức tại cửa hàng (kịch bản sự kiện; ấn phẩm sự kiện; công cụ dụng cụ sự kiện; nhân sự hỗ trợ, đối tác/nhà cung cấp…)
Điều phối và tổ chức sự kiện diễn ra theo đúng kịch bản được xây dựng. Trực tiếp dẫn chương trình (MC) hoạt náo hoặc kết hợp cùng MC ngoài
Tổng hợp báo cáo và đánh giá hiệu quả các chương trình

title:
Marketing - Digital Marketing Assistant (Internship)
- job post
description:
Marketing - Digital Marketing Assistant (Internship)
Location: Vietnam, Ho Chi Minh City/ Hanoi
Function: Marketing
Role: Assistant (Intern)
Internship
Dezan Shira & Associates is a specialist foreign direct investment practice with a pan-Asia presence. Dezan Shira has grown into one of Asia's most versatile full-service consultancies, primarily providing legal, tax, and operational advisory to international corporate investors, from our more than 20 offices across Mainland China, Hong Kong, Vietnam, Singapore, Indonesia and India.
Asia Briefing, is a subsidiary of Dezan Shira, which publishes business news and analysis in the form of articles and magazines which are regionally focused through its sub-brands, China Briefing, Vietnam Briefing, ASEAN Briefing, India Briefing and others.
Dezan Shira and Asia Briefing manages a highly successful joint internship program for students and young professionals from across the world with our core objective being ‘Growth for Everyone’. Under this program, we recruit, coach, and mentor interns to play a key role, be dynamic and strive for growth. The position is currently recruiting interns on a rolling bases of offices in Ho Chi Minh city and Hanoi.
Key duties:
Work with digital marketing and editorial teams to drive SEO support in:
Keyword research and mapping
On-page optimization
Competitive research and benchmarking
Developing and implementing link building strategy
Monitoring and evaluating results and building reports on those results
Assist the digital marketing team and web development teams in:
Creating monthly, ad hoc reports for digital channels
Updating subscribers' databases
Assist the digital and regional marketing teams in:
Creating, uploading company news
Creating email marketing reports
Preferred qualifications and skills:
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Excellent writing, reading, comprehension, and communication skills in English;
Basic knowledge of webpage user interface and design elements
General experience with tools such as Google Analytics, Google Search Console and Mangools
Familiarity with content management systems (e.g, Wordpress)
Ability to work independently and be highly organized in a deadline-driven environment
Dezan Shira is committed to a diverse work environment. All applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, genetics, disability, or age. DSA is a proud equal opportunity employer.
The position is an ideal opportunity for individuals that would like to work in a positive, constructive, and supportive environment. We also provide a local stipend for basic costs. For those with excellent performance, there is a possibility to move into a full time position at the end of the internship.
If you are interested in this position, please send your CV and a cover letter (including your available start and end date and confirming you match the minimum internship and visa requirements) to internship@dezshira.com.

title:
Marketing Data Analyst (Part-time)
- job post
description:
Salary: Negotiable
Department: Research & Data Analysis
Company: Buzzmetrics
Application deadline: 20/11 — 20/12/2023

Job description VỀ BUZZMETRICS Buzzmetrics là một công ty thành viên thuộc YouNet Group - tổ hợp Công Nghệ Mạng Xã Hội (SocialTech) mang lại giá trị cho doanh nghiệp trong các hoạt động Bán hàng, Tiếp thị và Vận hành. Được thành lập năm 2013, Buzzmetrics tiên phong mang lại giải pháp nghiên cứu và phân tích dữ liệu mạng xã hội, nhằm giúp doanh nghiệp đến gần hơn với người tiêu dùng Bắt nguồn từ ý tưởng: "Mạng xã hội là thế giới ảo - nơi mọi người sống cuộc sống thứ hai của họ", Buzzmetrics tồn tại nhằm giúp doanh nghiệp đạt được những kết quả kinh doanh tốt hơn thông qua thấu hiểu sâu sắc người tiêu dùng trên mạng xã hội. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC Sử dụng hệ thống của công ty để phân loại các nội dụng, bình luận, thảo luận trên MXH đối với các chiến dịch quảng cáo Phân loại các nội dung theo các tiêu chí khác nhau (tích cực, tiêu cực hoặc trung lập) Hoàn thành đúng khối lượng công việc theo deadline của mỗi project YÊU CẦU Nếu bạn là sinh viên năm 1,2,3 Yêu thích lướt mạng xã hội, cập nhật tin tức và theo dõi bình luận Đang tìm kiếm 1 công việc part-time online tại nhà để có thể tăng thêm thu nhập cho bản thân Có thể làm online tại nhà 25h - 30h/ tuần và lên công ty ít nhất 1-2 buổi/ tuần để trao đổi công việc và training Có thể làm việc và đi theo project ít nhất 6 tháng

title:
Content Copywriter
- job post
description:
1. Content Creation:
Craft compelling, SEO-friendly copy for a variety of platforms including websites, social media, blogs, and email campaigns.
2. Content Strategy:
Work closely with the marketing team to develop and implement a content strategy that aligns with company goals and targets the appropriate audience.
3. Editorial Guidelines:
Ensure all content is consistent in terms of style, tone, and quality, and adheres to established brand guidelines.
4. Research:
Conduct research to develop content and provide value to the target audience, which may include industry trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape.
5. Content Review and Revision:
Edit and proofread content produced by other team members or external writers.
6. User Engagement:
Monitor metrics and user engagement to assess content performance.
7. Collaboration:
Collaborate with graphic designers, marketing professionals, and other stakeholders to produce high-quality, cohesive content.
8. Project Management:
Manage multiple projects concurrently, adhering to deadlines and coordinating with other departments.
9. Client Interfacing:
Occasionally interface with clients to better understand their content needs and to receive feedback.


Quyền lợi được hưởng

Benefit:
Competitive salary, negotiate in interviews and based on experience
20 days of paid leaves and 10 days of paid sick leaves per year.
13th month salary.
Social Insurance after 2 month probation.
50% staff discount on all drinks for your personal consumption, 20% discount on company products.


Yêu cầu khác

Educational Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Communications, Marketing, English, Journalism, or related field is preferred.
Experience:
At least 2-3 years of experience in content writing, copywriting, or a related field.
Proven experience in SEO-optimized writing is a must.
Previous work in developing and executing content strategies is highly desirable.
Experience in client-facing roles is a plus.
Technical Skills:
Proficient in SEO tools like Google Analytics, Moz, or SEMrush.
Familiarity with CMS (Content Management System) like WordPress, Drupal, or Joomla.
Basic understanding of HTML and CSS is advantageous.
Competent in using Microsoft Office Suite and Google Workspace.
Soft Skills:
Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Vietnamese.
Strong attention to detail, including proofreading and editing abilities.
Ability to work independently and as part of a team.
Excellent time-management skills to manage multiple projects concurrently.
Strong research skills to ensure content is accurate and up-to-date.
Language Skills:
Proficient in English and Vietnamese; additional language proficiency is a plus.
Job-specific Skills:
Proven ability to create compelling, shareable content across multiple platforms.
Ability to adapt writing style and tone to different audiences and platforms.
Familiarity with industry trends, customer needs, and competitive landscape for better content targeting.
Key Performance Indicators (KPIs):
Candidates should be comfortable working with KPIs such as user engagement metrics, content reach, and SEO rankings.
Certifications (optional):
Certifications in Content Marketing, Digital Marketing, or SEO are a plus.


Hồ sơ bao gồm

CV, số điện thoại, email


Hạn nộp Hồ sơ

30/11/2023

Hỗ trợ tham gia các khóa tạo nâng cao chuyên môn

Sáng tạo và chủ động trong công việc
