title:
Customer Service Community Manager
- job post
description:
COMPANY PROFILE
SmartBuyGlasses Group (Motion Global Ltd.) is one of the world’s leading designer eyewear e-retailers, with sites in more than 30 countries. With over 200 employees, we retail the world’s best eyewear brands, including Ray-Ban, Tom Ford, Gucci, and many more. SmartBuyGlasses has a young, international, entrepreneurial culture promoting fast career progression and self-development. Passionate and effective employees are usually promoted quickly to managerial positions, operating teams with high degrees of ownership.
Who are we?
We are the team members of SmartBuyGlasses, making something great. We are MoGos. MoGos is an acronym from our parent company, Motion Global. We are a truly multifaceted team from the four corners of the globe. Our dynamic personalities are our strength; our ambition is what drives us forward, and together, we are building a company that we can be truly proud of.
Our Core Values
We believe in the empowerment of the individual. We believe that everyone has the right to be who they want to be, achieve their ambitions, and live their dreams. We empower our team members by offering unique opportunities to build their skills and accelerate their careers. We give back to the communities where we operate. Most importantly, through our buy-one-give-one program, we drive positive change globally, one glass frame at a time.
SMART
MOGOs are outcome-driven. We begin with the end in mind, but we also know that the journey is just as important.
PASSIONATE
MOGOs are passionate about what they do. We believe in making a difference and building strong relationships with our peers.
ENTREPRENEURIAL
MOGOs not only come up with awesome ideas, we take ownership of them and push them forward.
COLLABORATIVE
As MOGOs, we know that our team is stronger than the sum of its parts. Together, we can achieve the impossible!
JOB DETAILS
Position Mission
The core mission of this role is to manage our online reputation and our Social Media channels, lead a team of 5 to 10 members, and identify ways to improve our communication with the customers. The key responsibility is managing and engaging with an organization's online community by creating and executing community engagement strategies, moderating discussions, and responding and/or managing the responses to comments and inquiries across social media platforms and online reputation platforms. Will also participate in projects that will help us to improve the service to our customers.
Responsibilities
Developing and managing a team coverage for social media and reputation sites communication
Monitor, track and report on feedback and online reviews (Feedback management)
Develop and manage long-lasting processes that will allow us to maintain high reputation scores and social media interaction along our different domains.
Set, plan, and implement social media and communication projects
Coordinate with Marketing and Customer communications teams and collaboratively lead cross-department projects
Stay up-to-date with e-commerce digital technology trends
Create and manage a Response Matrix system for organizing and prioritizing responses to social media inquiries and comments.
Organize and maintain communication across our different social media platforms.
Provide community feedback to the management and stakeholders.
Qualifications
3+ years experience leading a team
Good customer service and interpersonal skills
Experience in growing social media communities by fostering positive sentiment.
Fluent in English, very strong verbal and written communication - Native speaker is a plus
Experience with Excel spreadsheets and basic data manipulation
Comfortable with utilizing new technologies/online tools
Strong attention to details
Knowledge of the most common social media channels
Entrepreneurial, highly resourceful
Effective and efficient in a fast-paced, high-impact environment
KPI-driven, results-oriented, analytical
Strong organizational skills
What’s in it for you?
Competitive Salary
Performance bonuses
Free designer glasses annually
Annual/Sick Leaves
Career development/ learning program
Fast-paced, dynamic, and multicultural work environment
Kindly be advised that only candidates who have been shortlisted will be contacted for further proceedings. We encourage you to visit our website for additional job opportunities and career information.
ko4LOUwPHO

- job post
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
Happiness Saigon is hiring a Strategic Planner Intern
STOP SEARCHING, YOU JUST FOUND HAPPINESS
Happiness? On Vietnamworks? Yes, it’s possible.
WHERE?
Right here. We’re Happiness Saigon.
Yes, we named our company Happiness.
Why? We believe Happiness is the ultimate rebellion. Against negativity. Against impossibilities.
Let us introduce ourselves. We’re an award-winning creative consultancy agency and an FCB alliance.
You’ll find Happiness in knowing we won:
Top 3 of Agency of the Year in Vietnam for the 7th time in a row
1 x GOLD Independent Agency of the Year Vietnam and 1 x BRONZE Creative Agency of the Year Vietnam in 2022
No.1 Vietnam-based agency in the The Drum World Creative Rankings 2023
But also in knowing that awards are part of the journey, not the destination.
SO, HOW WOULD THIS ACTUALLY MAKE YOU HAPPY?
Sure, we seem like a nice company. But of course, you’re looking through all these job descriptions to find something that’ll make you truly happy. Right?
Well, we believe in doing everything to make people happy. Because happy people make great work. And great work is what makes people happy.


Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:

So here’s your Happiness checklist:
An unconditionally inclusive and diverse team of 75+ happy people
Private health insurance
Competitive salary
13th month salary
Bonus scheme
The work-from-anywhere option, applying our ‘100% freedom 200% responsibility’ policy
A positive work environment that cares for your promotion, well-being, productivity, and growth
A chance to be your most creative, happy self
You’ve just found Happiness.a
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề
Yêu cầu công việc:
This Strategic Planner Intern job might be for YOU, if:
You have:
Good communication skills
Good knowledge of marketing, sales, advertising, digital, broadcastings, etc.
Deep understanding and familiarity with tech and tech trends
Ability to meet fast turnaround deadlines
Skills in researching, analyzing & synthetizing information
Exemplary in English: written & spoken
Logical and critical thinking
You’re good at:
Proactively suggesting new means of developing and understanding the brand
Analyzing existing data in areas such as demographics, socio-economics and the market for the client’s product
Reconciling the differences between consumers’ current perception of the brand and the way in which the client wishes the brand to be perceived
You’re extra awesome at:
Being responsible for day-to-day management of all research relating to the brand and advertising.
Monitoring cultural and social trends, and their impact on consumers’ attitudes, behavior and perceptions
So, are you ready to join the amazing team of Happiness Angels?
Whether you are fresh out of art school or growing a beard, make sure we can see where you picked up your super powers in your CV and Portfolio.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Lập Kế Hoạch,Media Planning,Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Đấu Thầu/Dự Án

title:
Medical Representative, Vaccines - Nghe An, Thanh Hoa, Ha Tinh
- job post
description:
Job title: Medical Representative, Vaccines - Nghe An, Thanh Hoa, Ha Tinh
Hiring Manager: Area Manager, Vaccines Vietnam
Location: based in Nghe An/ Thanh Hoa/ Hanoi
Job type: Permanent, Full-time
About the job
We are a worldwide leader in human Vaccines for 100 years. We develop and produce a broad range of high-quality vaccines to protect people around the world from severe diseases at each and every stage of life. We have continued strong growth and best in class products to protect against many diseases such as flu, meningitis, polio, pertussis, bronchiolitis and much more. We improve people’s lives by developing innovative vaccination solutions against many diseases. We innovate in vaccines manufacturing through digitalization and we engage in partnerships for disease prevention, to sustainably maximize vaccination impact. We give employees the opportunity to grow and encourage them to build diversified career paths within the Sanofi organization.
Main responsibilities:
Raise Healthcare Professionals' satisfaction about Sanofi's service and ensure sales performance of a determined set of products in an assigned geography (3 provinces in North-Central: Thanh Hoa, Nghe An, Ha Tinh) by:
Provide Product information of Sanofi Vaccines & establish relationship with target HCPs
Implement promotional activities (sales activities) and marketing plan in territory to raise Sanofi's share of voive
Focus and update Data of customers
Ensure the coverage and right frequency of call visits
Collect market insight, competitors’ intelligence as well as other needed information
Leverage Digital transformation when approaching Customers aligned with BU's strategy
Analyze sales figures of territory, define gaps/ SWOT and build actionable TAP
Report pharmacovigilance
About you
Experience: at least 1 year of experience in same position in Multinational Company, Vaccines experience is a plus
Soft skills: good at communication & presentation skills, teamwork, territory management, agile & proactive
Technical skills: MS Office
Education: Medicine or Pharmacy degree
Languages: be able to communicate in English
Sanofi Behaviors and Skills
This position is required to demonstrate behaviors such as Stretch, Put the interest of the organization, Act in the interest of our patients and customers and Take Action. During the interview we will also be asking for examples of skills such as Strategic Thinking, Result Orientation, People Leadership (if applicable), Relationship and Influence.
Pursue progress, discover extraordinary
Better is out there. Better medications, better outcomes, better science. But progress doesn’t happen without people – people from different backgrounds, in different locations, doing different roles, all united by one thing: a desire to make miracles happen. So, let’s be those people.
At Sanofi, we provide equal opportunities to all regardless of race, color, ancestry, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, age, citizenship, marital status, disability, or gender identity. Watch our ALL IN video and check out our Diversity Equity and Inclusion actions at sanofi.com!
#LI-SEA
At Sanofi diversity and inclusion is foundational to how we operate and embedded in our Core Values. We recognize to truly tap into the richness diversity brings we must lead with inclusion and have a workplace where those differences can thrive and be leveraged to empower the lives of our colleagues, patients and customers. We respect and celebrate the diversity of our people, their backgrounds and experiences and provide equal opportunity for all.

title:
Medical Representative- Neuroscience
- job post
description:
387096BR
Medical Representative- Neuroscience
Vietnam
About the role
Location: Ha Noi #LI-Hybrid

Novartis is unable to offer relocation support for this role: please only apply if this location is accessible for you.

About the Role:

We are looking for experienced sales professionals to help us with our ambitious mission to reach twice as many patients twice as fast. As a Medical Representative you will be responsible (directly or indirectly) for achieving sales targets, promoting the products to medical practitioners and allied health care professional as well as bringing specialist knowledge in the Neuroscience therapeutic area.

This role reports directly into the Area Manager.

Key Responsibilities:

Design business plans and implement related activities like customer events, sales & marketing campaigns, sales presentations vital to achieve agreed objectives. Accountable for achieving agreed sales, productivity and performance targets within agreed budgets and timescales.
Provide key account/hospital network support, market access support, including referral networks. Have a deep understanding in the respective specialist area and priority products.
Enhance the knowledge of products, product strategy, positioning, key messages, programs, company developments, customers, and competitors.
Accomplish agreed contact, coverage and frequency targets through various communication channels. Ensure customer satisfaction and best in class customer relationship. Ensure the accurate and timely completion of all reports.
Manage enquiries and complaints quickly and professionally and in accordance with company procedures. Contribute positively to the Sales and Marketing team through co operative relationships and collaborative efforts to achieve team and company objectives.
Deliver input into effective use of promotional funds and territory sales forecasting. Follow all adverse events guidelines, and Code of Conduct Guidelines as promoted by Novartis.
Commitment to Diversity & Inclusion:
We are committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams representative of the patients and communities we serve.
Role Requirements
Bachelor in pharmacy.
At least 2 years of experience in sales at pharmaceutical industry with good track record in sales performance
Strong customer orientation.
Assigned territory experience.
Patient/client driven with excellent communication skills.
Cross functional collaboration.

Why Novartis? Our purpose is to reimagine medicine to improve and extend people’s lives and our vision is to become the most valued and trusted medicines company in the world. How can we achieve this? With our people. It is our associates that drive us each day to reach our ambitions. Be a part of this mission and join us! Learn more here: https://www.novartis.com/about/strategy/people-and-culture

You’ll receive: You can find everything you need to know about our benefits and rewards in the Novartis Life Handbook. https://www.novartis.com/careers/benefits-rewards

Commitment to Diversity and Inclusion: Novartis is committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams' representative of the patients and communities we serve.

Join our Novartis Network: If this role is not suitable to your experience or career goals but you wish to stay connected to hear more about Novartis and our career opportunities, join the Novartis Network here: https://talentnetwork.novartis.com/network

title:
Clinical Value Marketing Specialist
- job post
description:
The Position
Essential Duties and Responsibilities: include the following (other duties may be assigned)
Regularly monitor sales performance and follow up with sales team for the leads and demands that generate from clinical departments
Develop and implement marketing plans for the responsible product group. Planning and execute all activities related to the Disease Area in charge
Drive Roche’s products through their lifecycle and supports their appropriate use, which includes but not limited to non-promotional and promotional activities and interactions in order to convey key clinical data and product information to HCPs such as face to face discussion with individual/group of HCPs, educational events, and advisory boards, sharing products’ merits with HCPs in a truthful, factual, up-to-date, fair and balanced manner by relevant evidence and data.
Build a plan to develop and increase the level of understanding and awareness among HCPs for targeted product group
Build and develop KOLs to engage and deliver the key messages.
Detailing product group in charge actively to ensure HCPs understand the role of Diagnostics and the intended uses of assays.
Planning and implementing the Group presentation to targeted clinicians
Conducting the Hospital seminar for the assigned panels.
Develops and maintains good KOLs, KDMs and Clinician relationships with important and relevant personnel
Pro-active and creative problem solving and handling objections or interpret results for the difficult cases related to Roche’s product within the assigned Disease Area.
Coordinate with PMs to roll-out the MKT plan including organizing Regional/ National congresses.
Support sales in the territory for MKT activities in the account based if needed.
Coordinate to roll-out marketing campaign
Ensuring great experiences whenever stakeholders in the ecosystem engage with Roche employees, products and services
Compiles customer database/information/market surveys for use as sales leads
Source and collects competitive intelligence and competitor information and reports to management
Other duties
Other duties may be assigned by the management
Career development for this position:
This position will give you the opportunities to learn the business and the cutting edge practices of leading MNC companies with experiences to apply them for local business development.
Roche can provide a wide variety of career development opportunities both domestically and internationally.
Education and Qualification:
Bachelor in Medical, Pharmacy, Biotech, Life Science or relevant industry.
Multi-national companies in a similar industry with sales experience at least 3 years is preferred
Other skills & abilities
Effective Communication Skill
Good interpersonal Skill
Creative Problem Solving and Negotiation Skill
Customer Complaint Handling Skill
Time Management Skill
Leadership Skill
Who we are
At Roche, more than 100,000 people across 100 countries are pushing back the frontiers of healthcare. Working together, we’ve become one of the world’s leading research-focused healthcare groups. Our success is built on innovation, curiosity and diversity.
Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.

title:
Content Publishing Executive
- job post
description:
#Location: Ha Noi#
JOB DESCRIPTION
A new an exciting position has just opened up at Niteco for a Content Entry Assistant. If youve got a great eye for detail, a good working knowledge of Content Management Systems (CMS) and love working as part of an international team, this is the job for you!
The daily responsibilities include:
Receive content and input to Content Management Systems (CMS)
Edit images to showcase clients products well and consistently
Recommend SEO best practices and optimize content for search engines
Create pages to showcase product promotions or new campaigns
Coordinate with clients marketing & content teams in English to discuss website content update requests
For this particular opening, the selected candidate will be engaged to be a Content Publishing Executive for Electrolux being one of the valuable partners of Niteco. The assignment is currently estimated for a period of 6 months starting from November 2023. We will keep successful candidates posted of further development beyond May 2024.
JOB REQUIREMENTS
A bachelors degree
Excellent written and oral English proficiency
Excellent interpersonal skills and a problem-solving nature
Proficiency in Microsoft Office package, especially Excel, Word, Outlook, PowerPoint
Have knowledge of Content Management.
The ability to work in a structured and organized way
The ability to work well in a team, and take directions and work independently when needed
Great attention to detail
Willingness to learn
BENEFITS AND WORKING ENVIRONMENT:
Attractive salary with bi-yearly review, 13th-month bonus, performance bonus, public holiday bonuses, birthday gift, employee service awards up to $1,000.
A clear career path with proper training courses, workshops, fully sponsored certificate exams.
Extensive AON health insurance (during labor contract) and accident insurance (during probation) in addition to the state-mandated health insurance.
Professional, flexible & dynamic working environment with colleagues of different nationalities that is open-minded, creative, supportive, friendly, and encouraging.
Regular communication from Management on the companys strategy, development plan, and new opportunities for employees.
Opportunities to join global technical conferences.
Bright working space with modern facilities including the newest software.
Employees and families are engaged and taken care of by the company via Trade Union activities.
Summer vacation at 5-star resort.
Sports & cultural activities all year around to strengthen both your physical & mental health.
NICEF - our own Charity program where our employees raise funds and help people with difficulties in Vietnam.

title:
Social & Advocacy Executive - PPD
- job post
description:
Job Summary: Under L’Oréal Professional Products Division (PPD) with mission is to support hairdressers and develop the hair industry sustainably and while benefiting all. Reports to Brand Managers. As the Social & Advocacy Assistant Manager, you will be responsible for managing and developing the brand's social media content, KOL relationships management, and event management. You will work closely with the Brand, Commercial & Media teams to develop and implement strategies that drive brand awareness and engagement. Your role will be critical in building and managing the brand's online community and ensuring the brand's voice is consistent across all platforms.
Key Responsibilities:
Social Media Content & CommunityManagement (with Social Agency):
Develop and execute a social media strategy across Facebook,Instagram, TikTok and other relevant platforms, including content planning andscheduling.
Manage social media content creation, ensuring that all content isaligned with the brand's overall message and tone.
Analyze social media performance and provide regular reports, makingrecommendations for improvement.
KOL Management (with KOL booking agency):
Maintain great relationship with PPD current KOLs community.
Plan & execute seeding box campaign (once per 2 months).
Identify and develop relationships with new KOLs who align with thebrand's values and messaging.
Collaborate with KOLs to create content that resonates with the targetaudience and promotes the brand.
Analyze KOL performance and provide regular reports, makingrecommendations for improvement.
Recruit new KOLs for PPD’s newly launches TikTok shop.
Event & Workshop Planning &Execution (with Event agency):
Plan and execute brand events and workshops, both online and offline,ensuring they align with the brand's values and messaging.
Manage all aspects of event planning, including budgeting, venueselection, vendor management, and logistics.
Develop event marketing materials, including invitations, social mediacontent, and advertising.
Analyze event performance and provide regular reports, makingrecommendations for improvement.
Requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications or related field.
Minimum of 2 years' experience in KOL booking & management.Experience in Content creation & Event planning is a plus.
Excellent verbal and written communication skills in Vietnamese andEnglish.
Strong understanding of social media platforms and their bestpractices.
Experience with Meta, Sprinklr, TikTok business suite is a plus.
Ability to work independently and in a team environment, and to managemultiple projects simultaneously.
Strong analytical skills and attention to detail.
Passion for the beauty industry and an interest in skincare isdesirable.

If you are a creative and driven individual whois passionate about social media, KOL management and event planning, and arelooking to take the next step in your career, we would love to hear from you.
Join the PPD Vietnam team and help us build a stronger and more engaged community of fans and customers.

You can apply to up to three jobs within a rolling 30-day window.
You cannot withdraw your application once you applied, so please make sure to choose a job that matches your dreams.
Please visit "Your Application Space" to see the jobs you have already applied to.
Please don’t create another account with a different email. If you do so, your account might be merged and your application record will be deleted.

title:
Digital Marketing Executive
- job post
description:
Skills: English, data analysis, communication Location: Hanoi, Vietnam Status: Available for Leader and Sales Admin position
We are currently in need of an experienced Digital Marketing Executive to join our Ha Noi team.
Responsibilities for our Digital Marketing Executive
Build and Execute marketing plans in a timely order.
Developing & presenting marketing ideas and strategies.
Monitor, evaluate, and leverage standard processes to manage marketing campaigns.
Manage day-to-day campaign performance, assess digital campaign trends, handle reporting/analysis & identify opportunities to further improve marketing campaigns.
Promotional activities including but not limited to Facebook, LinkedIn, MailChimp, and AdWords.
Support the development of promotional activities, marketing channels, and production of marketing materials.
Copywriting & Proof-reading
Achieve KPI of generating appointments through inbound marketing platforms & campaigns.
Organizing exhibitions & tradeshows.
Daily operation matters.
Requirements
Diploma/ Degree in Marketing or related field
Strong command of English, both written & verbal
Proficient knowledge of SEO, SEM & Social Media (Facebook, LinkedIn, Twitter, Instagram, etc.) marketing
Possess a positive attitude and willingness to learn
Ability to multi-task
Good Data analysis skills
Proficient in common software programs, e.g. Microsoft office
Photoshop & Illustrator skills are a plus
Interested applicants for our Digital Marketing Executive position, please send your resumes to Mr. Koh at yanguei@synergixtech.com

title:

description:
Xây dựng kế hoạch phát triển nội dung marketing cho betia trên internet bao gồm các trang nội bộ, fanpage, hội nhóm, diễn đàn, … bằng các phương tiện truyền thông khác nhau: bài viết, hình ảnh, âm thanh, video, sự kiện, ….
Tạo các nội dung marketing đa dạng, sáng tạo, phù hợp với các nền tảng (gg, YT, FB, TT) mang tính phổ biến, viral tiếp cận tới nhiều đối tượng khách hàng tiềm năng khác nhau.

Đề xuất các chiến dịch marketing và xây dựng nội dung cho các chiến dịch marketing để đạt hiệu quả cao (làm việc với người đại diện, KOL, KOC, … để xây dựng các nội dung marketing)
Quản lý các chiến dịch marketing và tối ưu chi phí và hiệu quả cho các chiến dịch
II. Yêu cầu:
Nữ từ 20-30 tuổi
Có kinh nghiệm 2-3 năm làm việc trong lĩnh vực nội dung, truyền thông xã hội hoặc tương tự
Có thái độ, tinh thần nhiệt tình, trách nhiệm yêu thích công việc
Thạo tiếng Anh là một lợi thế
III. Quyền lợi:
Mức lương thỏa thuận đảm bảo xứng đáng với năng lực của từng người, từ 15 triệu đồng/tháng
Không giới hạn mức thưởng, chi trả thưởng dựa trên performance
Môi trường chuyên nghiệp, trẻ trung và năng động, phát huy khả năng sáng tạo của bản thân
Chế độ Bảo hiểm xã hội theo quy định Nhà nước và Bảo hiểm chăm sóc sức khỏe đặc biệt VTC Online Care
Nghỉ lễ, Tết theo quy định của Nhà nước
Trợ cấp ăn trưa và máy tính dành cho cấp quản lý
Tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding, dã ngoại, du lịch
Thời gian làm việc: 8h30 – 17h30 từ Thứ Hai - Thứ Sáu.
IV. Liên hệ:

Điện thoại: 0936.121.200, Ms. Phùng Minh Đức - Phòng Nhân sự

title:
Communications Officer
- job post
description:
JOB TITLE
Communications Officer
REPORTS TO
Directors
POSITIONS REPORTING TO THIS ONE
Interns and volunteers
Start date: December, 2023
Deadline to apply: November 30th, 2023
Introduction to Keep Vietnam Clean (KVC)
Keep Vietnam Clean is a legally registered Vietnamese social enterprise with a mission to facilitate and inspire sustainable living practices and environmental health throughout Vietnam. Main program areas include the following.
Community Beautification (cleanups, greenspace, community artwork)
Education
Research and Policy development
Clean and Green for the Climate (regenerative agriculture and cool cities)
Eco-lifestyles (green fashion and zero waste lifestyles)
Sustainability Consulting
KVC is supported by thousands of volunteers and dozens of businesses and organizations. It is through these partnerships that KVC has a positive impact in the community.
Responsibilities
Develop communications and marketing plan for community projects including indicators of success
Execute the implementation of communications and marketing plans and monitor indicators and effectiveness of communications and marketing campaigns
Work with project staff and project partners to collect and exchange information to develop communications projects effectively and in line with project plan
Manage content on multiple communications channels (social media platforms, newsletters, website, etc.) to communicate key messages to stakeholders in accordance with KVC's brand guidelines
Initiate, develop and produce promotional and marketing assets including flyers, brochures, posters, videos, newsletters, press releases, etc, following brand guidelines
Develop and maintain media & key opinion leader (KOL) relationships to maintain database of contacts, to ensure positive promotional coverage and issues management
Save details of all media coverage and update related database
Support to organize KVC’s events
Assist as needed with attending community events, meetings or conferences to promote organizational goals
Other marketing and communications related tasks
Requirements:
Bachelor degree in PR, marketing or related field
1-2 years’ experience in marketing, communications planning and executing preferably in development programs
Excellent grasp of social media and website metrics and best practices
Knowledge of web content management especially WordPress, Mailchimp, Canva.
English and Vietnamese communication skills (written and spoken)
Thorough understanding of traditional and emerging marketing channels
Understanding of basic marketing creativity and logic, on and off line
Excellent communication skills
Self-motivated with a positive and professional approach to management
Computer skills
Environmental consciousness.
Job Details:
Full-time, 40 hours per week
Flexi-time, may include both weekdays and weekends depending on event activities
Up to 30% travel in the province of Hanoi (for stakeholder meetings primarily)
Office location: KVC Office, located at 587 Lac Long Quan, Hanoi, and project sites
Compensation
Salary is negotiable
Please send your CV to info@keepvietnamclean.org
As we usually receive so many applicants' CVs, only shortlisted candidates will be contacted.
Job Details
Organisation Name:
KVC
Location:
Hanoi
Application Deadline:
Thu, 2023-11-30

Trình độ ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh: TOEIC ≥ 550/ IELTS 5.0 hoặc năng lực tương đương

Quản lý theo mục tiêu, kỹ năng quản trị tài chính và quản trị rủi ro
Lập kế hoạch và triển khai thực hiện
Đàm phán, thuyết phục
Giải quyết vấn đề

Trách nhiệm, kỷ luật Yêu cầu hồ sơ - Đơn xin việc.

title:
Digital Marketing Executive
- job post
description:
The main tasks:
Develop a Marketing plan (monthly, quarterly, yearly) and budget for marketing activities.
Implement effective plans and budgets in line with the company’s plans and directions.
Plan and implement online, offline, and digital marketing activities (Google ads, SEO, LinkedIn, Facebook ads, seminars, events, …), communication activities, and promoting our software outsourcing services effectively.
Monitor, evaluate ads quality, and optimize campaigns
Periodically report and analyze campaign metrics as required.
Research and update new marketing trends, new technologies
Research and analyze markets, brands, customer insights, new products, competitors, and indicators related to Marketing development.
Be responsible for the KPIs, campaigns, and the common targets
Coordinate with Sales and Marketing teams to perfect the Sales-Marketing process and build effective lead acquisition channels.
Support the marketing team in email marketing, connecting with customers, and other activities as required.
Requirements
Good English skills
At least 4 years of experience in the marketing field of B2B
Good communication and negotiation skills
Specialized knowledge in marketing, digital, and media
High requirements for management skills, team training, analytical skills, planning, time management, problem-solving skills, and work progress with high commitment.
Be able to use editing and design tools is an advantage
Why you will love working here:
Attractive remuneration package with multiple bonus schemes
We have a fun, Silicon Valley style startup culture that values openness, fun and awesomeness.
Attractive salary and annual salary reviews.
Chances to become leaders of a startup culture.

Proactive and international working environment.
Exciting company activities.
Opportunities:

Chances to improve the technical skills during working with clients on new technology, exciting workshops and seminars.

title:
Account intern ( Thực tập sinh tư vấn thương hiệu) - Việc làm tiêu biểu
- job post
company: CP TƯ VẤN THƯƠNG HIỆU STYWIN
description:
Giới thiệu:
STYWIN là công ty chuyên sâu về tư vấn thiết kế và truyền thông thương hiệu. Chúng tôi cung cấp các giải pháp toàn diện giúp doanh nghiệp nâng cao năng lực, vị thế cạnh tranh thông qua việc xây dựng thương hiệu mạnh.STYWIN đã nhận được sự tin tưởng của hàng nghìn các doanh nghiệp. Qua đó chúng luôn nỗ lực phát triển vì sứ mạnh vinh danh thương hiệu Việt.6 NămHoạt động trong lĩnh vực thiết kế tư vấn cho chúng tôi cơ hội tiếp xúc rộng khắp, sự hiểu biết sâu sắc về nhiều ngành nghề,
PHẠM VI CÔNG VIỆC
Tìm kiếm khách hàng tiềm năng, thiết lập tiếp xúc tư vấn về các dịch vụ branding, creative, design,
Nhận thông tin về khách hàng từ công ty, tư vấn các sản phẩm dịch vụ và chăm sóc khách hàng
Soạn thảo đề xuất dịch vụ, báo giá, hợp đồng, form mẫu, bản thuyết trình … phục vụ cho công việc.
Trực tiếp thực hiện, theo dõi dự án quá trình thực hiện hợp đồng, thanh lý và đốc thúc công nợ đối với từng khách hàng được giao.
Lập kế hoạch báo cáo định kỳ hàng tuần/ tháng/ qúy và theo yêu cầu của quản lý.
Cập nhật kiến thức công việc qua việc, đọc các sách báo về kinh doanh và tiếp thị, thương hiệu; duy trì các mối quan hệ khách hàng.
Thực hiện các công việc khác được giao bởi Công ty.
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
Tốt nghiệp đại học, cao đẳng quản trị kinh doanh, marketing,thương mại, báo chí….
Có kỹ năng giao tiếp, kỹ năng tư vấn, chăm sóc khách hàng, phân tích, tổng hợp thông tin, làm việc nhóm.
Khả năng làm việc độc lập và làm việc dưới áp lực cao. Có tham vọng, nhiệt huyết và cầu tiến.
Thành thạo các phần mềm văn phòng, có khả năng soạn thảo proposal là một lợi thế.
Có laptop, phương tiện đi lại.
Ưu tiên có ngoại hình, phong cách chững chạc, chỉnh chu.
QUYỀN LỢI
Lương cứng cao, hoa hồng theo doanh thu hấp dẫn.
Tuần làm việc từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6, thứ 7 làm việc online.
Làm việc trong văn phòng đẹp, sáng tạo.
Được đào tạo các kỹ năng làm việc chuyên nghiệp trong ngành truyền thông.
Được hỗ trợ bởi sales kit chuyên nghiệp và hệ thống
Được hỗ trợ bởi hệ thống khách hàng lớn, database khách hàng đồ sộ.
Được tham gia thường xuyên các chương trình team building, company trip
Địa điểm làm việc: Hà Nội
Lương: 5000K - 10000K VND một tháng
Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian
Yêu cầu: Chứng Minh Nhân Dân (CMND), Cover Letter
Quyền lợi: Hoạt động Dã Ngoại, Bảo Hiểm Y Tế, Bảo mật lương, Cơ Hội Phát Triển
Hạn nộp: 2023-11-29
Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc
Bằng cấp: Cao đẳng
Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Marketing,Sales/ Bán hàng
Số lượng cần tuyển: 2
Giới tính: Nữ

title:
Marketing Executive - Retail Segment
- job post
description:
About Knauf

Knauf is one of the world’s leading manufacturers of modern insulation materials, drylining systems, plasters & accessories, thermal insulation composite systems, paints, floor screed, floor systems, construction equipment and tools. With more than 250 production facilities and sales organizations in over 86 countries, 35,000 employees worldwide, and sales of 10 billion Euro (in 2019), the Knauf Group is offering a range of career opportunities – in Europe, the USA, South America, Russia, Asia, and Africa
Summary
In charge of trade promotion programs and related tasks to support Sales achieve the goals of Sales Target, Market Share and Market Coverage.
Implement activities to support categories and distribution channels to promote sales Volume, Product & Brand Visibility at store and in channel.

Responsibilities
Develop and implement Promotion programs for Retail Segment to achieve defined goals.
In charge of developing distribution channels to ensure the outstanding presence of the Company's products and Brand Visibility at store.
Build and develop relationship with customers and partners to capture timely information in the market to propose an effective Trade programs and Trade activities.
In charge of Trade activities/ Brand activation to engage with customer.
Other duties as required to ensure the efficiency of the department's operations in the company.
Requirements
Bachelor’s degree (Major: Economics, International Economics, Business Administration, Marketing, Foreign Trade).
Minimum 3 years in Trade Marketing role or equivalent position, have knowledge & experience in Promotion, Pricing, Channel and Category, Event and Activation; Preferably a multinational company and building materials.
Can-do attitude, open mindset and business acumen.
Regular market visits – customer centricity.
Good at MS Excel, data analytical communication and collaboration skills.
Fluent verbal and written communication in English.

title:
Content Marketing Expat
- job post
description:
Content Marketing
Role: Content Marketing Executive (Full time)
Level: Senior
Quantity: 01
Working place: Handico Tower, Pham Hung street, Nam Tu Liem, Hanoi
Overview:
You will work as part of the marketing team to promote the company’s services – which primarily consist of software development for eCommerce businesses. You will plan, create and promote written content. This role involves a lot of writing and editing, so impeccable English language skills are essential. There’s a lot of room for creativity in the role so it would suit a dynamic self-starter brimming with ideas.
Responsibilities:
Content creation: create content (social posts, emails, blogs, e-books, whitepapers, thought leadership/PR articles) to be used at every stage of the funnel with a focus on being helpful. You will also collaborate with our clients and internal teams to understand their content needs and develop content strategies that align with their goals
Proofread and edit content: ensure accuracy, clarity, and consistency in tone and style.
Analysis: join our Content team to review monthly analytics and reports about how our content marketing efforts are performing and find ways to optimize
Contribute to brainstorming sessions: Stay updated on industry trends and best practices to consistently deliver high-quality content, and creative ideas that will enhance our online presence
Requirements:
Content marketing experience for a B2B technology business or news publication is desirable.
Excellent English writing skills and ability to communicate at all levels (native English speaker is required)
Audio production and graphic design skills not essential but would be an advantage
Benefits:
At SmartOSC, we offer you the best to help you grow:
· Attractive salary package: up to 1500$
· Onsite opportunity in Europe, Australia, US
· Salary review twice a year
· Flexible working hour (Monday to Friday between 7:30am – 7:30pm on staff’s preference)
· Premium health care up to $6,000/year
· Working in One of the largest Ecommerce Agencies in South East Asia – Professional English environment
· Free language and professional training packages
· Firm’s Certified Qualifications Sponsorship for career development
· Annual company trip inside or outside Vietnam
· Other fun activities: happy hour, quarterly team building, football club, yoga club, swimming club, charity activities, etc.
· Free entertainment parties: Birthday party, Anniversary party, Sum-up Party, Year-End Party, etc.
TO APPLY: Please submit your CV to quynhln1@smartosc.com with the following information:
· Job Application Letter with “Content Marketing - Name” in the subject line.
· Updated CV in English
For further discussion, please kindly reach me via:
Zalo / Phone: 0777398734 (Ms. Quynh)

Pay: Up to 40,000,000₫ per month
Application Deadline: 2023/11/30

title:
Chuyên Viên Phân Tích Dữ Liệu (Data Analyst)
- job post
description:
ㅤ
Vị trí

Data Analyst

Thời gian bắt đầu

Tháng 12/2023

Thời gian làm việc

08h30 – 18h00, nghỉ trưa 1h30 phút.
Làm từ thứ 2 đến thứ 6, nghỉ thứ 7 và Chủ Nhật

Địa chỉ

Khu Đô Thị Nam Trung Yên, Cầu Giấy, Hà Nội

1. MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
Sau Introduction Stage, ở giai đoạn Growth Stage thì các quyết định ở mỗi phòng ban sẽ bắt đầu cần được cân nhắc nhiều yếu tố và sử dụng dữ liệu nhiều hơn. Việc sử dụng dữ liệu hiện tại của chúng mình còn rất nhiều cơ hội để làm hiệu quả hơn (efficient và effective), do vậy chúng mình cần bạn.
Bạn sẽ cùng chúng mình:
– Xây dựng nền tảng dữ liệu đúng, đủ và hiệu quả.
Ví dụ bài toán: PM hỏi: “Dữ liệu về hành vi học của khách hàng đúng và đủ chưa?”.
– Biết cần dùng data gì với từng tình huống và bối cảnh để theo dõi, phân tích và ra quyết định.
Ví dụ bài toán: CEO hỏi: “Hành vi học của khách hàng tháng vừa rồi có ổn không?”
– Nhanh gọn lẹ để có data mong muốn.
Ví dụ bài toán: COO hỏi: “Bao giờ có được dữ liệu về kết quả của tính năng mới vừa lên? Thời gian đó đã tối ưu nhất chưa, có nhanh hơn được nữa không?”
– Visualize data.
Ví dụ bài toán: PM hỏi: “Hành trình khách hàng từ lúc cài app tới lúc quyết định mua hàng thế nào?”
– Khai phá dữ liệu. Dữ liệu có nhiều insights, có thể chúng mình chưa tận dụng được hết, rất cần người “đào cùng”.
Ví dụ bài toán: Marketing manager hỏi: “Khách hàng có những hành vi gì thì dễ mua hàng hơn nhỉ?”
2. CHÚNG MÌNH CẦN NGƯỜI NHƯ THẾ NÀO
Đạo đức
– Các công việc có tính chất nhạy cảm, nhất là với dữ liệu, cần có đạo đức tốt. Làm việc đặt công ty và khách hàng lên trên, không tư lợi cá nhân
Kiến thức chuyên môn:
– Phân tích thống kê (statistical methods, hypothesis testing, regression analysis, and probability theory,..)
– Data Analysis Techniques (regression analysis, factor analysis, time series analysis,..)
– Biết Machine Learning & Data Mining là lợi thế.
– Database Management: khả năng thiết kế và sử dụng thành thạo SQL/NoSQL, tối ưu performance của query.
– Data Visualization: thành thạo công cụ Data Studio hoặc Power BI hoặc Tableau (thành thạo 1 trong các công cụ là được nha).
– Data Storytelling & Report Writing: biết cách đưa ra nhận định/đánh giá dựa trên những dữ liệu phân tích được.
Kỹ năng
– Problem-Solving
– Có khả năng giải quyết vấn đề hiệu quả và toàn diện.
– Critical Thinking
– Công ty đúng quan trọng hơn cá nhân đúng.
– Communication
– Biết lắng nghe và “nói chuyện được” với các bộ phận. Để “nói chuyện được” thì phải biết về chuyên môn và công việc của người khác. Việc này liên quan tới KỸ NĂNG HỌC ở dưới.
Kinh nghiệm
– 2-3 năm kinh nghiệm với vị trí Data Analyst.
– Đã làm việc với nhiều phòng ban để tất cả cùng làm việc hiệu quả hơn.
3. QUYỀN LỢI
Lương thưởng:
Lương tháng: 18M – 35M tùy level
Thưởng theo OKR dự án, thưởng ý tưởng sáng tạo, thưởng cải tạo quy trình làm việc
Thưởng lễ tết, sinh nhật.
Cơ hội phát triển:
Được đào tạo nâng cao kiến thức kỹ năng hỗ trợ công việc
Được đầu tư để kết nối và học hỏi từ các chuyên gia trong domain
Thăng tiến lên các vị trí quản lý chuyên môn /quản lý dự án trong thời gian ngắn
Môi trường làm việc thân thiện, đổi mới, và thú vị. Khuyến khích sự sáng tạo và đánh giá cao ý kiến đóng góp của tất cả nhân viên.
Tham gia vào quyết định chiến lược và phát triển sản phẩm của công ty.
Chế độ khác:
Ăn trưa miễn phí tại Công ty suất ăn 45.000 đ/ngày
Hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ bảo hiểm theo quy định của nhà nước sau thời gian thử việc, thưởng lương tháng 13.

4. CÁCH THỨC ỨNG TUYỂN
Ứng viên quan tâm vui lòng nộp lại hồ sơ kèm CV tới địa chỉ sau:
Email: recruitment@stepup.edu.vn
Tiêu đề ghi: [Step Up] Data Analyst_Họ tên của bạn
Hotline: 0931323822 hoặc Zalo 0397694640 (Ms. Hoàng Mơ)

title:
Business Development Executive
- job post
company: Công Ty TNHH Ibibo Group Việt Nam
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
Key Responsibilities:
Execute the organization's growth strategies and plans in the assigned territory.
Onboard new supply partners (Bus) and maintain long-term relationships with existing partners.
Effectively communicate new product developments to our supply partners and drive effective usage.
Work with Business Owners (BOs) with the overall objective of enabling growth and profitability for the BO.
Take complete ownership of the operator experience.
Design customized processes and tools for BOs to enhance their operations.
Educate and train BOs' staff on processes and products.
Collaborate closely with the Supplier's team to ensure the delivery of Service Level Agreements (SLAs).
Monitor SLAs and collaborate with internal stakeholders such as Customer Support, Product, Tech, Analytics, etc.
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Variable pay/ Incentive bonus 13 Pay
Inpatient and Outpatient Plan for Employee, Spouse, and Children
Frequent travel to meet partners and team
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Trung cấp - Nghề
Yêu cầu công việc:
Strong communication and negotiation skills to effectively engage with supply partners and internal stakeholders.
Execution-oriented mindset to drive the implementation of growth strategies and achieve targets.
Ability to analyze and consume data to derive insights and make data-driven decisions.
Customer-centric approach with the ability to prioritize and manage multiple tasks effectively.
Proficiency in both the local language and English for effective communication.
Ability to understand complex products and explain them in simple language based on user needs.

title:
Senior Performance Marketing
- job post
description:
Vietnam
Posted on 2023-10-01 12:38:02 · 44 applicants
Negotiable

Key Responsibilities:
Strategy and manage the monthly performance marketing budget across paid channels, campaigns, clients & KPIs with the goal of maximizing efficiency of spend.
Work directly with the commercial team to support the development of KPIs for client campaigns and performance projections, impacting the revenue & profitability of the business directly.
Manage the performance marketing team to deliver all key projects within timeline and on budget. Looking for more efficient ways to allocate and optimize the budget throughout the month.
Leverage our first party data to create custom targeting of audiences for ads to improve the efficiency of spend & improve the ad experience for our audience.
Directly oversee the set up, implementation and optimisation process for performance marketing ads across social, display and search. Ensuring proper set up and delivery.
Analyze the performance of ads on an ongoing basis to propose improvements to the performance of these campaigns and have a deep understanding of the market, the platforms and the trends to ensure we are always operating effectively and efficiently.
Partner with third party advertising networks and agencies from time to time when needed to support the delivery of campaigns and ensure these partners deliver as required.
Collaborate cross functionally with other marketing functions including social media, CRM, SEO & PR to ensure alignment of strategies, plans & approach. Working with content teams & design teams as needed to produce assets to deliver your campaigns & ads.
Report the performance of the marketing spend regularly to the broader teams with suggestions for improvement month on month and innovate to propose more efficient ways of operating and executing.
Collaborate with the data team to ensure you have on hand the required data flow and analysis needed to perform at the highest level.
Stay abreast of the market dynamics and changes in advertising regulations to ensure we are always compliant with platform policies and privacy regulations.
People and Performance Management
You ensure the Hello Health Group Core Values, our Purpose and Mission are exemplified in your own behavior and brought to life.
You fully commit to and implement Performance Management in line with company policy, engaging and leading individuals and the team effectively to meet company goals.
You ensure that all team members have updated Job Descriptions, MBOs and are fully aware of the expectations of their role and responsibilities.
You hold regular performance 1 on 1 reviews with direct reports to ensure high levels of staff engagement and delivery on KPIs.
You actively identify and address the development needs of your team, utilize the learning opportunities available to them on a regional and country level, ensuring your team maximizes their own learning by making use of HHG’s offerings such as the HHG Academy.
You partner with the HR team to ensure that company policies are implemented and that all employment contracts and practices are compliant with local labor laws.
You attract, recruit, retain and develop staff to position Hello Health as an employer of choice across departments.
You’ll ensure the projects have sufficient resources to execute within time and budget. If there’s no internal resources, you’ll establish relationships with freelancers and agencies towards project execution.
Who We Want
3-5+ years of experience managing performance marketing channels for multiple platforms or brands both platform and agency experience is valued.
Bachelor degree in a relevant field of study with a proven track record of self-learning, development and maintaining necessary skills as the industry evolves.
Direct hands on execution & management experience of advertising media budgets with experience running ads across multiple platforms (Facebook and IG Ads, YouTube, TikTok, Zalo, LINE etc.)
Experience running the optimisation of monthly performance ad budgets across channels and teams with a proven track record of efficiency improvements
In-depth knowledge of key performance metrics that pertain to paid marketing campaigns including ROAS, CAC, LTV, PPC
Creative mindset with examples of creative ideas that were brought to life across media channels from conceptualization to execution & performance management
Passion for healthcare & an ambition to drive impact through social media and content that inspires & engages audiences
Innovative mind that is highly detail oriented and data driven with experience utilizing a variety of data tools including Google Analytics, Data Studio, FB Ads Manager & Google Ads
What Hello Health Group Offers:
We are passionate individuals that are driven to succeed. Our work culture is characterized by strong team spirit, high degrees of openness and innovation, and strong collaboration across fields. We love the freedom of an entrepreneurial company and are looking for like-minded, ambitious professionals who have a desire to build something new and actively support our young company in its growth to greatness.
You will love working here!
Competitive salary package
Professional and open working environment–culturally integrating the best of Western and Southeast Asian cultures to take the best of each and ensure we build an energetic, commercial, and fun working atmosphere.
Opportunities to improve English skills within an international team–English is the official language in all Hello Health offices.
Do you think you’ve got what it takes? !
OUR VALUES
HEALTH ABOVE ALL
We believe that people should be well informed and empowered to make better health decisions and to live healthier and happier lives. We aspire to a positive and healthy work environment that values the health and wellbeing of our people so we can fulfill our vision and mission as an organization.
CHAMPION’S MINDSET
We play to win, constantly striving to be the best, challenging the status quo, and resetting the bar. We will always find a way – if it doesn’t exist today, we’ll build it.
DRIVE IMPACT
We are committed to making a meaningful and measurable difference to our people, audience, clients, and shareholders. We are results-oriented, data-driven, and accountable
WE ARE MANY WE ARE ONE
We embrace the diversity of cultures, backgrounds, skill sets and opinions. Through this diversity our Vision, Mission, Purpose and Values bind us as one team and we grow stronger together.

title:
PRODUCT / BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT MANAGER – HANOI & HCMC
- job post
description:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC

1. Lập và tổ chức triển khai kế hoạch kinh doanh của Công ty đối với sản phẩm được giao
2. Tổ chức, thu thập, phân tích, đánh giá thông tin thị trường và đưa ra đề xuất, kiến nghị, kế hoạch kinh doanh cho sản phẩm được giao.
3. Thực hiện chính sách kinh doanh của Công ty
4. Phê duyệt và kiểm soát các hợp đồng bán hàng cấp Công ty theo quy định của Công ty
5. Triển khai các hoạt động hỗ trợ khách hàng
6. Chịu trách nhiệm trong hoạt động kinh doanh của chi nhánh trước Ban Giám đốc
7. Quản lý các hoạt động kinh doanh của chi nhánh đảm bảo tuân thủ đúng theo quy định của Công ty và pháp luật.
8. Phê duyệt phương án kinh doanh của nhóm
9. Xây dựng, phát triển và quản lý chuỗi công ty đối tác phân phối, dự án
10. Đào tạo nhân viên trong lĩnh vực sản phẩm phụ trách.
11. Xây dựng và phát triển dịch vụ khách hàng
12. Xây dựng hình ảnh và tác phong chuyên nghiệp cho công ty phân phối.
13. Lên kế hoạch bán hàng định kỳ năm/quý/tháng cho sản phẩm được giao.
14. Đảm bảo sự phù hợp các hoạt động của Công ty với hệ thống chất lượng
15. Tổ chức các sự kiện, marketing phục vụ việc phát triển thị trường
16. Tổ chức xử lý khiếu nại khách hàng cấp Công ty
17. Tổ chức tuyển dụng và đào tạo các vị trí cần thiết cho lĩnh vực phụ trách.
18. Đánh giá nhân viên dưới quyền
19. Thu thập, phê duyệt các chỉ tiêu chất lượng liên quan
20. Báo cáo về hoạt động kinh doanh của Công ty cho Ban Giám đốc
21. Chịu trách nhiệm về kết quả kinh doanh của sản phẩm được giao với Ban Giám đốc.

YÊU CẦU

1. Kinh nghiệm:
Tối thiểu 3 năm kinh nghiệm trong lĩnh vực kinh doanh phân phối, tối thiểu 01 năm kinh nghiệm tại vị trí tương đương lĩnh vực Cabling/ Networking
Thành thạo máy tính, word, excel, powerpoint,.. kỹ năng văn phòng.
Khả năng thuyết trình, giới thiệu giải pháp, sản phẩm tốt.
Kinh nghiệm hỗ trợ đối tác trong các dự án.

2. Trách nhiệm:

Chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng và thực hiện kế hoạch kinh doanh cho sản phẩm được giao
Chịu trách nhiệm về doanh số bán hàng công ty đề ra.
Quản lý, vận hành và phát triển các mối quan hệ đối tác

3. Khác:

Hiểu rõ sản phẩm phân phối bao gồm giải pháp, sản phẩm, kỹ thuật,…
Hiểu rõ sản phẩm đối thủ cạnh tranh
Hiểu rõ thị trường
Thành thạo tiếng anh giao tiếp.

QUYỀN LỢI

Lương: Lương kinh doanh + Thưởng doanh số: Thỏa thuận tùy theo năng lực và kinh nghiệm.
Thưởng: Thưởng dự án, thưởng hiệu quả công việc.
Bảo hiểm: Theo quy định của nhà nước
Các quyền lợi khác: Theo quy chế công ty.

HỒ SƠ
Hồ sơ bản mềm bao gồm: Đơn xin việc, Sơ yếu lý lịch tự thuật, Giới thiệu về kinh nghiệm và quá trình công tác của bản thân
Vui lòng gửi CV về địa chỉ email: info@n-tek.vn
Điện thoại liên hệ: 0978 369966

Experience managing a team
Analytical and data-driven approach to problem solving; comfortable with numbers and conducting analyses to support business plans/strategies
Comfortable with multi-tasking; able to identify, prioritize and deliver important initiatives

Clear and structured communication (written and verbal) skills
Strong relationship development and management skills
Strong interpersonal skills; fluent in written and spoken English

JOB SUMMARY
Title: Business Development Executive (All levels)
Department: Business Development
Year of Experience: 1-3 years+
Job Level: Junior/Middle/Senior Executive
Report Line: Business Development Manager/ Managing Director
Peer: BD Executive, Account Executive
Subordinate: None
Salary Range: Negotiable
Hiring Purpose: New Hire
Working Time: 9:00 – 18:00, Monday – Friday
Working Location: Hà Nội

JOB DESCRIPTION
Sales Planning:
Conduct research to identify new business opportunities to achieve sales targets.
Build own sales plan and list of potential clients, including quarterly, monthly, weekly and daily sales plans.
Sales Execution:
Conduct research and build effective approach strategies for each client based on company data/own data.
Collect intelligence related to the demand, market, and competitors through daily activities to continuously upgrade the strategies and share insight to other teams (e.g. Product teams, Account team, Industry experts etc.)
Jointly prepare client proposals and plan in coordination with related teams and involve in client presentation.
Build and maintain strong relationships with clients during before and after sale.
Coordinate to ensure efficiency in the sales process through prospect development, proposal, presentation and closing negotiations to achieve company goals.
Support the managers to build and upgrade sales materials (e.g. Sales script, Email templates, Communication flows, etc.)

JOB REQUIREMENTS
Skills & Knowledge & Qualification
Minimum 1 year of successful sales or account management experience in professional B2B environments, preferred experience in the digital marketing agency field.
Having knowledge of Digital Marketing/ e-commerce is a plus.
Strong client service mindset, always put the client first.
Strong Microsoft office, Powerpoint in particular, research and presentation skills.
Strong relationship and networking skills.
Driven, self-motivated, can-do attitude, bring optimism and positive energy to the team.
Able to work in a team and independently.
Willing to learn and challenge yourself to step out of your comfort zone.
PMAX-er Identification
Client Impact: Everything we do is ultimately to deliver real client impact and value.
Innovation: Innovation is to drive change and innovative new ideas to create more values for clients, teams and society.
People development: People development is to attract, develop, and retain the most talented people. Development is a responsibility, not a choice, of both the individual as well as the organization.
Integrity: Integrity is to be honest and show a consistent and uncompromising adherence to what is right, even if it is at our own cost.
Teamwork and fun: Teamwork and fun is the cooperative and collaborative effort of a team to achieve a common goal or to complete a task, and trying to build a joyful & enjoyable atmosphere for everyone.
Extreme ownership: Extreme Ownership is the practice of owning everything in your world, to an extreme degree. Think of yourself as the owner of the company. It means you are responsible for not just those tasks which you directly control, but for all those that affect whether or not your task is successful.

BENEFITS
Competitive salary range with quarterly & yearly incentives and 13th-month salary
Flexible working time and 15 paid leaves per year
Insurance as full salary (SHUI)
Annual health check-up and Healthcare Insurance PTI for all employees
Laptop supply/allowance or support for laptop purchase costs on an individual basis
Internal training & career development opportunities, and external L&D budget sponsorship
Team bonding budget quarterly, snack time to engage team members
Quarterly, Yearly Recognition Gifts & Awards and gifts on special occasions (birthday, New year…)
Holiday activities; Company trip; Year End Party; Company Birthday; Culture Day; Quarterly Town Hall.
Other staff welfare allowances.

ABOUT PMAX
PMAX is a Total Performance Marketing pioneer in Vietnam with in-depth digital marketing expertise and total marketing solutions to deeply impact brand performance and drive businesses growth effectively. Founded in 2016 by prominent strategists and continuously led by over 20 professionals specialized in the Total Performance Marketing field, PMAX empowers businesses to maximize their business results by optimizing their marketing performance. With over 9 services (research, strategy, platform, media, creative, campaign management, merchandising, commercial, tech & data, etc.), 4 primary solution packages (Branding, E-commerce, App, Lead Generation) and established track records, PMAX has successfully worked with over 400 clients on over 600 successful projects.
PMAX has earned 5 MMA SMARTIES awards and 4 Agency of the Year honors during the business growth. PMAX has also become a Premium partner of Facebook, Google, TikTok, Shopee, Zalo, and others.
For you – talents with strong brain power who are seeking “the bigger shirt” for your effective growth, we are confident to offer a young, dynamic and aggressive environment with unlimited opportunities to maximize your potential and optimize your capacity in order to make a leap to marketing experts & business leaders.
Why PMAX?
We provide opportunity of fast-track career path and driving to create impact
Clear competency framework to optimize and improve your potentials with multiple approaches
Be empowered to create the best practices and shape the way forwards
We offer non-stop learning & growth with in-depth expertise knowledge
Trusted total performance marketing agency, top-of-mind performance marketing agency in Vietnam
Mentoring & coaching with high-qualified professionals and gain comprehensive functional expertise
Always-on self-learning spirit mode
We surround you with top talents sharing the same set of vision and value
Step out of comfort zone with highly motivating team and aggressive growth mindset

title:
Digital Marketing Specialist
- job post
description:
Mô tả công việc

Nghiên cứu & Lập kế hoạch Digital Marketing
Đưa ra định hướng & ngân sách cho hoạt động digital marketing theo quý, tháng.
Phát triển & Tối ưu hệ thống kênh Digital marketing (website, blog, email và mạng xã hội) để tiếp cận được khách hàng tiềm năng.
Phát triển các chiến dịch trong năm nhằm đạt được mục tiêu kinh doanh và hiệu quả ngân sách.
Khám phá insight về xu hướng trên digital để cập nhật các chiến dịch.

Triển khai Digital Marketing
Lên kế hoạch và kiểm tra sự hiện diện của thương hiệu trên nền tảng digital.
Thiết kế các chiến dịch quảng cáo.
Quản lý hoạt động chạy quảng cáo để tăng nhận diện thương hiệu và tỉ lệ chuyển đổi.
Đo lường & tối ưu thường xuyên các chỉ số để đạt được hiệu quả quảng cáo.
Phối hợp cùng team content để cải thiện chất lượng content & SEO.
Phối hợp cùng các designer để cải thiện trải nghiệm của người dùng trên website.

Yêu cầu công việc

Trình độ chuyên môn: Facebook Ads, SEO, Performance Marketing, Digital Marketing.
Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương hoặc ít nhất 4 năm kinh nghiệm trong mảng Marketing.
Năng lực:
Có tư duy phân tích và tư duy hệ thống.
Có kinh nghiệm social media hoặc SEO/ Google Adwords, email marketing trong lĩnh vực/ sản phẩm B2B.

Quyền lợi

Grow through what we go through
Trong hành trình của 1 start-up, chúng mình sẽ có một vài ngày/ tháng/ quý/ năm đầy thử thách. Chúng mình muốn bạn sẵn sàng đón nhận thử thách, khát khao chinh phục các cuộc chơi lớn và duy trì được sự bền bỉ với mục tiêu chung.
Bring me, and win as we
Gia nhập team, bạn sẽ mang đến tố chất, năng lực, tính cách riêng của bạn. Chúng mình sẽ làm mạnh lên màu sắc đó, kết nối nó với đội ngũ hiện tại để cùng nhau tạo ra những cách làm mới mẻ có thể chưa-từng-xuất-hiện trên thị trường. Chúng mình tìm kiếm những điều độc đáo để tạo ra những điều phi thường!
Quyền lợi
Thu nhập từ 20.000.000 (hoặc thoả thuận theo năng lực).
Tham gia Hành trình phi thường cùng chúng mình, với sứ mệnh chuyển hoá cách thức quản trị nhân sự tại Việt Nam.
Làm việc và được dẫn dắt trực tiếp bởi đội ngũ BOD thiện chiến với nhiều cơ hội phát triển
Ăn sáng, chiều FREE tại công ty
Được hưởng Bảo hiểm xã hội, Bảo hiểm y tế, Bảo hiểm thất nghiệp theo chế độ nhà nước ban hành;
Cơ hội được học hỏi, trao quyền, phát triển bản thân trong môi trường trẻ, năng động và sáng tạo,
Cơ hội tham dự các buổi Master Talk, CEO Talk với sự giao lưu chia sẻ kinh nghiệm của các chuyên gia và CEO hàng đầu trong cùng lĩnh vực;
Được thường xuyên tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding, hoạt động văn hóa tinh thần cho anh em trong công ty;
Thưởng các ngày lễ tết, thưởng dự án, thưởng KPI, hiệu suất công việc hàng tháng....
Được phát triển các dự án lớn với hàng triệu người dùng và hệ sinh thái đa dạng
Môi trường cực kỳ năng động, vui vẻ và thoải mái. Nơi các bạn được thỏa sức sáng tạo và thể hiện đam mê, phát triển bản thân.

title:
Brand Partner Specialist - Sustainability Software (Hanoi, HCMC)
- job post
description:
Introduction
In a Technology Sales Representative role (what we internally call a 'Brand Sales Specialist') you will represent Sustainability Software that aligns our Maximo, TRIRIGA, Environmental Intelligence Suite, Envizi, Complex Engineering, Supply Chain and B2B Collaboration portfolios, to create a comprehensive enterprise applications portfolio to help clients transform how they execute enterprise operations leveraging intelligent insights.

Your Role and Responsibilities
Your Role and Responsibilities:
Brand Partner Specialist(BPS) focus which involves lead generation with partners and SI (System Integrator)'s. This will be including client contact and qualification and progression and closing of opportunities. It would also involve cold calling/digital marketing campaign generation. You would also be responsible for recruit, enable and activate partners and SI's in the Sustainability Software brand, part of the cloud and cognitive software business. The role would involve identifying new partners/SI's as well as an allocation of existing partners and SI's. You will need to be comfortable with presenting face to face and visiting customer and partner sites across country.

Required Professional and Technical Expertise:
Drive incremental software license revenue through partnerships (influence and partner resell), working with cross country business Partners and System Integrators.
Build and execute partner plans with all partners, and coordinate partner enablement (training) with a technical counterpart.
Lead, co-create and drive co-marketing initiatives with partners; And on boarding partners and help partners certify technically and sales.
Create and lead sales prospecting tactics. Have the sales experience and comfortable with qualifying sales opportunities and prepared to drive opportunities with the partner community mainly in growth and strategic accounts.
Knowledge of the Sustainability Software brand.

Preferred Professional and Technical Expertise :
5 years experience in Sustainability Software brand is optional

Required Technical and Professional Expertise
Refer to the JD



Preferred Technical and Professional Expertise
Refer to the JD

About Business Unit
IBM has a global presence, operating in more than 175 countries with a broad-based geographic distribution of revenue. The company’s Global Markets organization is a strategic sales business unit that manages IBM’s global footprint, working closely with dedicated country-based operating units to serve clients locally. These country teams have client relationship managers who lead integrated teams of consultants, solution specialists and delivery professionals to enable clients’ growth and innovation. By complementing local expertise with global experience and digital capabilities, IBM builds deep and broad-based client relationships. This local management focus fosters speed in supporting clients, addressing new markets and making investments in emerging opportunities. Additionally, the Global Markets organization serves clients with expertise in their industry as well as through the products and services that IBM and partners supply. IBM is also expanding its reach to new and existing clients through digital marketplaces.

Your Life @ IBM
In a world where technology never stands still, we understand that, dedication to our clients success, innovation that matters, and trust and personal responsibility in all our relationships, lives in what we do as IBMers as we strive to be the catalyst that makes the world work better.
Being an IBMer means you’ll be able to learn and develop yourself and your career, you’ll be encouraged to be courageous and experiment everyday, all whilst having continuous trust and support in an environment where everyone can thrive whatever their personal or professional background.
Our IBMers are growth minded, always staying curious, open to feedback and learning new information and skills to constantly transform themselves and our company. They are trusted to provide on-going feedback to help other IBMers grow, as well as collaborate with colleagues keeping in mind a team focused approach to include different perspectives to drive exceptional outcomes for our customers. The courage our IBMers have to make critical decisions everyday is essential to IBM becoming the catalyst for progress, always embracing challenges with resources they have to hand, a can-do attitude and always striving for an outcome focused approach within everything that they do.
Are you ready to be an IBMer?

About IBM
IBM’s greatest invention is the IBMer. We believe that through the application of intelligence, reason and science, we can improve business, society and the human condition, bringing the power of an open hybrid cloud and AI strategy to life for our clients and partners around the world.

Restlessly reinventing since 1911, we are not only one of the largest corporate organizations in the world, we’re also one of the biggest technology and consulting employers, with many of the Fortune 50 companies relying on the IBM Cloud to run their business.

At IBM, we pride ourselves on being an early adopter of artificial intelligence, quantum computing and blockchain. Now it’s time for you to join us on our journey to being a responsible technology innovator and a force for good in the world.

Location Statement
For additional information about location requirements, please discuss with the recruiter following submission of your application.

Being You @ IBM
IBM is committed to creating a diverse environment and is proud to be an equal-opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, gender, gender identity or expression, sexual orientation, national origin, caste, genetics, pregnancy, disability, neurodivergence, age, veteran status, or other characteristics. IBM is also committed to compliance with all fair employment practices regarding citizenship and immigration status.

title:
Assistant Partnership Manager
- job post
description:
About UOB
United Overseas Bank Limited (UOB) is a leading bank in Asia with a global network of more than 500 branches and offices in 19 countries and territories in Asia Pacific, Europe and North America. In Asia, we operate through our head office in Singapore and banking subsidiaries in China, Indonesia, Malaysia and Thailand, as well as branches and offices. Our history spans more than 80 years. Over this time, we have been guided by our values – Honorable, Enterprising, United and Committed. This means we always strive to do what is right, build for the future, work as one team and pursue long-term success. It is how we work, consistently, be it towards the company, our colleagues or our customers.
About the Department
We design and provide products and services that empower our customers to enjoy greater banking convenience while they extract more value from their money. In particular, we are focused on promoting and developing healthy saving and investment practices across generations.
Job Responsibilities
Support Partnership Manager to work with Legal and Compliance and partner to prepare legal documents (Cooperation Agreement, Terms & Conditions, campaign policy) for Partnership Head to review
Support to prepare DOIT registration for each partner (based on signed CA, T&C, and campaign policy) and support to follow GRC in
onboarding progress new partners.
Support to collaborate with internal parties to produce marketing collaterals (UOB website, eDM, leaflet, SMS, lead form, Facebook post,
etc)
Support to check and collaborate with partners to promote campaign (partners’ website banner, Facebook posts, posters, tent cards …)
Support on tracking campaign effectiveness – leads generation, usage, customer journey.
Support to assign leads from Partners to Sales daily and consolidate report from Sales on following up leads from partners weekly and
monthly (from 3,000 – 5,000 leads/ month)
Support for monthly reporting – with related internal parties to consolidate sales/usage reports to make payment/ reward for customers and
partners.
Support Partnership Head and Partnership Manager for market comparison, analyze partners for approaching and proposing progress with
external and internal parties.
Perform any other duties or responsibilities consistent with the role as assigned by management.
Job Requirements
Bachelor’s degree with minimum of 3 years proven and progressive financial services and/or retail sales experience or equivalent
Experience in knowing partnership, executing partnership
Ability to draft legal documents (contracts, terms & conditions, marketing content …) in English and Vietnamese
Requires superior analytics and problem-solving skills. Must be attentive to details.
A strong & assertive communicator in speaking & writing
Sound knowledge of financial services products and services and the client relationship management system
Ability to work in a fast-paced, team-oriented environment
Clear view on how to work with Compliance, Credit & Risk and Internal Control to ensure a balanced risk operating environment
Be a part of UOB Family
UOB is an equal opportunity employer. UOB does not discriminate on the basis of a candidate's age, race, gender, color, religion, sexual orientation, physical or mental disability, or other non-merit factors. All employment decisions at UOB are based on business needs, job requirements and qualifications. If you require any assistance or accommodations to be made for the recruitment process, please inform us when you submit your online application.


Apply now and make a difference.
