title:
Global Aqua Nutrition Advisor
- job post
description:
Want to build a stronger, more sustainable future and cultivate your career? Join Cargill's global team of 160,000 employees who are committed to safe, responsible and sustainable ways to nourish the world. This position is in Cargill’s animal nutrition and health business, where we improve lives through better nutrition. Our team researches, innovates and creates solutions that deliver healthy results for our customers.
Job Purpose and Impact

The Global Aqua Nutrition Advisor will provide industry expertise to our key business and external accounts regarding the best nutritional solutions and technology, especially in the Shrimp species.
In this role, you will serve as an industry leading professional enabling the business to enhance its commercial growth potential by leveraging unparalleled technology and groundbreaking solutions to create value added solutions for our key customers and prospects. You will lead and support in developing and deploying solid Cargill nutrition system and innovations in shrimp and fish.

Location is subject to compliance check & approval. Key Accountabilities

Serve as the point of contact for nutrition expertise and use this expertise to influence prospective customers.
Develop and implement a plan with regional strategic marketing and technology and commercial teams to partner with key accounts to achieve trusted advisor status and drive value added focus to enable delivery on customer promise.
Provide expertise to assess new business opportunities and identifying priorities in the innovation pipeline to optimize nutrition solutions and enable the ability to create optimal offers from a nutritional and commercial perspective.
Perform and support complex research for product development, partnering with key internal and external suppliers and stakeholders to test new technologies and solutions.
Prepare project data and conclusions for internal and key customer presentations to make recommendations and product demonstrations.
Develop training resources to provide guidance to regional and local commercial and technical teams to improve our value creation and sales effectiveness.
Other duties as assigned.
Provide expert thought leadership in your field and work with limited direction, using additional research and interpretation to identify issues or problems. You may provide direction to supporting team members and be a strategic contributor.
Qualifications

Minimum Qualifications
Doctorate degree, Doctor of Veterinary Medicine or related advanced degree in Animal Science, Aqua nutrition or Aquaculture, or equivalent business experience.
Minimum of six years of related work experience.
Fluent in English.
Travel globally up to 30% of the time.
Preferred Qualifications
Proven work experience in Aqua nutrition for shrimp.
Deep industry knowledge and understanding how to create new value for customer.
Strong interpersonal skills (builds trust) with internal and external stakeholders.
Our Offer
We provide a fast paced stimulating international environment, which will stretch your abilities and channel your talents. We also offer competitive salary and benefits combined with outstanding career development opportunities in one of the largest and most solid private companies in the world.

Interested? Then make sure to send us your CV and cover letter in English today:
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/cargill
Cargill is committed to being an inclusive employer. Click here to find out more https://careers.cargill.com/diversity/

title:
Marketing Executive
- job post
description:
Join TUI BLUE Hotels as Marketing Executive where you will be responsible for creating effective marketing strategies to promote the hotel's brand, increase occupancy rates, and enhance overall guest satisfaction. Working closely with the marketing team and other departments, you will play a crucial role in creating and executing effective campaigns to drive revenue and maintain a positive brand image.

ABOUT THE JOB
Provide high-level administrative support by conducting research, preparing statistical reports, implementing digital marketing and communication plans, collecting, and processing sensitive data, resolving guest issues and perform clerical functions.
Support the Sales & Marketing team to sell guest rooms, catering services, and banquet facilities as directed with modern marketing initiatives.
To produce marketing material such as design, photo-shooting (if required) and content creation.
Gather materials and assemble information packages (e.g. brochures, promotional materials, sales demo kit, welcome kit, souvenir etc.).
Ensure the adequacy of sales-related equipment or materials are readily available.
Implement TUI BLUE’s brand guidelines when doing marketing material (Guest & Internal ie. Menus, leaflets, in-room etc).
Support the team by maintaining effective internal communications to ensure that all relevant hotel departments are kept informed of marketing/communications objectives and initiatives.
Assist in collecting material for internal magazine ‘Stars’ and in-room magazine ‘Collect’.
To produce and fast check content for marketing purposes when required and to ensure press material, image library, third-party websites etc. are updated and accurate.
Assist handling media inquiries and interview requests and respond to enquiries from media, individuals, and other organizations.
Monitor, analyse and communicate PR results and activities monthly.
Support in monitoring all hotel social media channel, both technical and editorial.

ABOUT YOU
Preferably educated (bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience) in Graphic Design, Illustration, Fine Arts, or related discipline.
Previous experience working as design professional including designing digital ads (banner ads, Facebook ads) and creating art and illustrations.
Advanced knowledge of Photoshop/Illustrator/Adobe etc
Professional, proactive, creative, and reliable; organized and detail-oriented; able to communicate and collaborate well; able to follow brand guidelines.
Familiar and travel/hospitality trends
Proficient using varied marketing analytics tools.
Language required – English plus local language required. Other European languages high advantageous.

Applications will auto-close Sunday 3rd December 23:59 GMT.

ABOUT YOU
Competitive local salary and benefits as standard.
16 days annual leave + 11 days public holiday.
1.5 days off per week.
Accommodation and meals included.
Compulsory insurance according to Vietnamese laws, Accident Insurance 24/7.
Opportunity to develop career path with TUI BLUE – world’s leading leisure hotel brand.
Training courses with great career development opportunities.
Incentives, activities, and benefits as per corporate policy.

We love to see your uniqueness shine through and inspire the future of travel. If you would like to read more about what Diversity & Inclusion means to us simply visit Our DNA.

TUI BLUE is the global flagship hotel brand of the TUI Group combining the best aspects of both individual and all-inclusive holidays with outstanding quality and modernity. Our hotel brand stands out from the crowd with first-class locations, regional architecture, an innovative technology concept with a unique blend of local and contemporary cuisine and BLUEf!t® sport and leisure facilities.

TUI is the world’s leading tourism group. The broad portfolio gathered under the Group umbrella consists of strong tour operators, 1,600 travel agencies and leading online portals, five airlines with around 150 aircraft, over 400 hotels, 15 cruise liners and many incoming agencies in all major holiday destinations around the globe. It covers the entire tourism value chain under one roof. This integrated offering enables us to provide our 27 million customers with an unmatched holiday experience in 180 regions.

#TUIBLUE #TUIBLUEHotels #TUIBLUECareers #LetsTUIit #LI-DB1

Data-driven mindset.

Fluent in English (both writing and speaking) is a plus.

title:

- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentBusiness Intelligence and Data Analytics

The Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team plays a critical role in conducting close-loop data-driven business iterations. As business intelligence specialists and data analysts, our scope of work is not limited to just performance monitoring and reporting, but also in proactively finding actionable insights to help drive high-impact business changes. Our end-to-end data solution reduces the gap between the business teams and technical teams, and achieves real ‘intelligence’ in the iteration cycle. Browse our Business Intelligence and Data Analytics team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.
Job Description:

Requirements:
With minimum 3 year experience in Data process and analyzing field

Proficient in one of the technical tools, Excel, PPT

Entrepreneurial spirit and start-up mindset

Have SQL or Python is an big advance

title:
Content Writer / Editor (Health & Nutrition)
- job post
description:
Company Description

Ayobody is one of Vietnam’s leading digital nutrition and wellness companies. By using technology, active coaching by experts and the latest nutrition science, we are helping people all over the world to live healthier.

Job Description

Ayobody is on a mission to revolutionize the wellness and nutrition landscape. We are in search of experienced content writers and editors to help us craft evidence-based online nutrition programs and ensure the accuracy and reliability of our content.
Hours of work: flexible, part time or full time
Location of work: remote
Salary: VND 8.000.000 - VND 12.000.000
Key Responsibilities:
Content Development: Collaborate with our team to develop the English content for our comprehensive nutrition programs (PDF handouts and handbooks, educational blog posts etc.)
Content Review: Critically evaluate existing program content. Use tools, such as ChatGPT, to improve structure and wording where necessary.
Medical Verification: Scrutinize both text and video content intended for client distribution based on reputable sources, ensuring it aligns with the latest nutritional science and best practices.

Qualifications
Be fluent in both English and Vietnamese (both written & verbally);
2+ years of experience in content writing. Editing experience is a plus;
Be focused on collaboration, using feedback to make our resources the best they can be;
Have effective time management skills.

Additional Information

More About Us
At Ayobody, we believe that by working with the most talented people in the industry we can shape health and wellness in Southeast Asia. Together with international nutrition experts, we empower people to understand their nutrient intake, boost their confidence and prevent chronic diseases.
Our goal is to be a distributed company from the start. By leveraging digital tools, we are able to work with great people from all over the world and offer flexible work arrangements allowing our team members to work when they feel best.

Why Work For Us
Work with the most skilled people in marketing, product, technology and health science;
Accelerate your skill and knowledge growth by taking on a lot of responsibility and learning from great mentors;
Flexible public holidays, swap days off according to your values and beliefs;
Competitive salary;
Company parties and team building activities;
Be part of one of the fastest-growing startups in South East Asia.

Deliver digital specific Marketing support across all online channels including development and maintenance of owned media: websites (SEO), social fanpages/ channels.

MINIMUM BACKGROUND/ EXPERIENCE REQUIRED

Analytical abilities and data-driven thinking
Digital marketing execution: digital marketing platform understanding, digital campaign optimization
Core Trait/Behavior Requirement:
Good interpersonal and communication skills
Self-starter, aggressive for constant improvements
Capable of timely and fast, accurate deliverables
Strong at adaptability and cross functional team collaboration
Strong self-driving and self-promotion

description:
Lương 15.000.000 vnđ ++

Xây dựng Profile điểm bán, cập nhật thông tin, phân tích đánh giá đưa ra đề xuất đầu tư tại từng điểm bán.

title:

description:
We are seeking a Country Expansion Manager to help expand our global presence of Tether. The ideal candidate has a degree in Business/Management/Management Engineering (MBA preferred), strong analytical skills, and a proven track record of building successful partnerships and setting/monitoring KPIs. The role requires a proactive, well-organized candidate who can work in a fast-paced environment and is comfortable with ambiguity. The Country Expansion Manager will be responsible for identifying and pursuing new business opportunities, maintaining relationships with existing customers, and collaborating with internal teams to develop go-to-market strategies. International travel is required.

Tasks

Responsibilities:
Identify and pursue new business opportunities while maintaining and deepening relationships with existing customers.
Understand the Company's solutions and effectively promote their adoption.
Implement strategic initiatives and track KPIs to evaluate their success.

Native / Fluent with the country’s local language

BSc. / MSc. in Business / Management / Management Engineering (MBA preferred).
Strong presentation, negotiation, and business / financial planning skills.
Entrepreneurial / founding experience will be considered a plus.
Strong project, relationship, and networking management skills.
Strong analytical skills to identify market opportunities, analyze data, and make informed decisions.
Proven ability to build successful partnerships with external stakeholders.
Experience in setting and monitoring KPIs to evaluate business performance and drive growth.
Ability to work in a fast-paced, collaborative environment with adaptability to change
Comfortable working with ambiguity and prioritizing efforts.

Cross-cultural competence and experience in the fintech industry.
Result-oriented mindset with a strategic, analytical, and innovative thinking approach.

title:

- job post
description:
ABOUT METUB
METUB Network, operated by Metub Vietnam JSC, is the leading digital media & entertainment and YouTube multi-channel network in Vietnam with an extensive network of 2500+ content creators, generating over 7 billion views monthly and ranging from top celebrities to top vertical endemic creators.
Our goal is to make it possible for content creators, celebrities, influencers, eSports players… to "live by passion" - earn enough to turn their passion into a professional career. METUB operates in Media & Entertainment segments, providing creator services to produce & distribute content, and brand services to deliver successful content partnership/ influencer marketing campaigns. We are also expanding into Commerce to finish our ecosystem, which is built around Creator-led businesses.
ABOUT THIS JOB

Điều phối tổ chức công việc và giám sát triển khai của các đối tác outsourcing.

Được thăng tiến lên những vị trí quản lý trong thời gian ngắn dựa trên kết quả.

description:

Kobiton - mobile testing platform, raised $34M with over 60K customers
Katalon - test automation platform, raised $27M with over 1M users

Work with us if you are:
Hungry. You are ambitious and want to be part of a high-impact startup.
Versatile. You are able to wear multiple hats on a regular basis.
Result-oriented. You are fanatical about getting things done.
Purpose-driven. You want to commit to a mission and the team that is behind it.
We are looking for an experienced Copywriter to write clear and engaging copies for our Marketing copy, including websites, blogs, emails, social media, short-form videos, etc. Our ideal candidate is a team-spirited and skilled writer with an eye for detail and excellent command of English in written form.
Responsibilities
Creating compelling content for a wide range of marketing materials, including landing pages, emails, blog articles, user guides, social media posts, product reviews, short-form videos, etc.
Collaborating with the development & product teams to understand the product from the inside out in order to communicate it to our users.

Analyzing content performance and assisting to make data-driven decisions to maximize content impact.

Minimum 3 years of copywriting experience.
Excellent English proficiency (spoken and written).
Ability to convey complex ideas concisely.
Empathy towards customers and their frustrations.
Strong research skills.
Results-driven mindset.
Collaborative and team-oriented attitude.
Self-motivated in fast-paced start-up environments.
Commitment to high standards, attention to detail, and impeccable spelling and grammar.
Nice to have:
Experience with SEO
Knowledge in product development and UI UX design industry.
Benefits and Perks
Build a global SaaS product in one of the Best Places to Work in Vietnam
Competitive salary and many benefits, including health insurance, flexible hybrid working mode
Work with a talented team who built large-scale systems at Google, QASymphony, Katalon, Kobiton, etc.
Beautiful office in HCMC with many entertainment options (game console, foosball, ping pong, gym, etc.) and unlimited coffee & snacks.

title:
Technical Sales Program (Vietnam and Indonesia)
- job post
description:
We can't predict what the future holds, but we know TI will have a part in shaping it.
When you join TI, you will participate in the Career Accelerator Program (CAP), which provides professional and technical training and resources to accelerate your ramp into TI and set you up for long-term career success. Within this program, we also offer function-specific technical training and on-the-job learning opportunities that will encourage you to solve problems through a variety of hands-on, meaningful experiences from your very first day on the job.
TI’s FAST (Field Applications & Sales Training) Program is designed to prepare Sales & Applications team members for customer-oriented careers that pair technical skills with business perspectives. The program provides experiences that help rising TIers understand how to successfully grow TI’s business and to thrive throughout their entire TI career. There are two available FAST program tracks: (1) Field Applications and (2) Technical Sales.

This 7-month experience aims to teach Technical Sales Associates (TSAs) how to build and manage customer relationships, and how to influence decisions to grow TI’s revenue. The track includes three rotations*:

Rotation 1, Field Sales Office (FSO): This rotation integrates Technical Sales Associates with a local TI sales team, offering first-hand experience of TI’s sales process. You will partner with customers and internal teams to uncover and win every possible customer opportunity, and also leverage our one-of-a-kind virtual account system to learn how to find, define, and win opportunities in a mix of real-time and simulated environments.

Rotation 2, Product Marketing: This rotation focuses on the relationship between sales and a particular product line. This rotation helps you understand product life cycles, roadmap development, marketing approaches, and ways to collaborate with product marketing to win at the customer.

Rotation 3, Sales Operations: This rotation provides first-hand experience working with the pricing and customer service teams. Focus areas for this rotation include pricing models, supply chain functions, price negotiation, and an overview of pricing guidelines, laws, procedures and tools.

Upon successful completion of this track in the FAST program, participants are welcomed as Technical Sales Representatives (TSRs) on TI’s Worldwide Sales & Applications team. Technical Sales Representative responsibilities include:
Using technical expertise, various sales tools and relationships with engineering teams to identify projects
Managing and quantifying leads, and managing the commercial aspects of customer relationships
Developing, forecasting and monitoring an annual plan for revenue growth
Texas Instruments will not sponsor job applicants for visas or work authorization for this position.

Minimum Qualifications:
Bachelors degree in Electrical Engineering, Computer Engineering, Electrical and Computer Engineering or related field
Cumulative 3.0/4.0 GPA or higher
Preferred qualifications:
Ability to establish strong relationships with key stakeholders critical to success, both internally and externally
Strong verbal and written communication skills
Ability to quickly ramp on new systems and processes
Demonstrated strong interpersonal, analytical and problem-solving skills
Ability to work in teams and collaborate effectively with people in different functions
Ability to take the initiative and drive for results
Strong time management skills that enable on-time project delivery

Why TI?
Engineer your future. We empower our employees to truly own their career and development. Come collaborate with some of the smartest people in the world to shape the future of electronics.
We’re different by design. Diverse backgrounds and perspectives are what push innovation forward and what make TI stronger. We value each and every voice, and look forward to hearing yours. Meet the people of TI
Benefits that benefit you. We offer competitive pay and benefits designed to help you and your family live your best life. Your well-being is important to us.
About Texas Instruments
As a global semiconductor company, we design, manufacture, test and sell analog and embedded processing chips to nearly 100,000 customers. Our products enable electronics everywhere and in things you experience every day - from health care, smart homes and connected cars to drones, smart phones and more. Our passion to create a better and more sustainable world by making electronics more affordable through semiconductors drives us to make our technology smaller, more efficient, more reliable and more affordable.

Texas Instruments is an equal opportunity employer and supports a diverse, inclusive work environment.

If you are interested in this position, please apply to this requisition.

title:
Assistant Director of MarCom
- job post
description:
Job Number 23191760
Job Category Sales & Marketing
Location Sheraton Phu Quoc Long Beach Resort, Bai Dai Area Ganh Dau Commune, Phu Quoc, Ha Noi, Viet Nam VIEW ON MAP
Schedule Full-Time
Located Remotely? N
Relocation? N
Position Type Management


JOB SUMMARY

Develops and implements marketing strategies designed to achieve RevPar/share-of-wallet (non-room revenue) goals for departments including, but not limited to, spa, food and beverage, retail, concierge, and front office. Manages all in-hotel messaging to guests. Updates hotel web page content as needed to insure up-to-date accuracy. Liaises with key departmental leaders and teams to assist with developing and implementing marketing plans and goals. Develops, plans, and executes programs as necessary to achieve stated revenue goals. Manages workflow with on-property graphic designer to verify all in-house marketing messages/materials are on-strategy and within budget.
CANDIDATE PROFILE

Education and Experience

2-year degree from an accredited university in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or related major; 3 years' experience in Marketing or a comparable professional area.
OR
4-year bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Marketing, Sales, or related major; 1 year experience in Marketing or a comparable professional area.

CORE WORK ACTIVITIES

Conducting Marketing Activities to Achieve Departmental Goals
Implements regular tracking of initiatives to determine results.
Updates hotel web page content as needed to insure up-to-date accuracy.
Manages all in-hotel messaging to guests including, but not limited to: AstroVision, Janus, plasma screens, front desk electronic signage, in-room and in-hotel collateral, iConnect, entertainment guides, duratrans, pole banners, on-hold messages, in-room videos, transportation videos, wayfinding, fast maps, key cards, etc.).

Developing and Implementing Marketing Strategies
Liaises with key operators of each department to determine goals and marketing needs.
Liaises with hotel Director of Public Relations to provide communications tools as needed for the implementation of local/regional publicity and promotions initiatives.
Works with brand Vice Presidents and Brand Marketing Managers to assist with implementation of brand leisure transient and group market strategies at hotel level as needed.
Coordinates and implements Strategic Alliance partner marketing program elements.

Maximizing Revenue
Develops, plans, and executes programs as necessary to achieve stated revenue goals.
Manages workflow with on-property graphic designer to verify all in-house marketing messages/materials are on-strategy and within budget.
Liaises with brand VPs for all local/regional media needs related to non-rooms revenue initiatives.

Managing and Conducting Human Resources Activities
Interviews, selects and trains employees.
Directs the work of employees.
Sets and adjusts employees' rates of pay and hours of work.
Handles employee complaints and executes disciplinary action as needed.
Evaluates employee's productivity and efficiency for the purpose of recommending promotions or other changes in status.
Conducts annual performance appraisal with direct reports according to Standard Operating Procedures.

Marriott International is an equal opportunity employer. We believe in hiring a diverse workforce and sustaining an inclusive, people-first culture. We are committed to non-discrimination on any protected basis, such as disability and veteran status, or any other basis covered under applicable law.

When you join the Sheraton family, you become a member of its global community. We’ve been a place to gather and connect since 1937. At Sheraton, associates create a sense of belonging in more than 400 communities around the world. We invite, we welcome, and we connect guests through engaging experiences and thoughtful service. If you’re a team player who is excited to deliver a meaningful guest experience, we encourage you to explore your next career opportunity with Sheraton. Join us on our mission to be ‘The World’s Gathering Place’. In joining Sheraton Hotels & Resorts, you join a portfolio of brands with Marriott International. Be where you can do your best work, begin your purpose, belong to an amazing global team, and become the best version of you.

title:
Marketing Manager, English, Vietnam (based in Hanoi)
- job post
description:
Marketing Manager, English, Vietnam (based in Hanoi)

Date: 24 Nov 2023
Location: Hanoi, East Asia, VN
Company: British Council
We support peace and prosperity by building connections, understanding and trust between people in the UK and countries worldwide.

We work directly with individuals to help them gain the skills, confidence and connections to transform their lives and shape a better world in partnership with the UK. We support them to build networks and explore creative ideas, to learn English, to get a high-quality education and to gain internationally recognised qualifications.

Working with people in over 200 countries and territories, we are on the ground in more than 100 countries. In 2021–22 we reached 650 million people.

Role Purpose:

To support the Senior Marketing Manager, English in the development and implementation of the cluster/country marketing strategy and plans for English, ensuring alignment to the regional and global marketing strategy and brand, and to work in partnership with the English SBU to ensure that marketing programmes enable required business targets.

Main accountabilities but not limited to the following:

Strategy and Planning
Supports the Senior Marketing Manager, English to develop and execute marketing plans for English in the cluster/country, ensuring they drive and support the regional strategic objectives for the British Council in a flexible, cost-effective way.
Plans and executes go to market plans for English across the cluster/country, agreeing the programmes, delivery mechanisms, budgets and resources.
Develops and executes campaigns to support a variety of routes to market and maximise impact and share of voice.
Deploys the British Council brand architecture in line with brand management standards across the cluster.
Ensures that clear and consistent marketing processes are deployed for English aligned to agreed global marketing processes.
Monitors and reports on agreed marketing KPIs for English in the cluster.
Consultancy, analysis & problem-solving
Applies professional marketing expertise to develop and enhance English marketing strategies, plans and approaches.
Applies core technical and professional knowledge to identify and assess current state of English marketing, suggests opportunities for improvement and design and supports the development of new or improved practice to drive business growth and reduce duplication of activities and expenditure.
Presents information clearly supported as needed to tailor the presentation of findings to meet the differing needs of stakeholders in the cluster.
Supports others in understanding of the cluster context, opportunities and challenges for English marketing functions and teams.
Makes appropriate linkages to issues in the cluster, English and region, to help ensure that the development of cluster English marketing strategies and plans is based on informed business insight and joined-up thinking.
Proactively seeks internal customer and other feedback to monitor satisfaction with the provision of marketing services for English in the cluster and specialist advice and support, enabling improvements to be made where issues are identified.

Business Development
Supports the implementation of new English marketing approaches and/or techniques which enhance efficiency and wider business impact, ensuring alignment across the cluster and to the regional English marketing strategy.
Drives a clear focus on audiences and market segmentation.
Explains to customers and colleagues the need for compliance with agreed marketing policies and processes and produces reports at country level to demonstrate compliance as needed.
Champions the deployment of the British Council brand architecture, monitors compliance, and manages interventions to address and resolve non-compliance.
Subject/Sector expertise
Provides proactive professional advice and support to colleagues to ensure local English specific requirements are compliant with marketing policy, process and governance.
Ensure the development of high quality and effective English marketing plans and solutions using and sharing their marketing expertise.
Proactively pursues an annual cycle of formally recognised Continuing Professional Development to maintain and deepen their professional expertise.
Commercial and financial management
Using agreed corporate systems and processes, supports budget management for the regarding English marketing plans and programmes.
Conducts monthly and year-end reporting on progress against plan and deliverables, budget, and management of issues and risks.
Shows an understanding of value for money/cost effectiveness in the advice, recommendations and support they provide to colleagues in the business teams supporting them to achieve the best results from their projects, products and services.
Relationship and stakeholder management
Proactively participates in the Marketing Community of Practice and network of marketing professionals developing good working relationships with colleagues across the organisation and the business & operational teams across the cluster they support.
Develops peer/personal networks within and outside Marketing to enhance own knowledge and expertise.
Proactively builds and maintains excellent relationships with internal partners and stakeholders to ensure integrated, joined up and future-proofed approaches.
Leadership and management
Plans and prioritises own work activities to ensure effective delivery of marketing activities for the country over a quarterly to annual time horizon.
Shares intelligence, experience and ideas to support Senior Marketing Manager in identifying/developing new ways in which marketing could positively impact upon the British Council’s operational efficiency and effectiveness.

Role specific knowledge and experience:

Experience in a marketing position at a national level within a medium to large organisation.
Demonstrable experience of developing marketing strategies and plans.
Demonstrable experience in managing supplier relationships.
Stakeholder engagement and management.
Experience in a global organisation. (Desirable)
Experience in a relevant sector or industry (e.g. education, English teaching; Desirable).

Further Information

Pay Band: 6/G
Contract Type: Indefinite
Location: Hanoi, Vietnam
Requirements:
Relevant degree (e.g. marketing, or equivalent level of experience).
Relevant external professional organisations (e.g. CIM, Melcrum, GCN, CIPR, WOMMA, etc. or equivalent experience in relevant discipline; Desirable)
Conditions of Employment: Local Direct Hire
Applications are welcomed from candidates currently in this location with a natural right to work.
Applications are also welcomed from candidates currently based in other British Council country offices. However, please note candidates must have a natural right to work in the country, on a permanent basis, as immigration clearance and/or on-going visa support is not provided by the British Council for this role. Relocation support is also not provided.
Closing Date: Wednesday 20 December, 2023 11:59 PM Philippines Time (GMT+8)

A connected and trusted UK in a more connected and trusted world.

Equality , Diversity, and Inclusion (EDI) Statement

The British Council is committed to policies and practices of equality, diversity and inclusion across everything we do. We support all staff to make sure their behaviour is consistent with this commitment. We want to address under representation and encourage applicants from under-represented groups, in particular, but not exclusively, on grounds of ethnicity and disability. All disabled applicants who meet the essential criteria are guaranteed an interview and we have Disability Confident Employer Status. We welcome discussions about specific requirements or adjustments to enable participation and engagement in our work and activities.

The British Council is committed to safeguarding children, young people and adults who we work with.

We believe that all children and adults everywhere in the world deserve to live in safe environments and have the right to be protected from all forms of abuse, maltreatment and exploitation as set out in article 19, UNCRC (United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child) 1989.

Appointment to positions where there is direct involvement with vulnerable groups will be dependent on thorough checks being completed; these will include qualification checks, reference checks, identity & criminal record checks in line with legal requirements and with the British Council’s Safeguarding policies for Adults and Children.

If you have any problems with your application please email askhr@britishcouncil.org

Please note: Applications to this role can only be considered when made through the Apply section of our careers website. Our ‘ASK HR’ email is only to be used in case of a technical issue encountered when applying through the careers website. Emails with supporting statements and CV/Resumes sent to this email address will not be reviewed and will be deleted.

title:
Seller Live Assortment Management Executive - Business Development, Shopee
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentBusiness Development and Partnerships
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Business Development and Partnerships teams at Shopee are dynamic and energetic. The teams are always looking to acquire business opportunities to drive Shopee to be the No. 1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. The aim of the Business Development and Partnership teams is to provide Shopee’s buyers with a wide variety of product listings at the best prices.
About the Team:
As a part of the Livestream team, you will have chances to be responsible for the end-to-end of your own livestream initiatives. The team will work closely with the Head of Marketing and Lead of Marketing Engagement to ensure the performance is always at the required level. You will also work directly with sellers and various external departments such as BD, Product, QC, Production, Graphic Design, Promotion team etc to ensure the fastest that the process could be achieved.
Job Description:
Define, implement and execute projects to enrich seller livestream assortment
Identify issues, develop hypotheses, gather and analyze data, and present findings and strategic recommendations to facilitate senior leadership decision making
Support ideation, execution & tracking of initiatives on improving quality and quantity of seller assortment on Shopee Live
Support regular price competitiveness analysis and monitoring for livestream
Maintain and manage project timelines, expectations, tasks, and resources
Help bridge the gap between the various seller offices, the regional teams, and local teams such as KOL team, production team and campaign team
Acquire a thorough understanding of key customer needs and requirements
Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential livestream sellers to meet their needs
Prepare regular reports of progress and forecasts to internal and external stakeholders using key livestream metrics
Requirements:
Full-time Bachelor’s degree or above, smart and fast learning
Has prior and solid experience in Account and Project Management; at least 2 years of experience in E-commerce, Business Development or Consultancy
Possess business acumen and able to generate insights independently
Excellent communication, negotiation and presentation skills
Strong analytical skill and sensitivity to data, detail-oriented and highly organised
Highly motivated and target driven
Logical thinking and strong problem solving skills
Self-initiate and can-do attitude person
Professional English skills (reading / writing / listening / speaking)

title:
Chuyên viên Marketing
- job post
description:
- Chịu trách nhiệm lên kế hoạch, quản lý và triển khai hiệu quả các hoạt động Marketing trong ngắn, trung hạn theo định hướng chiến lược xây dựng thương hiệu bền vững của Welling ( 7P ).
- Xây dựng kế hoạch nội dung, quản lý và sáng tạo các dạng nội dung cho thương hiệu Welling trên tất cả các nền tảng ( Website / Fanpage / Youtube / Zalo / Linkedin / Tiktok…) hàng tuần / tháng / năm.
- Chịu trách nhiệm Quản lý và Phát triển Hệ thống nhận diện thương hiệu Welling bên trong và bên ngoài, online & offline luôn ấn tượng, độc đáo, đúng bản sắc, đồng nhất và phù hợp với từng điểm chạm thương hiệu.
- Thiết lập và duy trì quan hệ với với các đối tác, cơ quan truyền thông, agencies, freelancers có liên quan phục vụ cho hoạt động marketing của Công ty.
- Triển khai các hoạt động Đo lường, phân tích và Báo cáo hiệu quả hoạt động Marketing theo từng chương trình hoặc theo Báo cáo ngày, tháng, quý, năm...
- Chủ động triển khai các hoạt động nghiên cứu thị trường nhằm nắm bắt và cập nhật thường xuyên các Xu hướng mới trong ngành, Đối thủ, Khách hàng, Kênh phân phối ... để có những Đề xuất Marketing hiệu quả hơn.
- Phối hợp hoạt động Digital Ads, khuyến mãi, tài trợ, cobranding ... nhằm gia tăng Độ nhận biết sản phẩm & thương hiệu Welling, thu hút thêm nhiều khách hàng tiềm năng, hỗ trợ Sales tăng doanh thu hàng tháng. - Phối hợp với Brand Creative để định hướng và quản lý việc thiết kế sáng tạo các Tài liệu marketing ( Online & Offline / tĩnh & động ) thật sự ấn tượng, thu hút nhiều KH cao cấp và Đối tác.
- Phối hợp triển khai cùng các bộ phận trong việc phát triển các trải nghiệm KH vượt trội.
Loại hình công việc: Toàn thời gian
Lương: 13.000.000₫ - 18.000.000₫ một tháng
Thời hạn xin việc 06/12/2023

title:
Seller Live Features Management - Business Development, Shopee
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentBusiness Development and Partnerships
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Business Development and Partnerships teams at Shopee are dynamic and energetic. The teams are always looking to acquire business opportunities to drive Shopee to be the No. 1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. The aim of the Business Development and Partnership teams is to provide Shopee’s buyers with a wide variety of product listings at the best prices.
About the Team:
As a part of the Livestream team, you will have chances to be responsible for the end-to-end of your own livestream initiatives. The team will work closely with the Head of Marketing and Lead of Marketing Engagement to ensure the performance is always at the required level. You will also work directly with sellers and various external departments such as BD, Product, QC, Production, Graphic Design, Promotion team etc to ensure the fastest that the process could be achieved.
Job Description:
Draw insights from data sets and apply data-driven methods to identify user pain points related to seller livestream journey on Shopee
Proactively identify opportunity areas for deep dive investigations and future long-term seller livestream features development.
Identify & propose system driven initiatives to solve operational issues for seller livestream
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to refine proposed solutions & implement initiatives to improve the seller livestream experience
Collaborate with product team and seller education team to implement system driven initiatives
Monitor performance of initiatives post launch & identify improvement opportunities or gaps
Collaborate with Product Support team to support end users
Communicate with stakeholders to understand their pain points
Requirements:
Full-time Bachelor’s degree or above, smart and fast learning
Has prior and solid experience in Account and Project Management; at least 2 years of experience in Livestream, Business Development or Marketing
Possess business acumen and able to generate insights independently
Excellent communication, negotiation and presentation skills
Strong analytical skill and sensitivity to data, detail-oriented and highly organised
Highly motivated and target driven
Logical thinking and strong problem solving skills
Self-initiate and can-do attitude person
Professional English skills (reading / writing / listening / speaking)

title:
Content Writer (Vietnam)
- job post
description:
About Us
ManageEngine is the IT management division of Zoho Corporation. With over 280,000 customers across the world, ManageEngine is a recognized leader in the IT management and cybersecurity space. We've been witnessing phenomenal growth and to keep up with the demand we are doubling down on our hiring to build a world-class team. The central marketing team is a group within ManageEngine, dedicated to marketing world. We are looking for a skilled content class enterprise IT solutions, across 190 countries. specialist for our regional marketing team within ManageEngine. The ideal candidate will need to have a passion and flair for writing, be research-oriented, and keen understanding of the IT/Technology landscape. If you’re familiar with producing online content and have an eye for detail, we’d like to meet you. The candidate may have to occasionally accommodate overlapping work hours with North American, European, Indian, or APAC time zones.
Job Responsibilities
Should have a good understanding of basic GTM strategies and practices.
Be on the top of relevant technology trends. Update marketing data of your region. Provide content strategy (should have strong data analyses and number crunching capabilities).
Write high-quality, tailor made content for continuous improvement of the ManageEngine website - making use of SEO principles, and analyzing past data.
Design and implement email marketing campaigns to improve awareness about the company. Analyze data for continuous improvement of email campaigns.
Identify relevant trends and topics, and develop persuasive, high quality region specific long form content - blogs, thought leadership articles, industry stories, ebooks, white papers, website content, and more. Liaise with the PR team to get it published in the right media. Most of the content will have to be created in regional language.
Localize content produced on a global level with regional context. This includes re- purposing existing content, translating English content to local language, and/or reviewing the larger pieces of content received from translation agencies.
Collaborate with external influencers and industry experts to produce relevant content.
Measure the impact of published content and perform analysis to improve critical metrics. Review and implement process changes to drive operational excellence.
Requirements
Basic Qualifications
Ability to strategize and create content and messaging relevant to the target audience.
Exceptional writing, communication, storytelling, and project management skills.
Bilingual fluency in the English and local languages, for content creation, communication and general collaboration.
Ability to ship great content under tight deadlines.
Excellent attention to detail and ability to multi-task projects and deliverables.
Tech-savvy with the ability to explain complex technical matters in a simple manner without using jargon.
Preferred Qualifications
Qualification in literature, technical writing, or mass communication.
2 years of content writing experience in the Internet, media and high-tech industries.
Your skill set is a nice intersection between copywriting, technical writing, marketing, and public speaking.
The demonstrated ability to work independently and autonomously.
Job Type: Full-time
Work style: Work from office/hybrid
Please note there is a Pre-Interview Form (a few additional questions) that you need to fill in once you have submitted your Resume. Please scroll down and check before exiting the site. Thank you.
Job Type: Full-time
Ability to commute/relocate:
Ho Chi Minh City: Reliably commute or planning to relocate before starting work (Required)
Experience:
Marketing: 1 year (Preferred)
Content Writer: 2 years (Required)
Language:
English (Required)

title:
Senior Marketing Executive (Strong Content Marketing Strategy)
- job post
description:
Job description:
Orchestrating digital content strategies across all online platforms (Facebook, YouTube, Tiktok, Instagram, LinkedIn…)
Managing a content marketing budget.
Planning and execution monthly and yearly content plan.
Measuring the results of marketing activity to inform future marketing campaigns.
Managing a team of content marketers, designers, and data analysts.
Researching and implementing content recommendations for organic SEO success.
Writing supported documentations: market research, e-book, user guide… following business needs.
Liaise with internal departments and external stakeholders (agencies, vendors, partners, KOLs, KOCs…) to establish requirements for marketing campaigns and manage programs.
Digital:
Lead generation through both advertising activities (Facebook Ads, Google Ads, TikTok Ads…) and content creation.
Continuously research for new opportunities, monitor the market trends, and propose the ideas to grow the digital / online business for the company.
Event marketing:
Planning and execution online and offline events such as product launching, customer loyalty, seminar, webinar, workshop…
Working with agencies/vendors to check all decoration design, POSM, customer gifts, PGs, ect, to maximize campaign effectiveness.
Job requirements:
Bachelor's degree in Marketing or a related field.
Experience with content marketing, online community building, online branding, online and offline event organization.
Data-driven and highly analytical.
Proficiency with Google Analytics 4, Facebook Ads, Google Ads.
Proficiency with social media analytics.
3-5 years of relevant marketing experience. Experience in Real Estate-related industries is a plus.
Strong analytical mindset and problem-solving skills.
Resourceful, motivated, independent, and takes the initiative to fulfill tasks.
A Customer-Centric and Can Do attitude.
Excellent in English skills (spoken and written).
Benefit:
Annual salary review.
External trainings for leadership, language, software training.
Work in a young, dynamic and friendly environment together with supportive individuals.
Develop your knowledge and skills in the international working environment for your future career path.
Enjoy additional medical care (accident, healthcare insurance, life insurance).
Enjoy fully covered team building trips with company.
Annual leave 18 full-paid days.
Job workplaces:
Hồ Chí Minh - Việt Nam
Job level:
Nhân viên
Job language:
Tiếng Anh
Job industry:
Quảng cáo, Truyền thông & Sự kiện

title:
Senior Strategic Partnership (Bank) - Marketing, Shopee
- job post
description:
Apply Now

LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
Our Marketing teams conceptualise and implement go-to-market activities to achieve increased usage and visibility. The Regional Marketing team is responsible for in-app campaign planning, product marketing, partnerships and content strategy to drive acquisition and engagement. title:
Communication Assistant Manager - User Experience & Communication, SPX Express
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentOperations
LevelExperienced (Team Lead)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud.
Job Description:
The Communication Lead will oversee all projects in marketing communication from planning to execution & make alignment with external teams to ensure project target delivered

Overall branding and communication management:
Develop holistic approach and action plan to enhance overall SPX brand image and maintain high brand consistency across all channels (from online to offline)
Build up strong social community to increase brand awareness for SPX on social and connect with riders/ drivers to improve their engagement/ commitment with the company
Establish clear communication strategy and execution plan for cross-functional business projects
Create and maintain smooth communication flow among internal SPX: right information to be delivered to right persons, and at the right time
Crisis management:
Manage overall social sentiment towards Shopee Xpress and work with PR/ risk management/ legal on crisis management if needed
Partnership Programs:
Identify strategic partners to establish partnership programs and drive more benefits for SPX riders/ drivers/ sellers, and local community with external brands/ merchants
Leadership:
Lead, manage and grow a team in conceptualizing, executing and optimizing marketing communication projects to drive impact: Define team’s SOW, monitor and manage project performance KPIs; escalate issues with proposed solutions promptly to management, then closely monitor on mitigation implementation
Lead a team of ~8 members with diverse backgrounds ; able to provide guidance and feedback to ensure for overall team’s achievement and development
Requirements:
Possess solid knowledge and experience communication strategy
Have experience in branding strategy, brand reputation protection
Have strong connection with brands and experience in running partnership programs
Possess experience in event planning is a plus
Highly meticulous and good at coordination, able to work under extreme pressure
Willing to be hands-on with strong project management and executional abilities
Proven leadership capabilities, driven, resilient, reliable and more importantly, someone who enjoys working in a fast-paced environment
At least 5 years of work experience, preferably in Marketing, Project Management or other relevant experience(s) with 2 years of team management experience
Excellent command of English

title:
Marketing Manager/ Trưởng Phòng Marketing
- job post
company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Sandycook Việt Nam
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: 25 - 50 triệu VNĐ)
Tiến hành nghiên cứu, xây dựng và triển khai các chiến lược marketing tổng thể và chi tiết, phù hợp với chiến lược kinh doanh của Công ty.
Xây dựng bộ nhận diện thương hiệu và quản lý quá trình thực hiện khả năng nhận diện thương hiệu.
Đo lường, đánh giá và chịu trách nhiệm toàn bộ về hiệu quả của các chiến lược marketing được thực hiện.
Điều phối, quản lý, đào tạo và phát triển đội ngũ nhân sự của Phòng Marketing.
Xây dựng và dự trù ngân sách cho các hoạt động marketing của Công ty.
Thực hiện các công việc khác được cấp trên giao phó.
Chức vụ: Trưởng Nhóm/Trưởng Phòng
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Đóng BHXH cho CBCNV sau thời gian thử việc theo đúng quy định;
Chế độ nghỉ phép theo tháng (Mỗi tháng có 01 ngày phép);
Thưởng các dịp lễ, tết, sinh nhật,... Theo quy định Công ty (Tết nguyên đán sẽ thưởng mức riêng)
Phụ cấp thêm cho phí ăn trưa: 600.000 VNĐ/26 công;
CBCNV được mua các sản phẩm về thực phẩm do Công ty sản xuất với giá ưu đãi;
Công ty cung cấp các trang thiết bị phục vị công việc như điện thoại, máy tính,...
Các chi phí công tác Công ty hỗ trợ 100% (Nếu có đi dự sự kiện khai trương cửa hàng ở nội thành, ngoại tỉnh,...)
Được đào tạo nâng cao nâng lực cơ hội thăng tiến.
Địa điểm làm việc
Hà Nội: Lk 19 OCT 2 khu đô thị Resco, Cổ Nhuế 2, Bắc Từ Liêm, Bắc Từ Liêm
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
Độ tuổi: 1996 - 1990.
Có kinh nghiệm từ 01 năm với vị trí Trưởng phòng Marketing, hoặc trong ngành hàng FnB hoặc ngành FMCG là lợi thế.
Mạnh về xây dựng kế hoạch, có khả năng lên kế hoạch tổng thể, sáng tạo và nắm bắt được xu hướng.
Am hiểu về xây dựng thương hiệu, quản trị và phát triển thương hiệu.
Khả năng làm việc với các con số, đọc hiểu và xử lý số liệu.
Kỹ năng lãnh đạo đội nhóm để hoàn thành mục tiêu.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Digital Marketing,Quản Trị Thương Hiệu (Branding),Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Truyền Thông/PR

Đại Học
Không yêu cầu

title:
ALPHA BOOKS TRƯỞNG NHÓM MARKETING

description:

Thực thi chiến lược marketing, quản trị nội bộ (60%):
Lập kế hoạch Marketing và tổ chức triển khai các hoạt động marketing
Chịu trách nhiệm giám sát, kiểm soát các hoạt động diễn ra hàng ngày của phòng Marketing, kiểm soát chất lượng các kế hoạch, sản phẩm marketing - truyền thông liên quan đến lĩnh vực do Phòng phụ trách nhằm hỗ trợ các kênh bán và thúc đẩy kinh doanh;
Tổng hợp báo cáo số liệu bán hàng, nghiên cứu, phân tích, đánh giá và đưa ra Chương trình bán hàng phù hợp với từng kênh bán;

Theo dõi tiến độ thực hiện, tổng hợp và đánh giá hiệu quả của các chương trình marketing, truyền thông báo cáo Ban Giám đốc;

Công tác quản lý CTV: CTV nội dung, CTV thiết kế (5%)
Tìm kiếm phát triển đội ngũ CTV chất lượng
Thực hiện công tác báo cáo định kỳ/ đột xuất và các chức năng nhiệm vụ khác
theo yêu cầu của cấp trên (5%)

QUYỀN LỢI ĐƯỢC HƯỞNG :
Thu nhập: tối thiểu 17.000.000đ
Làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, năng động, sáng tạo; Có cơ hội được thăng tiến khi đủ năng lực;

02 ngày nghỉ du lịch/năm, 02 ngày nghỉ relax/năm; Chế độ nghỉ mát, du lịch hàng năm (1-2 lần/ năm);
Thưởng tháng 13, thưởng doanh thu, thưởng cá nhân xuất sắc, vinh danh, lễ, tết; Hoạt động ngoại khóa: sinh nhật, relax day, hoạt động thể thao; hiếu, hỉ, ốm đau…;
Các chế độ phúc lợi xã hội theo quy định của Luật lao động và chế độ riêng dành cho nhân viên của Công ty.

title:
Seller Live Channels Communications - Business Development, Shopee
- job post

The Business Development and Partnerships teams at Shopee are dynamic and energetic. Đảm bảo thực hiện các mục tiêu marketing, thương hiệu và hỗ trợ bán hàng

title:
Marketing Manager (Vietnam Based)
- job post
description:
OBJECTIVE OF ROLE
This role needs a highly driven person with a strong understanding of the watch, jewellery or accessories sector, be innovation and digital centre of excellence minded, digitally savvy, creative skill-set, technology "literate", strategic thinking; a gatekeeper of that and integral to the business.
Reporting to the Co-founder & CEO, the Marketing Manager is a critical role with full responsibility for all Marketing aspects, from strategy to marketing planning & execution and CRM, PR & Events.
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES:
The Marketing Manager has the overall end-to-end responsibility for the Company Marketing from strategy to execution.
Lead the execution and drive the brand's global marketing, communication and content strategies integrated into digital & traditional marketing activities and investments with a focus on sharing of brand's voice and lead generation.
Champion cross-functional teamwork and create an inclusive team environment that inspires a diversity of perspectives and bold ideas, ensuring a first to market approach.
Responsible for ensuring all activity, content and creative output meets the brand's standard.
Develop and execute CRM strategies together with key stakeholders and ensure standardization of CRM implementation across regions and all channels.
Responsible for managing briefing, planning, executing, and distribution of plans and contents and working closely with and alongside the Chief Creative Officer & Ecommerce team.
Manage, develop, and grow the global brand presence through distributors, retailers, and partnerships (online and offline).
FURTHER RESPONSIBILITIES:
Establish solid cross-business relationships to ensure a cohesive implementation and align strategically across all necessary departments.
Responsible for developing seasonal/essential calendars and campaign flighting, maintaining a communication flow across all global digital/traditional channels from websites, newsletters, and social media.
Responsible for coordinating across all departments and keeping the 360 Marketing Communication plan up to date and aligned on upcoming campaigns, tactical campaigns and special projects.
Coordinate with the Ecommerce team full-funnel media plan to optimize channel efficiency, traffic and conversion tactics based on brand, corresponding audience/customer, channel and campaign strategies.
Ability to manage multiple projects, campaigns and events in a fast-paced, deadline-driven environment as part of a small team.
Be responsible for the brand's digital transformation in all markets via digital-driven marketing strategies and campaign planning, including programmatic marketing, analytics, social media, operational marketing, and CRM.
Drive the direction of customer segmentation and personalization to inform the development of the lifecycle program. Share consumer behaviour insights for the broader marketing organization.
Act as a strategic partner, optimizing and leveraging advancements in technology to constantly improve productivity and performance for our global markets whilst aligning with the strategies of our global HQ in Singapore.
Be responsible for the full spectrum of the marketing plan and strategies for the different markets, collaborating with cross-functional divisions to optimize offline and online sales by driving traffic to retail and various E-Commerce sites across markets.
Highlights opportunities or trends for continuous improvement aligned with global marketing strategy and business roadmap.
Accountable for leveraging regular reporting/tools to communicate performance, auctioning key findings and strategic optimizations
Communicates budgetary forecast, strategies, and guardrails to stay within budget parameters and helps to identify when activities are off track.
Bring innovative new thinking and ideas to help drive customer engagement and financial performance.
Stay current on all touchpoints and marketing trends, educate wider teams on innovations, and maintain digital leadership within the industry.
Own the responsibility of brand visibility at the shop-front level (i.e POSM) of the brand store or distributor/ retailer store; also support related stakeholders in field (i.e Promoter) to enhance consumers’ journye
Have the sense and experience of Trade Marketing will be a plus
KEY REQUIREMENTS:
Bachelor's Degree in Marketing, Business Analytics or related discipline.
At least five years' regional marketing experience in a retail or fast-moving consumer goods environment.
Professionally proficient in written and spoken English.
A confident self-starter with a high level of drive, result-oriented and resilient, with the ability to strive in a fast-paced, high volume and dynamic environment.
Prior experience in fashion & similar industries would be preferred.
Demonstrated strong team leadership with successful business partnering experience across cross-functional departments.
Exceptional and outstanding analytical skills, both quantitative and qualitative, strong experience interpreting test results & drawing conclusions
Demonstrated strong business judgment and decision-making skills and identified, prioritized, and articulated the highest impact initiatives in global markets.
A market-focused individual with the capability of devising a complete marketing plan with project management skills
Strong media contact and prior PR experience will be an added advantage.
Ability to pull data from various resources and translate it into trends, action plans and reporting templates.
Strong track record in marketing communications, lead generation, PR and achieving ambitious sales targets.
Proven expertise in digital and programmatic marketing (e.g. Analytics, SEO/SEM, Social Media and creative design).
Highly creative with experience in identifying target audiences and devising digital campaigns that engage, inform and motivate.
Proven ability to operate at the intersection of business and technology, delivering memorable customer experiences through multiple inter-connected digital channels.
Directly manage and know-how-to-do with visual apps or software to create/ generate Key Visual etc… will be a plus
Job Type: Full-time
Expected Start Date: 2023/11/20

title:

- job post
description:
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and execute content strategies to acquire new users for specific game titles.
Remain diverse and able to create compelling and engaging content not just for driving user acquisition, but also for brand awareness, and social engagements.
Collaborate with the UA team to develop highly tailored campaign messaging to optimize key UA metrics.
Ability to understand and analyze data performance of all deliverables, such as CTR, Retention Rate, CPI.
Maintain an ongoing test & learn mindset with an A/B test framework, testing creatives layer by layer from visuals, CTAs, specifications, to content pillars.
Develops annual content briefs based on collected learnings from UA team and propose interesting ideas to accomodate these learnings.
Ensures that creative briefs are effectively communicated to the our designers and keeps a close eye on production process for consistency.
Assists in strategizing and managing exclusive UA content plans.

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to translate complex data into actionable content strategies.
Excellent English written and verbal communication skills.
Strong research skills to gather relevant information and insights for content creation and industry trends.
Up-to-date knowledge of industry trends and best practices in user acquisition content strategies.
Strong communication and collaboration skills to work effectively with cross-functional teams, stakeholders, and external vendors.

title:
Consultant for video production and editing
- job post
description:
SCOPE OF WORK
Consultant for video production and editing
December 2023 – September 2024
1. BACKGROUND
PATH is awarded funding from the U.S. Agency for International Development (USAID) / Vietnam to implement the USAID/PATH “Support for Technical Excellence and Private Sector Sustainability in Vietnam” (STEPS) project over five years, from 2021 to 2026. The overall goal of this project is to increase market growth for private sector HIV goods and services that are capable of meeting the needs of populations facing the greatest HIV risks. In order to achieve this goal, STEPS and its partners focus on achieving outcomes linked to the following three objectives:
Objective 1: Strengthen total market for HIV commodities and services.
Objective 2: Increase operational and financial sustainability of social enterprise/private sector service providers.
Objective 3: Improve enabling environment to support private sector HIV-related goods and services as part of a sustainable national HIV response.
Under objective 2, STEPS supports marketing and capacity-building for its partners. There is a need to hire a consultant to support the production and editing of communication and education video clips.
2. SCOPE OF WORK
Number of working days: up to 40 days from December 2023 to September 2024. The consultant will support STEPS to produce and edit video clips. Key tasks are as follows:
Work with STEPS on the development of video scripts, storyboards, and technical aspects to produce complete videos that meet the project’s requirements of standards.
Design/draw graphics, animation, and transition to edit/refine existing video clips to increase their quality based on guidance from STEPS.
Others as discussed and agreed.
Activities and deliverables

Detailed deliverables

Timeline

Monthly deliverables and reports

End of each month

The closing date for application is December 4, 2022. Applicants should submit their application package to Ms. Khanh Le via email at kle@path.org
Job Details
Organisation Name:
PATH
Application Deadline:
Mon, 2023-12-04

Lập báo cáo tình hình kinh doanh, thị trường theo định kỳ và theo yêu cầu của Giám đốc. Đề xuất chính sách bán hàng, thu thập thông tin, phân tích và đề xuất loại sản phẩm, số lượng bán theo từng thời điểm, từng kênh bán để dòng sách triển khai kế hoạch
Giám sát việc thực hiện kế hoạch và đề xuất các giải pháp.
Nhận chỉ tiêu kinh doanh và lập kế hoạch kinh doanh để đáp ứng các chỉ tiêu doanh số đã được đặt ra hàng tháng/quý/năm;
Tìm kiếm, xây dựng và phát triển mạng lưới khách hàng mới và kênh bán mới
Quản lý và phát triển đội ngũ kinh doanh (nhân sự và CTV) đa kênh:
Các công việc khác do Giám đốc giao.
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC:
Có ít nhất 2 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương
Hoặc Có ít nhất 3 năm kinh nghiệm về lĩnh vực truyền thông, PR, marketing; uu tiên có kinh nghiệm triển khai các chiến dịch truyền thông sản phẩm mới và tổ chức sự kiện vừa và nhỏ
Chăm sóc và phát triển các mối quan hệ đối tác
Đàm phán và thuyết phục khách hàng.
Viết kế hoạch, triển khai và giám sát thực hiện chiến dịch truyền thông
Nhanh nhạy với công nghệ và các nền tảng mới
Tổ chức, sắp xếp công việc khoa học, hiệu quả;
Làm việc độc lập và theo nhóm, có trách nhiệm với công việc;
Diễn đạt tiếng Việt tốt, vốn từ phong phú;
Đọc hiểu tiếng Anh tốt, biết nhiều hơn một ngoại ngữ là lợi thế;
Biết tra cứu tài liệu và tìm kiếm thông tin hiệu quả;
QUYỀN LỢI:
Thu nhập từ 14.000.000 VND đến 20.000.000 VND (chưa tính doanh số)
Làm việc trong môi trường năng động, chuyên nghiệp, không gian làm việc mở, sáng tạo;
Có cơ hội mở mang tri thức, đọc sách không giới hạn;
Cơ hội đào tạo và thăng tiến;
Chế độ nghỉ phép theo luật, nghỉ phép thêm theo quy định công ty: 12 ngày nghỉ phép/năm, 02 ngày nghỉ du lịch/năm, 02 ngày nghỉ relax/năm;
Chế độ nghỉ mát, du lịch hàng năm (1-2 lần/ năm);
Thưởng tháng 13, thưởng doanh thu, thưởng cá nhân xuất sắc, vinh danh, lễ, tết;
Tăng lương định kỳ hàng năm;
Hoạt động ngoại khóa: sinh nhật, relax day, hoạt động thể thao; hiếu, hỉ, ốm đau…;
Các chế độ phúc lợi xã hội theo quy định của Luật lao động và chế độ riêng dành cho nhân viên của Công ty.

title:
Key Account Manager for Global Sports Brands
- job post
description:
At Henkel, you can build on a strong legacy and leading positions in both industrial and consumer businesses to reimagine and improve life every day. If you love challenging the status quo, join our community of over 50,000 pioneers around the globe. Our teams at Henkel Adhesive Technologies help to transform entire industries and provide our customers with a competitive advantage through adhesives, sealants and functional coatings. With our trusted brands, our cutting-edge technologies and our disruptive solutions, you will have countless opportunities to explore new paths and develop your skills. Grow within our future-led businesses, our diverse and vibrant culture and find a place where you simply belong. All to leave your mark for more sustainable growth.
Dare to make an impact?
YOUR ROLE
Strategic Planning: Develop and implement comprehensive strategies for Global Sports Brands focusing on footwear/shoe manufacturing, including identifying growth opportunities, establishing sales targets, and defining action plans to drive execution.
Execution Management: Drive the successful execution of account strategies by coordinating cross-functional teams, monitoring progress, and ensuring timely delivery of key milestones and objectives.
Results-Driven: Continuously monitor and analyze account performance against established targets, making data-driven decisions and adjustments to maximize results.
Professional Project Management: Utilize professional project management techniques to effectively plan, organize, and execute key account initiatives, ensuring efficient and successful project delivery.
Customer Relationship Management: Build and maintain strong relationships with key customers throughout the organization by regular communication, effective negotiation, and proactive problem-solving.
Collaboration: Work closely with internal teams such as sales, marketing, innovation, and application engineering to align account strategies with overall business goals and ensure seamless execution.
Negotiation: Lead negotiations from the front with an intelligent, highly strategic, and multi-faceted approach, utilizing your negotiation skills to achieve mutually beneficial outcomes and strengthen partnerships with key accounts.
Market Insights: Stay updated on market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to proactively identify opportunities for business growth and stay ahead of the competition.
Reporting and Analysis: Provide regular reports and analysis on account performance, market trends, and sales forecasts to management for strategic decision-making.
Leadership: Provide leadership and guidance to cross-functional teams, leveraging your expertise in setting strategies and driving execution plans to achieve business objectives.
Global Perspective: As a Global Key Account Manager, you will work with customers and teams across different countries and regions, requiring a global mindset and cultural sensitivity.
Work on Your Terms: Join our team and experience the benefit of working on your terms, with flexibility in work hours based on personal needs, without compromising productivity or performance.
Travel Opportunities: This role does involve occasional multi-week travel, which can be an exciting opportunity for those who enjoy exploring new places and cultures. However, we understand that travel may not be suitable for everyone, and we are open to discussing individual preferences and accommodating them to the best of our ability
Available to relocate to Asia (Southeast or East Asia).
YOUR SKILLS
Sales and Account Management: Strong sales and account management skills with a proven track record of achieving sales targets and driving revenue growth.
Customer Focus: Strong customer-centric mindset, with the ability to understand customer needs, build relationships, and provide solutions to meet their requirements.
Strategic Planning and Execution: Ability to develop and implement comprehensive strategies for key accounts, aligning them with overall business goals and driving successful execution through cross-functional teams.
Collaboration and Leadership: Strong collaboration skills to work with internal teams, provide leadership and guidance to cross-functional teams, and achieve business objectives.
Negotiation and Relationship Building: Excellent negotiation skills, ability to build and maintain strong relationships with key customers through effective communication and proactive problem-solving.
Communication and Presentation: Excellent communication skills, both written and verbal, with the ability to effectively communicate with key customers, internal teams, and management.
Flexibility and Adaptability: Ability to work in a fast-paced and dynamic environment, adapt to changing priorities, work effectively with colleagues from different countries in many different time zones, and be flexible in adjusting work hours, travel, and global travel as required.
Results-Orientation: Results-driven mindset with a focus on achieving and exceeding sales targets and driving business growth.
Market Insights and Analysis: Proactive in staying updated on market trends, competitor activities, and customer needs to identify opportunities for business growth and make data-driven decisions.
Technical Affinity: Aptitude for grasping technical concepts related to product development and manufacturing processes, with the ability to apply this understanding to global key account management. Science or engineering background is a plus.
Henkel is an equal opportunity employer. We evaluate qualified applicants without regard to gender, origin, culture, mindset, generation, disability, religion and sexual orientation.
JOB ID: 23056141
Contract & Job type: Full Time, Regular
Contact information for application-related questions: Recruitment.SEA@henkel.com
Please do not use this email address for sending your application or CV. To apply, please click on the "Apply Now" button below. Applications sent via e-mail will not be accepted.

title:
ALPHA BOOKS TRƯỞNG NHÓM MARKETING DÒNG SÁCH NGOẠI NGỮ
- job post

[Local Product] Product Marketing
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentEngineering and Technology
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Engineering and Technology team is at the core of the Shopee platform development. The team is made up of a group of passionate engineers from all over the world, striving to build the best systems with the most suitable technologies. Our engineers do not merely solve problems at hand; We build foundations for a long-lasting future. We don't limit ourselves on what we can or can't do; we take matters into our own hands even if it means drilling down to the bottom layer of the computing platform. Shopee's hyper-growing business scale has transformed most "innocent" problems into huge technical challenges, and there is no better place to experience it first-hand if you love technologies as much as we do.
Job Description:
Commercial Strategy Support:
Work closely with stakeholders to simplify technical information and create compelling value propositions.
Assist in developing and executing strategies to boost product adoption, engagement, and revenue growth.
Contribute to shaping product messaging, pricing, and market positioning using strategic insights.
New Feature Coordination:
Play a role in coordinating and ensuring smooth releases of new product features.
Assist in user acceptance testing to ensure new features align with specifications.
Support in planning and execution for impactful product launches
Performance Tracking & Analysis:
Help monitor product performance through basic data analysis, competitor research, and market insights.
Assist in identifying emerging opportunities and challenges for continuous product enhancements.
Contribute to maintaining our products as industry leaders by providing input for improvements.
Requirements:
Hold a Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business Administration, or a related field.
Have at least 1 years of experience, preferably in product marketing, focusing on technology.
Possess good communication skills to collaborate with teams and convey ideas effectively.
Show the ability to work effectively under pressure, focusing on shared goals.
Demonstrate a background in project management and successful project delivery.
Display a keen business sense, data-driven decision-making, and problem-solving skills.
Basic knowledge of SQL for basic data interaction and insights.

title:

description:

DepartmentMarketing
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)

Our Marketing teams conceptualise and implement go-to-market activities to achieve increased usage and visibility. The Regional Marketing team is responsible for in-app campaign planning, product marketing, partnerships and content strategy to drive acquisition and engagement. The Regional Brand and Growth Marketing team covers all aspects of online and performance marketing, which involve tracking and measuring data to better reach our users. Our local marketing teams work closely with the regional teams to localise and adapt strategies to increase brand awareness and acquisition in each market. Browse our Marketing team openings to see how you can make an impact with us.

Check, prioritize, and upload deals in a timely manner
Troubleshoot execution issues with regional Flash Sale and Product team
Analyze data, prepare presentation documents and reports
Other tasks assigned by the Reporting Manager.
Requirements:
Detailed- and result-oriented
Proactive and strong willingness to learn
Able to quickly adapt to a dynamic and fast-paced work environment
Functional data analysis skills and ability to do basic performance reports
Familiar with CMT/CFS tool
