title:
Seller Policy and Content Management Manager - Seller Operations Solutions, Shopee
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentOperations
LevelExperienced (Team Lead)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud.
About the Team:
The Seller Operation Solution (SOS) team focuses on various topics, with one goal in mind: To make the selling experience of sellers on Shopee to be as smooth and as positive as possible. To achieve this, SOS engages in studying and striving to understand what, why and how sellers are doing what they are doing and what they are not doing. Through this understanding, SOS monitors seller performance and develops solutions that enhance sellers’ performance. We provide guidance for improvement on seller operation processes (to fit with Shopee’s operation policies), coordinate with internal Shopee team to make feature development for sellers (to fit with demand of most sellers during their operation process), or even adjust policies which many sellers are struggling to meet.
Our ultimate goal is to bring the best selling and shopping experience to our customers.
Job Description:
Manage seller policies and seller management initiatives related to operations
Drive initiatives to improve user experience with focus on seller control and treatment, content management and listing processes
Take ownership to ensure platform contents’ compliance to brand standards, government regulations and community standards
Responsible for supervising and leading a large team consisting of both internal and external agents
Drive performance and ensure agent performance in terms of productivity and quality
Work closely with commercial teams to understand business focus and drive seller operations initiatives to support business objectives
Requirements:
7+ years of experience in a fast pace environment (consulting, tech, e-commerce) with at least 3 years of team management experience
Knowledge/ experience in e-commerce and operations is preferred
Strong interpersonal and problem solving skills, customer-oriented mindset
Able to drive insights and solutions from complex data and information, experienced working with numbers and presentation
Able to build strong professional relationships with both internal and external partners. Provide consistent, effective, and open communication, both verbal and written in English and Vietnamese

title:
Head of Digital Marketing
- job post
company: Amazon Corporate Services Vietnam Company Limited
description:
Bachelor degree required.
10+ years of experience in digital marketing with at least 5+ years in team management.
Strong oral and written communication skills in both English and Vietnamese.
Organized and detailed oriented.
Proven track record of developing and managing multiple marketing programs simultaneously.
Strong prioritization and time management skills, with a high degree of flexibility.
Experience managing online marketing strategy and execution on various online marketing channels including social media and website.
Deep understanding of major social media platforms including analytics and business management tools.
Familiarity with the B2B sales cycle and how to employ marketing communications strategies to nurture leads, drive adoption and accelerate growth.
Deep understanding of and passion for e-commerce.
Amazon Global Selling has been helping individuals and businesses increase sales and reach new customers around the globe. Our mission is to educate sellers how they can become successful sellers on Amazon, helps them understand the potential benefits to their business so that the seller can reach the world of customers through selling on Amazon. We would like to seek a highly motivated, customer focused, creative thinking, data driven and action-oriented professional to join our marketing team to drive the awareness of Amazon global selling with focus on Vietnamese prospects and selling partners.

The Head of Digital Marketing Manager will play a key role in scaling our outbound marketing efforts that will i) lead digital marketing team, ii) create and execute digital marketing campaigns that scale, implement best practices, utilize new tools and platforms to foster better customer experiences, iii) manage all the platforms and systems that allows our marketing partners to take an integrated omni-channel approach to scale our business and campaigns, executing more efficiently and effectively based on data and insight.

The ideal candidate for this role will take an analytical approach to problem solving, passionate and detail-oriented in the Marketing Technology and have a proven track record of executing strategic lead generation campaigns that drive new customer acquisition and generate pipeline Marketing channels will include email, SMS, ZNS, social (paid and organic), website, and other push channels.

Key job responsibilities
Lead Digital Marketing team.
Lead Paid and Organic digital media campaigns from planning to optimization and reporting.
Oversee intake and execution workflow for digital marketing and lead generation activities in partnership with cross-functional internal stakeholders.
Define, test and build new digital opportunities Lead Generation campaign.
Work with agencies and internal stakeholders to define seller awareness and engagement goals for online activities.
Keep track of updated content creation guidelines and resources, develop communication materials, review and seek approval ahead of deadlines.
Own digital content metrics and content development processes.
Manage online event calendar, budgets and sponsorships.
Build reports to provide visibility on online marketing results, effectiveness and conversions.
Find new and exciting ways to engage sellers via email, social media, website and CRM channels.
Identify and share best practices for audience targeting and email, tracking instrumentation and digital channels measurement.
Create and maintain detailed documentation including operational processes, workflows, and training documents.
Other tasks as required.
We are open to hiring candidates to work out of one of the following locations:

Hochiminhcity, VNM

Preferred qualifications
15+ years of experience in digital marketing with at least 7+ years in team management.
Experience in multi-channel marketing management.
Experience building, launching and reporting on campaigns using Salesforce or similar CRM tools.
Experience working in a fast-paced and multinational organization.
Global e-commerce experience.
Meets/exceeds Amazon’s leadership principles requirements for this role.

title:
Interested in becoming our fulltime freelancer?
- job post
description:
Anywhere!
Freelance
Location: You can work in our Vietnam office or remotely depending on our projects' requirements. Vietnam office: 3A Floor, VINA Building, 131 Xo Viet Nghe Tinh, Ward 17, District Binh Thanh, Ho Chi Minh City, Viet Nam.
Level of management: Experience
Job Information
We are always looking for talents to support our team and on-going projects.
Are you skilled as
Front-End Developer
Design Specialist
Medical Copywriter
QC (Quality Control)
and would like to freelance? Here are attractive opportunities
Front-End Developer
Position: Front-End Developer
About Us:
At Drcom, we’re on the lookout for a talented and experienced Front-End Developer to join our team. With over 2 years of experience in web development, you’ll have the opportunity to work on cutting-edge projects in a dynamic environment. If you’re passionate about web technologies and ready to collaborate on exciting ventures, we’d love to have you on board.
Key Responsibilities:
Develop and maintain websites with a primary focus on theme and user interface.
Implement high-performance, responsive & pixel perfect web designs.
Integrate front-end elements provided by our clients into applications.
Adhere to coding conventions and quality standards.
Requirements:
Proficiency in HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript.
Experience with the Vue.js framework. Experience with other frontend frameworks is highly desirable.
Strong understanding of front-end technologies & concepts.
Commitment to long-term cooperation.
If you’re a creative developer looking to make an impact, we invite you to apply and be part of our team.
Design Specialist
Position: Studio and Design Specialist
About Us:
At Drcom, we’re in search of a talented Design Specialist to join our team. As a Design Specialist, your role is crucial in ensuring high-quality design and print materials that meet our clients’ exacting standards. You’ll be responsible for crafting designs, layouts, and derivatives while maintaining the highest standards in printing processes.
Key Responsibilities:
Design and layout documents in a user-friendly and visually appealing manner.
Originate designs, create derivatives, and cascade designs as needed.
Edit and adjust existing documents to meet printing standards and parameters.
Supervise print production processes to ensure quality and precision.
Collaborate with the team to meet project objectives and deadlines.
Requirements:
Proficiency in graphic design software and tools.
Strong creative and visual design skills.
Ability to create and edit designs for print materials.
Knowledge of printing standards and quality control.
Familiarity with offset press processes is a plus.
Copywriting (Medical)
Position: Medical Copywriter
About Us:
Drcom is in search of a talented and experienced Medical Copywriter to contribute to our medical communication projects. If you have a background in healthcare and a passion for crafting precise and engaging medical content, we want to hear from you.
Key Responsibilities:
Create clear and compelling medical content for various audiences including health care professionals and patients/caregivers in various formats (e.g. e-detailing aids, Infographics, leave-behinds, video scripts and marketing communication materials)
Ensure accuracy and adherence to medical guidelines,industry regulations, and ethical standards.
Collaborate with medical professionals, subject matter experts, and the marketing team to develop content that meets the needs and goals of the job scope
Translate technical medical data into accessible, engaging content.
Requirements:
Strong background in medical or healthcare-related fields.
Excellent written communication skills.
Ability to conduct literature search and extract key communication messages, ensuring the accuracy and credibility of the content.
Flexibility in differentiating tonality, especially between medical experts and consumers.
Ability to explain complex medical concepts in a reader-friendly manner.
Familiarity with medical guidelines and terminology.
Manage multiple projects simultaneously, meet deadlines and maintain the quality of content.
Sample job: Deconstruct a core message in a print leave behind for XX brand, apply provided taxonomy and create a rep triggered email (marketing material sent to healthcare professional from a pharmaceutical sales representative)
If you think you are the right person for such a job task and can demonstrate your expertise in the area, we want to hear from you.
If you’re ready to make a meaningful impact through medical communication, and be a bridge between doctors and patients, we welcome your application.
QC (Quality Control)
Position: Quality Check Specialist
About Us:
Drcom is seeking a Quality Control Specialist to ensure the reliability and functionality of our software products. If you have a keen eye for detail, a passion for quality control and technology, and an understanding of digital asset development, we’d like you to join our team.
Key Responsibilities:
Execute meticulous quality control tasks to align with business specifications, including Word-for-Word checking, function testing, deploy test sample/packages to platforms for test, and bug reporting.
Efficiently manage your time to meet project deadlines while maintaining quality standards.
Demonstrate strong problem-solving skills to overcome challenges and ensure the desired quality standards.
Collaborate effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure seamless project execution.
Apply a comprehensive understanding of quality control standards to maintain the highest quality in the projects.
Utilize a strong knowledge of content and website development processes, including models and teams involved in these projects
Requirements:
Previous quality control experience is an advantage, showcasing a deep understanding of industry-specific requirements.
Possess good knowledge of tools used in quality control, including MS Office and various QC or AI tools.
Proven experience in quality control, preferably in content. Experience with technical projects is an advantage, but not necessary.
Strong portfolio demonstrating work in digital asset development.
Excellent problem-solving skills and attention to detail.
Proficiency in MS Office and relevant QC tools.
Knowledge of quality control standards.
Understanding of content and website development processes.
Experience in the medical media advertising field is a plus.
Effective communication and teamwork skills
If you’re dedicated to maintaining software quality and improving user experiences, we encourage you to apply for this role.
Send us a message together with your portfolio, we will come back to you soonest than you think.

title:
Product Specialist Representative
- job post
description:
Johnson& Johnson (VietNam)
Product Specialist Representative
The Product Specialist Representative is responsible for building relationships with key accounts and provides a clinical support majorly in VietNam. The position will develop business opportunities with the objective of leading the clinical support and migrating Biosense Webster new product for Account-based Business Plans. The role is also responsible for developing long-term positive customer relationships to build customer loyalty and confidence in Biosense Webter as a preferred supplier.
JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Achieve high levels of customer satisfaction through customer relationships, product support and services.
Provide a clinical support in Viet Nam majorly focus on 3D mapping procedure
Identify development opportunities and increase unit growth, profitability and market share for target customers.
Improve the efficiency and effectiveness of customer delivered health care services to patients through in-service education and training where appropriate.
Support sales, marketing and franchise teams and other Johnson & Johnson Medical business/functional unit members through a cooperative and constructive approach to sales meetings, internal company relationships, account development and the resolution of day-to-day business issues
Manage Account information through effective, timely reports and accurate customer records.
Continuously improve product knowledge and selling related skills to provide improved service to customers which differentiate Biosense Webster from competitors.
Work closely with marketing team in new product launch, clinical meetings & training.
Run Training for the EP Technician
Reporting on cases completed
To undertake any other duties or responsibilities deemed necessary, for the advancement of the Company
QUALIFICATIONS
REQUIREMENTS
Bachelor degree in Medical Technology or Biomedical Sciences
Nurses / EP tech with relevant experience in Electrophysiology
Must be willing to work long and irregular hours, including weekends.
Must be able to work under pressure
Strong, demonstrated leadership qualities, driven by a passion to excel in a customer-centric and innovative organization
Location: Ha Noi – Vietnam
Reporting: Direct report to Business Unit Manager
Expericence: Understand the equipment, operation, procedure supporting. Good knowledge in device, heart anatomy, analysis, communication & presentation skills.
All candidate who e opportunity with Johnson and Johnson, we also open opportunity to Vietnamese people whom graduate from oversea university willing to have good job in Vietnam

title:
Thực Tập Sinh Phòng Văn Hóa Và Truyền Thông Nội Bộ
- job post
company: Công ty Cổ phần Đầu tư K&G Việt Nam
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
1. Hỗ trợ công việc của bộ phận
1.1 Khai thác nội dung và viết bài truyền thông nội bộ:
Tìm hiểu, nắm bắt thông tin và nội dung cần thiết để viết bài truyền thông nội bộ.
Tham gia vào quá trình biên tập, chỉnh sửa, và lên ý tưởng cho các nội dung truyền thông.
1.2 Quản trị các kênh truyền thông nội bộ:
Hỗ trợ quản lý và cập nhật các kênh truyền thông nội bộ như intranet, email, bảng tin, v.v.
Tham gia vào việc tạo nội dung cho các kênh truyền thông và đảm bảo tính liên tục và hiệu quả của chúng.
1.3 Tổ chức các chương trình, sự kiện nội bộ:
Hỗ trợ trong việc lên kế hoạch và tổ chức các chương trình, sự kiện nội bộ như hội thảo, buổi gặp mặt, hay các hoạt động gắn kết nhóm.
1.4 Các công việc khác của bộ phận trong khả năng:
Tham gia vào các hoạt động và dự án khác theo yêu cầu của bộ phận, đảm bảo hoàn thành nhiệm vụ được giao một cách hiệu quả.
2. Báo cáo:
2.1 Báo cáo tiến trình và kết quả thực hiện công việc định kỳ:
Lập báo cáo hàng ngày, hàng tuần, hoặc theo lịch trình đã được quy định, bao gồm tiến độ công việc, khó khăn gặp phải và đề xuất giải pháp.
2.2 Báo cáo thu hoạch định kỳ:
Tổ chức và tham gia vào quá trình báo cáo tổng kết định kỳ về hoạt động, kết quả, và hiệu quả công việc đã thực hiện trong thời gian nhất định.
Chức vụ: Thực Tập Sinh
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Thời gian làm việc T2-T6 , có hỗ trợ thời gian nếu sinh viên còn lịch học trên trường
Hỗ trợ gửi xe tại công ty.
Được đào tạo và học hỏi làm văn hóa và truyền thông của 1 đơn vị chuyên nghiệp
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Cao Đẳng
Yêu cầu công việc:
Sinh viên đang theo học hoặc mới tốt nghiệp ngành Văn hóa, Truyền thông, Marketing, Quan hệ công chúng hoặc các ngành liên quan.
Hiểu biết cơ bản về lĩnh vực văn hóa tổ chức, truyền thông nội bộ và quan hệ công chúng.
Khả năng viết và biên tập nội dung truyền thông một cách rõ ràng, chính xác và hấp dẫn.
Kỹ năng tổ chức, quản lý thời gian và làm việc nhóm tốt.
Khả năng làm việc với đồng nghiệp và các bộ phận khác trong tổ chức một cách hiệu quả.
Có khả năng thích ứng nhanh chóng với thay đổi và làm việc hiệu quả trong môi trường động.
Sáng tạo, có khả năng đề xuất ý tưởng mới và cách tiếp cận sáng tạo trong công việc.
Sẵn sàng học hỏi, cải thiện bản thân và phát triển sự nghiệp trong lĩnh vực Văn hóa và Truyền thông nội bộ.
Thành thạo vi tính văn phòng (Word, Excel, PowerPoint).
Kiến thức về các công cụ truyền thông, quản lý nội dung (CMS), và mạng xã hội là một lợi thế.
Thời gian làm việc T2-T6 , có hỗ trợ thời gian nếu sinh viên còn lịch học trên trường
Hỗ trợ gửi xe tại công ty.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Sự Kiện,Truyền Thông/Báo Chí,Truyền Thông/PR

title:
Retail Manager
- job post
description:
Job Description
2023 will potentially see Sandoz become a standalone organization! Already a global market leader in Generics and Biosimilar medicine, this is an exciting, once-in-a-career opportunity to set our own path forward as an independent, purpose-driven organization, and as the founders of a new Sandoz, this is a time of immense opportunity for us all, both professionally and personally!
Together we will shape the future of Sandoz… are you ready to make a difference?
As a Retail Manager, you will take responsible for development and execution of strong trade business plans and integrated trade programs for retail pharmacy channel to drive business growth and expansion as well as key contact point with the pharmacy dedicated team of Distributor, management of the performance of Retail Business to achieve the identified objectives and that enhance patient assess.

Your Responsibilities:

Lead business development, account and brand penetration efforts in assigned trade/retail channels through portfolio management and product inclusion/listing.
Propose an annual trade/retail pharmacy channel strategic plan with strategic imperatives, trade programs, and trade terms.
Plan and align on a business approach and dual strategies with trade customers that meet both parties' objectives.
Perform as the key contact point with the pharmacy dedicated team of Distributors and closely follow-up to ensure their performance delivery.
Organize regular business reviews with Key Accounts/Customers to supervise the execution of strategies and programs/activities and achievement of defined KPIs.
Initiate and implement marketing opportunities for Retail Business to enhance trade partnership and reinforce category captainship to enhance brand growth potential.
Coordinate, control, and supervise the implementation of all sales promotion materials and merchandising activity through both the Key Accounts and General Trade.
Understand customer profiles and brand strategies to lead the development of channel promotion and new product launch plans and ensure effective execution; Manage promotion efficiency by ensuring continuous improvement through cost improvement projects and handling forecast for promo packs and whole portfolios.
Develop and maintain purchase plans if applicable to manage inventory and regularly work with Supply Chain to monitor SIT.
Initiate and develop in-store merchandising that best fits store format and shopper profile for effective in-store brand visibility and ensure merchandising excellence.

[#video#https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=5_RZsoOZv5c{#300,200#}#/video#]

#SANDOZ
Diversity and Inclusion
We are committed to building an outstanding, inclusive work environment and diverse teams representative of the patients and communities we serve.
Minimum Requirements
What you’ll bring to the role:

Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or related field
3-4 years of experience in customer-facing roles, such as trade account management (experience in the Pharma industry is a plus)
Strong analytical and influential skills, with the ability to draw conclusions from data Strong presentation, selling, and negotiating skills
Ability to translate market intelligence and related information into actionable business strategies and decisions
Good understanding of the generics market and customer potential Strong leadership potential; customer-oriented; great teammate; self-starting
Fluent in Vietnamese and English

Why Sandoz?

453 million patients were touched by Sandoz generic and biosimilar medicines in 2022 and while we’re proud of this, we know there is more we could do to continue to help pioneer access to medicines for people around the world.

How will we do this? We believe new insights, perspectives and ground-breaking solutions can be found at the intersection of medical science and digital innovation. That a diverse, equitable and inclusive environment inspires new ways of working.

We believe our potential can thrive and grow in an unbossed culture underpinned by integrity, curiosity and flexibility. And we can reinvent what's possible, when we collaborate with courage to aggressively and ambitiously tackle the world’s toughest medical challenges. Because the greatest risk in life, is the risk of never trying!

Imagine what you could do here at Sandoz!
Division
SANDOZ
Business Unit
Commercial OPS SIR SZ
Location
Vietnam
Site
Ho Chi Minh City
Company/Legal Entity
NVS Vietnam Company Limited
Functional Area
Marketing
Job Type
Full Time
Employment Type
Regular
Shift Work
No

title:
Regional Field Operation Manager
- job post
description:
Kimberly-Clark (NYSE: KMB) and its trusted brands are an indispensable part of life for people in more than 175 countries. Fueled by ingenuity, creativity, and an understanding of people’s most essential needs, we create products that help individuals experience more of what’s important to them.
Our portfolio of brands, including Huggies, Kleenex, Scott, Kotex, Cottonelle, Poise, Depend, Andrex, Pull-Ups, GoodNites, Intimus, Neve, Plenitud, Viva and WypAll, hold the No. 1 or No. 2 share position in 80 countries. We use sustainable practices that support a healthy planet, build stronger communities, and ensure our business thrives for decades to come.
Position Purpose
The primary purpose of this role is to serve as Regional Field Operations Manager as a part of the Operations organization you will manage the Area Supervisors to deploy, track and follow up with the implementation/execution requirement in line with operations guidelines for each account to ensure highest efficiency in stores.
Expectations
This role will be based in Vietnam and will Implement operational guidelines KPI to all customers store and have clear tracking schedule and reporting
Have root-cause learning analysis and improvement proposal
Help to Improve in-store execution process and staff’s productivity
Assist in Improving in-store brand image
Qualitative and quantitative of merchandising vs marketing plan
Periodically checking stock inventory in assigned stores
Consistently updating the relevant departments on the latest activities from competitors in stores
Provide coaching and guidance to the team and ensure all operation guidelines are being covered
Continuously improving the team and ensuring that the team is working with committed spirit
Qualifications/Education/Experience Required
This position requires a minimum of 3 years’ experience in sales operations preferably in FMCG or Retail industry
Bilingual in English and Vietnamese as this role will be facing off to Vietnamese clients and customers
Exposure using MS Office (word, excel, ppt)
Good communication skills (both oral and writing)
Solid execution and implementation skills
Sound Inter-personal skills
Strong interpersonal skill
Bilingual in English and Vietnamese as this role will be facing off to Vietnamese clients and customers
Exposure using MS Office (word, excel, ppt)
For Kimberly-Clark to grow and prosper, we must be an inclusive organization that applies the diverse experiences and passions of its team members to brands that make life better for people all around the world. We actively seek to build a workforce that reflects the experiences of our consumers. When you bring your original thinking to Kimberly-Clark, you fuel the continued success of our enterprise. We are a committed equal opportunity employer and all qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, pregnancy, genetic information, citizenship status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
The statements above are intended to describe the general nature and level of work performed by employees assigned to this classification. Statements are not intended to be construed as an exhaustive list of all duties, responsibilities and skills required for this position.
K-C requires that an employee have authorization to work in the country in which the role is based. In the event an applicant does not have current work authorization, K-C will determine, in its sole discretion, whether to sponsor an individual for work authorization. However, based on immigration requirements, not all roles are suitable for sponsorship.
This position is subject to drug and alcohol testing, including pre-employment testing.

title:
Junior/Senior Strategic Planner
- job post
description:
1. Nhận đề bài và tư vấn:
Tham gia nghiên cứu và tìm giải pháp cho đề bài IMC, thẩm định ý tưởng, concept của các hoạt động truyền thông, marketing.
Nghiên cứu, phân tích và đánh giá nhu cầu khách hàng tiềm năng, dự án tiềm năng, tiếp cận và đề xuất những kế hoạch truyền thông phù hợp nhu cầu khách hàng.
Đóng vai trò chính trong các buổi pitching thuyết phục khách hàng.

2. Lập kế hoạch truyền thông:
Xây dựng và phát triển ý tưởng chiến dịch, dự án truyền thông, marketing theo nhu cầu của công ty hoặc của nhãn hàng.
Xây dựng kế hoạch triển khai ý tưởng, dự án truyền thông, kế hoạch marketing, branding.
Khảo sát thông tin về nhu cầu và ngân sách truyền thông, quảng cáo của khách hàng (nắm rõ briefs từ khách hàng)
Kết nối các bộ phận sản phẩm liên quan, dẫn dắt làm rõ đề bài, ghi nhận đề xuất và chốt các công việc phải thực hiện, cung cấp thời gian thực hiện các hoạt động.
Đánh giá ngân sách của khách hàng, phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan để lên Báo giá, việc lên Báo giá thực hiện song song với việc xây dựng proposal.
Quản lý chiến dịch truyền thông, quảng cáo
Tham gia điều phối, giám sát chiến dịch truyền thông theo kế hoạch và hợp đồng đã thống nhất.
Thực hiện những công việc khác từ yêu cầu của người quản lý trực tiếp

III.YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC

Tốt nghiệp Đại học, trên 1 năm kinh nghiệm ở vị trí tương đương, ưu tiên từng làm tại Agency
Tư duy sáng tạo, kết hợp nhạy bén ý tưởng với các sản phẩm của công ty trong từng chiến dịch quảng cáo.
Có khả năng tổng hợp và phân tích vấn đề, teamworks, giao tiếp và trình bày tốt.
Thành thạo tin học văn phòng và các phần mềm liên quan đến công việc.
Có tinh thần trách nhiệm và khả năng làm việc ngoài giờ khi có yêu cầu.

IV.QUYỀN LỢI

Thoải mái sáng tạo trên từng mm
Đồng nghiệp như người nhà cực kỳ vui tính, thân thiện, 99,9% là dân 9X
Tham gia các khóa đào tạo chuyên môn, nâng cao nghiệp vụ
Chế độ BHXH-BHYT, 12 ngày phép 1 năm, du lịch trong và ngoài nước, và các chế độ khác theo quy định của pháp luật
Môi trường làm việc: KHÔNG đồng phục, KHÔNG cấp bậc
Trang thiết bị: Được cung cấp các trang thiết bị hiện đại cần thiết để nâng cao hiệu quả làm việc

V.ỨNG TUYỂN

Email: talents@admicro.vn

title:
Content Strategist
- job post
description:
Job Title: Content Strategist
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam

A LITTLE BIT ABOUT THE ROLE:
We are looking for a content strategist to be part of a dynamic onsite content team. The person must be confident in all things content and passionate about the world of FMCG especially Beauty Personal Care brands like Pond's, Clear, Dove and Lux brands to join our onsite agency team (U-Studio) at Unilever Vietnam office.
You are someone who lives and breathes digital and has your finger on the pulse of the latest and emerging behaviors around social, e-commerce and content and which brands are leading the way in the FMCG space.
This is a key role within our onsite (U-Studio) team and will provide consumer and market insight, inspiration and strategic direction for some of the region and world's leading Brands under the Beauty Personal Care category.
The Content Strategist will work closely with the content team leader and lead creators. This is a client facing role, where you will be expected to be comfortable working closely with client brand team, central marketing teams and client agency partners.
This is an exciting opportunity for a truly curious and entrepreneur thinker to be part of a rewarding partnership between Oliver and Unilever who have established a truly global footprint of U-Studios.

WHAT YOU WILL BE DOING (Role Responsibilities):
Core function:
Content Strategy - Develop insights and strategic response to briefs - Campaigns, Interruptive or Needs Based Content and New Product Development
Champion and drive a 'mobile first' and short-form content agenda in line with Unilever Best Practice
Help evaluate ideas and concepts against Unilever best practice, strategy frameworks and mobile first
Help establish effective 'ways of working' with U-Studio, Unilever internal teams and specialist partners
Act as a content expert and advocate within U-Studio, working with colleagues and clients a subject matter expert
Advise clients and colleagues on approaches to effective Content Strategies that inform content briefs and requirements
Assess, develop and implement effective content strategies to meet client briefs across all necessary touchpoints
Manage and facilitate stakeholder engagement sessions and workshops on all aspects of content collaborating directly with client teams and specialist partners (including Search, Social, Media, CRM, Ecommerce, Content and Data)
Be a facilitator for 'right first time content' ensuring that we have the right insights and collaborations to direct content development
A driver of scalable content effectiveness leveraging learnings gained by Unilever 'Insight' teams (CMI – PDC) and specialist partners.
Work with Unilever's internal insight functions (CMI - PDC) to develop relevant measurement approaches and frameworks to ensure effectiveness is appropriately defined and tracked.
Responsibilities:
The Content Strategist is a core function of U-Studio for the development of best in class content and multi-channel activity
Responsible for the development of 'best in class' content and strategies informed by consumer, category, channel and performance insights supplied by Unilever internal Insight teams and relevant special partners
Owner of Best Practice Case Studies which showcase Unilever's Global approach to content
Tools and Reports:
Where relevant and necessary to gain an initial understanding of consumer, category or channel learning to inform early thinking. This will be done through access to a combination of Unilever Insight tools and reports under the guidance of Unilever Insight teams
Collaboration:
The Content Strategist will help develop briefs and give agency briefings collaborating with Unilever central, brand, Insight media and agency partner teams
Audience targeting o User Experience o Customer Journey o Content Strategy o Editorial Calendars Content Calendars o Content Guidelines o Distribution Strategy
The Content Strategist will work together with brand teams to help craft the right brief for the defined job to be done; including one-to-one meetings and larger working sessions, as well as check-in sessions with brand teams
Best Practice:
The Content Strategist will drive a 'Best Practice' approach to content and overall strategic quality assurance of content created within the U-Studio. This will be in line with Unilever global guidance, global platforms and partners
The Content Strategist will work with Unilever Insight team and specialist partners to support a 'test and learn' approach to content strategy, ensuring 'effectiveness' is a key tenant baked into all content marketing activity through the clear definition of KPI's and metrics aligned with the projects measurement approach
Ways of Working:
The Content Strategist to work within the Unilever collaboration models to ensure effective and efficient working with all relevant Unilever teams and partners

WHAT YOU WILL NEED TO BE GREAT IN THIS ROLE (Required Exp, Soft & hard skills)
Knowledge & Skills Required:
Minimum 1-2 years' experience in a Strategy role with Content Strategy a core function
Strong understanding of Content Marketing (Social, Mobile, Search, Display, Dotcom, Ecom, Digital OHH)
Strong understanding of Content: Formats, Performance, Testing, Optimisation and Search (SEM-SEO)
Strong understanding of Content Publishing and Distribution methods and technologies
Ability to understand and interpretative multi-channel insight reports
Be able to present and justify work based on robust 'insights'
Passionate about all things related to Content, with a keen interest in keeping up to date with trends and technological advances
Proven experience of working in a multi-stakeholder environment
A self-starter, able to work in fast paced environment as within a collaborative and agile team structure
Excellent verbal communication and presentation skills
Previous experience of FMCG in particular (Personal Care / Skincare)
Personal attributes:
Confidence and comfortable working in a fast-paced, changing client environment
Desire to learn and continuously improve
Able to develop and maintain strong and effective professional relationships with a diverse range of stakeholders
Collaborative team player, open minded – non political.
Proven ability to effectively lead creative teams.
Proven ability to communicate and liaise with all levels in the business.
Discrete about all confidential and personal information.
Driven, proactive, helpful, and enthusiastic team player.
In essence we're looking for someone with the spark of creativity that makes a good analyst excellent.

A LITTLE BIT ABOUT US:
OLIVER provides clients with dedicated agencies. We do this because we believe the traditional agency model is not fit for the speed of modern marketing. Businesses want, and rightly demand, the same quality of strategic and creative thinking the traditional agency provides, but at a speed that befits how they now work.
The traditional agency outside-in model means that huge quantities of time are wasted in the back and forth and linear processes between agencies and clients. OLIVER agencies come to the client, live inside their office and solve their problems collaboratively.
OLIVER agencies are strategic and creative, whilst being agile and adaptive. They cover the full range of integrated marketing, but at the speed that businesses now demand. We allow our clients to work in real time. Creating better work, at pace.

OUR VALUES AND HOW TO LIVE THEM:
Ambition – you look for opportunities to deliver greater value to those around you.
Imagination – you identify a range of solutions to problems.
Inclusion – to be actively pro-inclusive and anti-racist across our community, clients and creations.
Inspiration – you lead by example and encourage others to do the same.
Learning – you have excellent listening skills that helps you to learn from our clients and those around you.
Results – you accept responsibility for your actions.
We've set ambitious, market-leading environmental and social goals around sustainability at OLIVER. We have committed to be net zero by 2030 and take far reaching action on DE&I in the sector. We expect everyone to contribute to our mission, embedding sustainability into every department and through every stage of the project lifecycle.
Inside Ideas Group and its' affiliates are equal opportunity employers committed to creating an inclusive working environment where all our employees are encouraged to reach their full potential, and individual differences are valued and respected. All [suitable] applicants shall be considered for employment without regard to race, ethnicity, religion, gender, sexual orientation, gender identity, age, neurodiversity, disability status, or any other characteristic protected by local laws.

title:
Global Outperformer Management Development Program - Business Track
- job post
description:
We’re looking for the next generation of high-performing, multi-lingual, post-graduate talent to take our company forward. Hilti Outperformer is a global management development program like no other, with real responsibility from day one.
If you’re new to the industry, you might not have heard of us. We provide leading-edge tools, technologies, software and services for the global construction sector. We have a proud heritage, built over 75 years, and a worldwide reputation for pioneering products and exceptional service.

With 30,000 people in more than 120 countries, which we’re looking to expand, we’re a great place for you to show us your worth, step up to new challenges and grow your career.
Hilti Outperformer
is a two-year program, where you’ll quickly be involved in a range of international projects, with lots of exposure to senior management. It’s fast paced and challenging, but we’ll closely coach and mentor you. The program is split into four main stages of work:


12 months as an account manager or field engineer in the country where you apply.
3 months on an operational project in national headquarters. It could be logistics, HR, finance, marketing or engineering.
6 months on a strategic project in the
regional headquarters (Singapore)
3 months on a strategic project outside the region of South Asia Pacific
80% of our management positions are filled with internal candidates. It’s testament to how much we value, develop and look after our people.
Show us what you’re made of and we’ll offer you opportunities to move around the business – to work abroad, experience different job functions and tackle different markets. It’s a great way to find the right match for your ambitions and achieve the exciting career you’re after.

We have a very thorough people review process, unlike any we know of in any other business. We screen everyone in the company in a yearly career performance matching process. It means we can pair talent with opportunities - developing our people in their current roles or challenging them to work in new ways or in new places. It’s how we find the right fit and further our teams personally and professionally.

Additionally, we offer you a competitive salary and a wide range of benefits, including training opportunities and very good health care plan.
You’ve recently graduated, or you’re preparing to graduate, with a master’s degree or PhD. Your degree is likely to be in business management or engineering, but we’ll consider subjects like economics, politics or international studies if you can prove you have a mind for our business.
You’ve spent at least three months, and up to two years, in a professional environment, like an internship, apprenticeship or work experience, or have just started your career and want an opportunity where you can perform well and progress.
You’re multilingual – fluent in English plus another language or two – and you’ve gained international experience during your work or studies.
You’re mature and assertive, curious and committed.
You’re a flexible team player with good communication and social skills.
You’re a global thinker, keen for intercultural experiences and opportunities working abroad.
Show us what you can do and, in return, we promise you the experience of a lifetime, the opportunity to work internationally, and a fast-track career in global senior management. You’ll also take part in some fascinating courses and events:


Leadership development program – a comprehensive learning journey with IMD business school in Lausanne, Switzerland, with a qualification from IMD.
Business management training – individual training at Hilti. A focus on behavioral profiles, personal strengths, leadership styles and communication skills.
Global summit – 4-5 days at our global headquarters in Liechtenstein. A look at
the way global business units function, plus soft skills like situational leadership and
international teamwork.
Social project– 7-8 days ‘building a better future’. A hands-on and hugely impactful community project, like our recent
house building for displaced refugees in Bosnia.
As part of your interview process, we’ll take you on a day-in-the-life ‘field ride’ to give you a feel for our business and the caliber of our people.
Tempted to apply or find out more? Go to https://outperformer.hilti.group/

title:
Content Marketing
- job post
description:
This is a remote position.
As a Content Writer, you will play a pivotal role in creating engaging and informative content that aligns with our brand and resonates with our audience.


Research and produce insightful content on a variety of technical topics, including software, hardware, cybersecurity, artificial intelligence, cloud computing, and more.
Create engaging blog posts, articles, whitepapers, case studies, and other content formats that resonate with both technical and non-technical audiences.
Conduct thorough research to ensure accuracy and credibility of information presented in the content.
Craft clear and concise content that effectively communicates complex technical concepts in a user-friendly manner.
Work closely with subject matter experts to gather information and insights for content creation.
Adapt writing style and tone to align with brand voice and target audience.
Stay up-to-date with the latest technology trends and developments to infuse fresh insights into content.



Benefits
Successful completion of the initial test will be compensated with USD 43.
Upon passing the test, writers will be offered a 3-month contract with Sunbytes.
Writing per package (1 blog post and 2 social posts) will be compensated at USD 43 per package
Additional compensation of USD 0.05 per word for articles exceeding 700 words.
Maximum of 3 revisions for final work; subsequent revisions will cost USD 25 per revision.
Writing per collateral (white paper, brochure, infographic,...) will be compensated at USD 0.05/word
Maximum of 3 revisions for final work; subsequent revisions will cost USD 0.07/word

Proven experience as a Content Writer with a strong portfolio of tech-focused content. Excellent command of English with impeccable grammar and writing skills. In-depth knowledge of technology trends, terminology, and concepts. Ability to explain complex technical subjects in a clear and accessible manner. Strong research skills to gather accurate and up-to-date information. Familiarity with SEO principles and best practices for online content. Attention to detail and commitment to producing error-free content. Time management skills to meet deadlines and manage multiple projects.

title:

- job post
description:
At Bayer we’re visionaries, driven to solve the world’s toughest challenges and striving for a world where ,Health for all, Hunger for none’ is no longer a dream, but a real possibility. We’re doing it with energy, curiosity and sheer dedication, always learning from unique perspectives of those around us, expanding our thinking, growing our capabilities and redefining ‘impossible’. There are so many reasons to join us. If you’re hungry to build a varied and meaningful career in a community of brilliant and diverse minds to make a real difference, there’s only one choice.

Medical Representative - Women Healthcare product ETC

YOUR TASKS AND RESPONSIBILITIES

Achieve sales, volume, growth, market share and listing targets for assigned brands.
Plan, orchestrate and execute HCP engagements, aligned with MCCP by tailored Patient Focused Interactions using right content based on HCP needs & priorities.
Report customer engagement activities in Veeva CRM and take advantage of all available functionality for enhancing customer interaction and experiences.
Monitor and communicate competition activity to Managers (FLSM, Management) to reflect market dynamics and potential counteracts.
Organize/Set-up regular scientific updates (e.g., CME, Scientific meetings) for HCP groups in alignment with defined marketing strategies.
Self-develop on latest medical/clinical knowledge, brand strategy and tactics, competitive landscape, and standard platforms in order to challenge the status quo.
Collaborate with and provide feedback to Sales/Marketing on MCCP strategies and tactics and identify potential new sources of business.
Comply with local regulations, industry, and company policies and code of conduct.

WHO YOU ARE

Minimum 2 – 3 years of pharmaceutical sales experience with a demonstrated performance track record
Strong interpersonal, communication and team skills
IT literacy (basic knowledge and skills to utilize computers/tablets and related technology efficiently)
Excellent command (both oral and written) of local native language.
English language skills are a plus.
Energetic, Enthusiastic, self-driven, organized & willing to work extensively in field.


Local regulations and legal requirements vary per country of hire and will be discussed with considered candidates individually based on their potential of hire.

title:
Senior Associate, Project Management - Content Solutions, Shopee
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentOperations
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud.
About the Team:
We are currently seeking highly motivated and experienced professionals to join our Content Solutions Team. Content Solutions drive projects and ideas to help improve listing experience and unblock product opportunities on Shopee. This is an exciting role to collaborate with cross-functional teams, influence strategic decision-making, and drive the successful execution of projects from idea initiation to completion.
Job Description:
Project Planning and Execution:
Develop comprehensive project plans, including scope, objectives, deliverables, timelines, and resource allocation.
Coordinate and facilitate project kickoff meetings, ensuring clear communication of project goals, roles, and responsibilities.
Monitor project progress, proactively identify and address potential roadblocks, and implement corrective measures as necessary.
Collaborate with the Business Intelligence (BI) team to execute data analysis, extracting meaningful insights to inform business decision-making.
Document project-related information appropriately, including progress, milestones, lessons learned, best practices, and recommendations for future projects.
2. Unblock Potential Products/ New Category Opportunities:
Identify opportunities for listing policy improvement by conducting a comprehensive analysis of impacted listings, identifying the root causes for the listing performance.
Identify new category opportunities by closely collaborating with Commercial-side teams and monitoring market trends to improve platform’s assortment and maximizing commercial potential while complying industry/government regulations.
Collaborate with functional teams to unblock obstacles and drive the successful execution of new category launch/policy improvement, ensuring alignment with business goals and user experience.
3. Evaluate and Enhance Efficiency:
Collaborate with internal stakeholders to assess the effectiveness and efficiency of existing processes and policies related to overall platform’s listing quality control.
Identify areas for improvement and develop strategies to optimize workflows, streamline processes, and enhance overall seller/user experience.
Serve as a subject matter expert on seller listing behavior, providing valuable insights for seller communication design, UI/UX, recovery strategies, and continuous improvement initiatives.
Requirements:
Experience working in a fast-paced environment.
Proven experience in project management, process optimization, and stakeholder management.
Strong communication and presentation skills, with the ability to effectively convey complex information to diverse audiences.
Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret user data and derive actionable insights.
Proactive mindset with a focus on tracking project progress, monitoring KPIs, and ensuring adherence to timelines.
Ability to work collaboratively in a cross-functional environment, fostering positive relationships and influencing key stakeholders.

title:
HCM – Marketing Brand Communication & Partnership Specialist (6 months)
- job post
description:
About Vexere
Vexere is a technology company aiming to revolutionize the travel and transportation industry in Vietnam. Today Vexere is the largest online bus ticketing platform helping millions of travelers to make their lifetime journey happier.
Vexere members believe that an organization is born to solve pressing problems in society. Company culture focuses on community spirit and mutual support. All Vexere members are always given the opportunity to express themselves, contribute ideas on products and strategies, and aim to become future leaders.
The future image that Vexere is trying to realize is a constantly growing and creative business with a strong culture of learning and development, aspiration to apply technology strengths to continue the revolution in the transportation industry and tourism sectors throughout Southeast Asia.
Vexere is looking for a Partnership & Brand communication specialist in the HCM Office to build and deploy marketing campaigns. While working here, you will have the opportunity to be involved in a project that will solve the problems millions of Vietnamese are facing.
Your responsibilities
Responsible for partnership development strategy and execution to grow sale and drive new business opportunities.
Reaching out to potential clients to sell vouchers, collaborate across-marketing, promotion, select payment gateway services…and maintain positive long-term relationships
Analyze and negotiate payment gateway fees and contracts for business
Identify and develop new business opportunities
Coordinate with internal & external stakeholders to track, manage performance business and brand
Be in charge of communication activities to enhance brand awareness, trust, health.
Research and analyze market, customer trends and competitor to propose new initiatives
Build plan and implement PR, activation, events, branding activities BTL, ATL, OOH
Create plan and implement influencers activities: develop creative campaign, booking, work with agency, KOL,…to deliver brand message and product USP
Closely work with internal & external stakeholders to ensure high-quality delivery of communication campaign and make sure all materials are consistent with brand positioning, brand image, guideline, product USP
Create templates to collect and analyze data, track and monitor performance, budget
Conduct research to measure and monitor brand health and awareness
Experience Required skills
At least 2 – 3 years of experience in mar-com activities, planning & running marketing campaigns (Branding & Promotion campaigns),
Good working knowledge of various marketing channels
Strong project management & communication skills
Strong analytical, negotiation and problem-solving skills
Excellent logical skill, creative, proactive
Benefits
Competitive salary + KPI-based quarterly bonuses (up to 2 months per quarter).
Annual General Health Check

title:
Communication Expert
- job post
description:
Vietnam Digital Trade
SCOPE OF WORK
Communication Expert
Position: STTA Communication expert
Reports to: USAID Vietnam Digital Trade Activity Director
Location: USAID VDT Office in Hanoi
Eligibility: Vietnamese Nationals
LOE: (STTA part time): 40 days
Period of Performance: November 2023- April 2025
International Development Group LLC is an international development consulting firm that assists donors, governments, and the private sector to create and take advantage of opportunities for sustainable, broad-based economic development and poverty reduction. IDG provides entrepreneurs and policymakers with the practical tools needed to achieve real and measurable impact for their communities and countries. IDG assistance programs aim to build the capacity, skills, and knowledge of local individuals and institutions in the public, private, and not-for-profit sectors, fostering synergies between local knowledge and international experience.
Position Description
IDG is seeking qualified candidates for the role of Communication expert on USAID Vietnam Digital Trade (VDT) activity. USAID VDT activity supports the Ministry of Industry and Trade’s (MOIT) implementation of frameworks that facilitate digital trade, with an emphasis on supporting MOIT in holding public-private dialogues to ensure implementation is done in consultation with the private sector. Regulations that are responsive to private sector needs remove bottlenecks in trade faced by enterprises and increase regulatory transparency, helping to shape an e-commerce sector where enterprises of all sizes can benefit. The activity encourages the participation of small and medium enterprises (SMEs) in digital trade by introducing new business models and other best practices, such as traceability of goods, as well as facilitating cross-border connections between enterprises via MOIT’s digital trade promotion platform.
The Communications Expert, a part-time role within the activity, serves as a link between key stakeholders and the activity team. The main responsibilities of the Communications expert encompass designing and executing communication strategies focusing on local stakeholders, monitoring local media coverage, drafting press releases in Vietnamese language, and crafting other relevant content for various channels. The Communications Expert is responsible for gathering information from the activity team useful as input for weekly reports.
Key Tasks/Responsibilities/Deliverables:
The Communication expert will be responsible in supporting the VDT team for the following:
Work closely with the VDT team (Activity Director and Senior Legal and Regulatory Expert) to serve as the primary liaison with local stakeholder groups.
Provide input in designing and implementation of major communications action plans, specific outreach campaigns, production and content updating of major Program communications channels and materials (printed and online).
Monitor local media coverage and provide summaries on main messages covered by the media.
Draft press-releases in Vietnamese, and compile and update media kit.
Draft and design texts, graphics, and visuals for Program communications in Vietnamese language.
Ensure photo coverage, audio, and video recording of major Program events (when appropriate).
Contribute to Annual Work Plans with a focus on crafting messages for the public sector and private sector.
Develop a simplified strategic communication strategy targeting relevant stakeholders of the activity. The communication plan will promote information for furthering the engagement of the private sector with digital trade.
Undertake other tasks as assigned by the VDT Director
Qualifications
The Communications expert should have the following qualifications:
Bachelor’s degree (preferably in social sciences, communications/marketing, international relations, international development, or related fields)
Five (5) years of work experience in communication activities in the context of a USAID-funded activity.
Clear communications and management skills.
Familiarity with strategic communications principles.
Ability to explain technical ideas and language to a non-technical audience.
Experience in copyediting and formatting of a variety of time-sensitive materials.
Strong English and Vietnamese written, oral, and presentation skills
A writing sample in English is required as part of the application.
Reporting:
The Communication expert will report to the VDT Director.
How to apply:
Applications should be sent to ipop_vietnam_recruitment@internationaldevelopmentgroup.com before December 1, 2023.
Job Details
Organisation Name:
IDG
Location:
Hanoi
Application Deadline:
Fri, 2023-12-01

Our client is a leading provider of Industrial Automation and Test and Measurement solutions. Combining superior technology with engineering services, project management, and maintenance, their company delivers field proven operational efficiency, safety, quality, and reliability.

As a Digital Transformation Marketing Manager, you will be the catalyst for their Digital Transformation (DX) marketing endeavors. Your mission? Drive their global DX strategy to new heights. Working closely with the DX team, you will mastermind marketing initiatives that align with business objectives, focusing on innovative IoT services, Software-as-a-Service (SaaS), and IT services. Your realm will span a cutting-edge portfolio, including Asset Management, IoT and Digital Twin, Cyber Security, ERP solutions like SAP and Dynamics 365, and the pivotal integration of OT and IT.

Team Collaborator: Foster knowledge sharing and collaboration with local marketing teams, making it a unified global effort.
Mover and Shaker: Gain support and coordinate with internal regional and HQ marketing teams to execute marketing activities, utilizing a variety of platforms and tools.
Growth Enabler: Back the Business Development team with external marketing initiatives to boost DX business growth.

Qualified Opportunities
Number of External Events
Submitted Proposals

Experience: 5+ years in B2B marketing of IoT services or Software-as-a-service or IT services
Bachelor's Degree in Engineering or Business Administration with marketing exposure.
Minimum of 3 years of marketing experience in Digital Transformation, Cloud, or subscription-based software.
Knowledge of Asset Performance Management or IoT applications is a plus.
Demonstrated success in previous marketing roles.
Proficiency in PowerPoint and slide design.
Familiarity with digital marketing channels: SEO, content, and social media marketing.
Proven event marketing experience, including trade show planning, content preparation, and reporting.
Personal Attributes:
Customer-Centric and Focus-Oriented
Thrives in a Dynamic, Startup-Like Environment
Exceptional Organizational Skills with a Keen Eye for Detail
Innovative and Creative Thinker
Strong Communication and Presentation Skills
Excellent Time Management with a Commitment to Meeting Deadlines

Cụ thể như sau:
1. Yêu cầu
Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Marketing, Báo chí.
Tiếng Anh tốt, có khả năng giao tiếp và viết tin bài bằng tiếng Anh (IELTS 5.5 hoặc TOEIC 600 trở lên). Ngoại ngữ khác là một ưu thế.

2. Mô tả công việc
Tham gia xây dựng nội dung (tiếng Việt và tiếng Anh), thiết kế, sản xuất các tư liệu truyền thông của Vinacontrol như hình ảnh, bài viết, poster, flyer, brochure, slides, banner, billboard, event backdrop. infographic, video clips.
Sáng tạo và phân phối nội dung có giá trị đến khách hàng nội bộ và bên ngoài trên các kênh website, facebook, PR báo chí, Adword, SEO, các ấn phẩm truyền thông khác hoặc tại các sự kiện theo định hướng của Công ty.
Phối hợp của các đội nhóm khác thực hiện các chiến dịch marketing, phân phối, đưa các tư liệu truyền thông đến với khách hàng nội bộ và bên ngoài dưới các hình thức, chiến dịch phù hợp như: quảng cáo online, offline, sự kiện tri ân, kỷ niệm, trình diễn dịch vụ, v.v...
Theo dõi, kiểm duyệt nội dung, quản lý website, website vệ tinh, blog, landing page và các kênh truyền thông điện tử của Vinacontrol, và tất cả các blog có liên quan được liên kết với trang web của Công ty.
Theo dõi, thu thập tin tức, thông tin liên quan đến Vinacontrol trên các phương tiện thông tin đại chúng theo định kỳ.
Cập nhật các xu hướng truyền thông, quảng casoo hiện đại.
Thực hiện các nhiệm vụ điều tra, nghiên cứu, thu thập thông tin thị trường theo sự phân công của cấp Quản lý.
Hỗ trợ các đội nhóm, dự án khác của Ban (phù hợp với năng lực) khi được phân công.

Thông tin chi tiết vui lòng xem tại đây

title:

- job post
company: Tổ chức giáo dục và đào tạo Apollo Việt Nam
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: 9 - 11 triệu VNĐ)
Nhân viên Marketing chuyên về tổ chức sự kiện và kích hoạt thương hiệu có trách nhiệm thực hiện các nhiệm vụ sau đây:
Chịu trách nhiệm thực hiện các sự kiện trong và ngoài trung tâm: Bạn sẽ phải lên kế hoạch, tìm kiếm nhà cung cấp và nhân sự phù hợp, và triển khai các sự kiện. Công việc này bao gồm xác định mục tiêu, lên kế hoạch chi tiết cho sự kiện, và đảm bảo sự kiện diễn ra một cách suôn sẻ và thành công.
Phối hợp làm việc cùng team: Bạn sẽ cùng đồng nghiệp trong team xây dựng ý tưởng, nội dung, kịch bản, và kế hoạch cho từng chương trình, sự kiện, theo sự giám sát và hỗ trợ của Leader. Công việc này đòi hỏi khả năng làm việc nhóm, giao tiếp hiệu quả và sáng tạo.
Triển khai các chiến dịch toàn quốc tại trung tâm: Bạn sẽ tham gia trong việc trưng bày, trang trí tại trung tâm, và tổ chức các hoạt động tương tác khách hàng, sự kiện. Nhiệm vụ này yêu cầu bạn có khả năng tổ chức công việc, quản lý thời gian và tạo ra các trải nghiệm độc đáo để tương tác và thu hút khách hàng.
Tìm kiếm, quản lý và đào thực tập sinh: Bạn sẽ có trách nhiệm tìm kiếm, quản lý và đào tạo thực tập sinh để hỗ trợ công việc, xây dựng nhân sự và nguồn lực cho phòng marketing. Công việc này yêu cầu bạn có khả năng quản lý và định hướng công việc cho thực tập sinh.
Quản lý thiết bị, công cụ tiếp thị, tài liệu tư vấn bán hàng, quà tặng khách hàng: Bạn sẽ phải quản lý và đảm bảo sẵn có các thiết bị, công cụ tiếp thị, tài liệu tư vấn bán hàng, quà tặng khách hàng cần thiết cho các trung tâm phụ trách. Điều này đòi hỏi bạn có khả năng quản lý và tổ chức các tài sản và tài liệu.
Thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý trực tiếp: Bạn sẽ thực hiện các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý trực tiếp, bao gồm hỗ trợ trong các hoạt động marketing khác và đáp ứng yêu cầu của công việc.
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên

Tham gia chương trình đào tạo bài bản từ các chuyên gia cấp cao
Lộ trình thăng tiến rõ ràng trong công việc

title:
Head of Digital Transformation
- job post
description:
The Why
Mekong Capital is committed to unlocking the full potential of digital transformation. We are on a mission to align technology, people, and processes to optimize operational efficiency and effectiveness. If you’re a master of digital transformation, we invite you to be part of our dynamic team.
Objectives
1. Digital Visionary: As the Head of Digital Transformation, your primary objective is to be the digital visionary who strategically aligns technology, people, and processes. You’ll optimize operational efficiency, all in service of fulfilling Mekong Capital’s highest priorities.
2. Forward-Thinking Solutions: Your second objective is to lead the development and implementation of forward-thinking digital solutions. These solutions will strategically align our business and technology strategies, ensuring exceptional customer satisfaction and driving our organization’s success.
Key Responsibilities:
1. Comprehensive Digital Transformation:
Develop, implement, and continuously optimize a holistic digital transformation strategy and roadmaps.
Enhance customer experiences and maintain a robust enterprise architecture.
2. High-Impact Initiatives:
Lead digital transformation initiatives with high impact, contributing to Mekong Capital’s Goals & KPIs.
Provide leadership in leading and collaborating on cross-department Agile projects.
3. Management Role:
Provide leadership for the vision of the Digital Transformation Team and Mekong Capital.
Key Accountabilities:
1. Digital Transformation:
Responsible for Mekongs DT Landscape and DT Roadmap. Prioritize digital initiatives based on impact, cost-effectiveness, and feasibility, fostering a digital culture for customers, employees, and stakeholders.
Proactively generate and cause new cross-functional projects successfully which are consistently used by everyone and fulfill the company’s vision.
Identify opportunities for process automation and lead the implementation.
Continuously improve and organize around results that elevate the performance of the company’s Top KPIs.
Provides the leadership for high-impact initiatives, which improves efficiency and productivity across the organization.
2. Customer Experience:
Evaluate and enhance the customer journey to ensure an optimal and seamless customer experience.
Oversee the Digital Workplace, ensuring an optimal digital experience for key users (Partners, Investors, Directors).
Utilize data analytics and customer feedback to identify opportunities for improvement in customer service and satisfaction.
Implement technologies and processes that enhance customer engagement and satisfaction.
Develop enrollment and support programs for employees impacted by digital initiatives.
3. Strategic Planning:
Align digital transformation projects with organizational goals and strategies.
Lead and oversee the digital transformation initiatives across the organization, ensuring smooth transitions and minimal disruption.
Develop and implement digital transformation strategies that enhance customer experience and business value.
4. Enterprise Architecture:
Oversee the development and implementation of a robust enterprise architecture that supports digital transformation initiatives.
Ensure alignment with the business goals and technology strategy.
Evaluate and implement emerging technologies and architecture solutions to drive digital innovation and transformation.
5. Solution Management:
Oversee the design and implementation of innovative digital solutions to solve complex business challenges.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to deliver innovative solutions.
Communicate effectively with internal and external stakeholders, keeping them informed of progress and changes.
Ensure successful deployment and adoption of solutions across the organization.
6. Budget Management:
Manage financial aspects of digital transformation initiatives, ensuring projects are completed within budget and deliver maximum ROI.
Develop and oversee project budgets for efficiency.
7. Administrative and other tasks
Handle administrative tasks related to your activities (contract with vendors, making payment requests)
Key Requirements
Experience: A minimum of 5 years in a management-level role (Senior Manager/Director/ Head level) within Digital or Product Management.
Track Record: Proven expertise in successfully leading end-to-end digital transformation initiatives, from ideation to successful implementation.
Knowledge: Deep understanding of enterprise architecture, technology solutions, and customer experience strategies.
Communication: Exceptional communication skills; clear and direct communication, proactively addressing issues, and speaking up promptly when needed. A skilled listener, understands, and recreates others’ perspectives, aiming for the shared goal.
Management Skills: Strong stakeholder and project management skills, especially in Agile/Scrum methodologies. Directly engage with teams and stakeholders to drive results.
Leadership: Demonstrated high influence and leadership capability, empowering teams to excel and find fulfillment in their work.
Language: Fluent in both English and Vietnamese.
Mindset: Results-oriented with a natural curiosity.
Interest?

Thực hiện proposal, pitching đề án, kế hoạch kinh doanh với các case khách hàng cụ thể.
Lên master plan - chiến lược cho khách hàng.
Trực tiếp quản lý tiến độ dự án và bám sát KPI công việc.
Chăm sóc khách hàng, quan hệ khách hàng và giải quyết các phát sinh của khách hàng trong công việc.
Thực hiện xử lý hợp đồng, tái ký và làm việc về các vấn đề thanh toán hợp đồng.
Lưu ý: Account Executive nói trên thuần về quản trị dự án, không sale.
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Được trau dồi và đào tạo các kiến thức chuyên sâu về Marketing và truyền thông.
Được làm việc tại môi trường 9X, 2K thoải mái, trẻ trung, năng động, văn hóa cởi mở
Được tiếp xúc và làm việc với đa dạng ngành hàng
Được mở rộng network, các mối quan hệ với khách hàng
Onboard cùng CEO, vạch rõ lộ trình sự nghiệp
Được tổ chức tiệc sinh nhật hàng tháng, đi du lịch cùng công ty.
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
Có kinh nghiệm ít nhất 1,5 - 2 năm ở vị trí tương đương. Ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm làm Agency trước đây.
Có khả năng sáng tạo, chủ động đưa ra các phương án giải quyết vấn đề trong quá trình vận hành dự án.
Có nền tảng trong lĩnh vực marketing - kinh doanh và mong muốn được học hỏi.
Có tinh thần trách nhiệm, học hỏi và làm việc cường độ cao. Chịu khó, sẵn sàng di chuyển trong quá trình làm việc.
Có khả năng làm việc độc lập, teamwork.
Có laptop cá nhân.
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Nghiên Cứu Thị Trường,Quản Lý Điều Hành,Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Truyền Thông/PR,Tư Vấn Doanh Nghiệp (B2B)

2 - 5 năm

title:
Portfolio Manager
- job post
description:
Job Purpose:
identify, asses and develop business opportunities i.e. new products, and new partnerships that positively enhances STADA’s business in terms of maximizing revenue generation and process optimization. Included within are explicitly growth opportunities of the inline portfolio within the STADA Group.


Key Accountabilities:
Point of contact for new business proposals (products/ commercial business partners), to work in close collaboration with market leads, marketing, other regional and HQ colleagues
Product opportunities:
Strongly support a portfolio analysis to define target portfolio for STADA taking corporate portfolio strategy and local environment into account
Identify and assess market potential for new product opportunities and propose within the guidelines of the corporate.
Propose optimal approach for new products (in licensing vs own development).
Identify business opportunities and supervise efficiently and effectively the process of implementation.
Assess Growth opportunities by working closely with marketing and sales team members to identify market needs and trends.
Evaluate in-licensing, out-licensing, toll manufacturing opportunities as well as supply agreements with third parties.
Preparation of business cases in close cooperation with global and local stakeholders and preparation of project presentations to the Pipeline Committee Meeting
Job Specific Technical/Functional/Professional Competencies:
Business, Sales and marketing Acumen
Strong communication and negotiation skills
Oral and written English communication skills
Acts Decisively and accountable
Resilience
Self-Awareness
Sociable and team player
Experience and Knowledge:
Proven expertise in similar areas/roles within the pharmaceutical industry (commercial area) is mandatory (3+ years)
Experienced in an international and cross-functional environment.
Multi-tasking ability to manage/lead multiple projects simultaneously & efficiently.
University degree, preferably in business, economic or Pharmaceutical Science; Masters/MBA is a plus.

CHÚNG TÔI CẦN GÌ Ở BẠN:
3-5 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí quản lý Trade Marketing FMCG (ưu tiên các ngành có liên quan đến cà phê: Trà, cà phê, thực phẩm, đồ uống…)
Có tư duy tổng thể về marketing bán lẻ, marketing FMCG, quản trị bán hàng đa kênh…

BẠN SẼ ĐƯỢC THỂ HIỆN NĂNG LỰC BẢN THÂN QUA VIỆC:
*** Quản lý hoạt động tại điểm bán:
Xây dựng Profile điểm bán, cập nhật thông tin, phân tích đánh giá đưa ra đề xuất đầu tư tại từng điểm bán.
Phân tích doanh số từng SKU tại từng điểm bán theo tháng để đưa ra các chương trình kích hoạt bán hàng phù hợp theo mùa vụ tại từng điểm bán.
Xây dựng chính sách bán hàng, chương trình Promotion cho hệ thống nhà phân phối/điểm bán
Đưa ra ý tưởng thiết kế POSM và lên kế hoạch sản xuất, triển khai trưng bày.
Xây dựng quy chuẩn trưng bày hàng hóa và hình ảnh NVBH tại điểm bán, triển khai thực hiện đảm bảo sự xuyên suốt và đồng nhất về trưng bày sản phẩm của toàn bộ cửa hàng và đại lý, kiểm tra giám sát thực thi đảm bảo theo quy chuẩn trưng bày hàng hoá.
Quản lý, thống kê vật phẩm trưng bày, POSM, triển khai và điều phối cho các kênh
***Quản lý hoạt động Sampling/Activation tại điểm bán:
Xây dựng Profile điểm bán, cập nhật thông tin, phân tích đánh giá đưa ra đề xuất triển khai hoạt động sampling/activation tại từng điểm bán theo từng thời điểm mùa vụ.
Lập kế hoạch triển khai thực hiện sampling/activation tại điểm bán, sự kiến xúc tiến bán hàng cho từng kênh theo tháng/ quý/ năm.
Điều phối các hoạt động trong chương trình sampling/activation để thu hút được khách hàng, kích thích khách hàng mua sắm

NHỮNG GÌ BẠN SẼ NHẬN ĐƯỢC TẠI IDD:

Mức lương hấp dẫn, không thấp hơn thị trường, thỏa thuận theo năng lực lên tới: 1500$ ++
Không được làm việc thứ bảy và chủ nhật, thời gian thoải mái từ 8h30 -17h30

Làm hết sức – Chơi hết mình với các chương trình Team Building
Được đào tạo và có cơ hội phát triển sự nghiệp nhanh chóng

description:

- Tổng hợp, phân tích thông tin marketing, thị trường, sản phẩm và khách hàng ...;
- Các nhiệm vụ khác theo sự phân công của quản lý và cấp trên.
2. Yêu cầu ứng viên
- Tốt nghiệp Đại học trở lên chuyên ngành Quản trị kinh doanh, Marketing, Truyền thông hoặc các ngành liên quan.
- Có từ 02 năm kinh nghiệm vị trí tương đương..
- Kiến thức chuyên môn về các nghiệp vụ marketing (Rrade Marketing, nghiên cứu thị trường, đối thủ, sản phẩm...). Ứng viên có am hiểu về thị trường xe ô tô tải là lợi thế.
- Khả năng lập kế hoạch và triển khai các hoạt động Marketing.
- Tổng hợp và phân tích số liệu tốt.
- Có khả năng tổ chức các event, theo dõi, quản lý, làm việc nhóm.
- Có khả năng sử dụng ngoại ngữ (tiếng Anh/ tiếng Trung) cơ bản, trao đổi công việc qua email.
2. Quyền lợi
- Thu nhập: upto 20M - hưởng theo năng lực và KPI thực tế, lương tháng 13, thưởng hiệu quả công việc, thưởng kết quả kinh doanh.
- Lộ trình phát triển rõ ràng, cơ hội được đào tạo và nâng cấp lên vị trí trưởng nhóm, trưởng- phó phòng
- Thời gian làm việc: 7,5h/ngày, nghỉ chiều T7 +CN
- Mỗi năm có 12 ngày nghỉ phép năm hưởng nguyên lương.
- Nghỉ lễ tết hưởng nguyên lương, thưởng các dịp lễ tết trong năm và sinh nhật từ 500,000-1,000,000đ.
- Được thăm khám sức khỏe định kỳ.
- Tham gia các hoạt động gắn kết nội bộ hằng quý, hằng năm, hay các dịp lễ tết, du lịch, sinh nhật, team building,….
- Thời gian làm việc: 8h00 - 17h00, Từ thứ 2 - Sáng thứ 7, nghỉ tất cả các chiều T7+ CN và tất cả các ngày Lễ Tết theo quy định.

Lương: 13.000.000₫ - 20.000.000₫ một tháng

o New products development
– Collaborate with Designers/ R&D team/ Technical team/ Sourcing team to develop OEM/ODM designs. Do analyzing on costing to quote buyer. Following up closely with R&D to make sure sample is done as requested timeline & requirements.
Keep self-posted to the latest material/ design trends from existing buyers or collecting info from furniture markets. If sample is approved to run to mass production, proceed all the testing procedure required by the respective market/buyer to make sure all is passed before applying to mass qty.

Process cross-sale effectively between markets for ODM designs.

title:
Project Sales Executive
- job post
company: Công Ty TNHH Saint - Gobain Việt Nam
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
I. JOB PURPOSES:
To manage the commercial project activity with key specifiers with sufficient technical specifications within a geographical area to achieve the Company objectives as directed by the Project Sales Manager/ Key Account Manager (KAM).
II. FUNCTIONAL COMPETENCIES:
1. Build and extend the close relationship with key account customers
Understand assigned key accounts by surveying and approaching them.
Expand SG brand at construction government bodies, local construction network, dealers, and local installers through all activities such as Price updates, marketing activities, and solution consulting….
Set up a specific plan for each customer: define the right approach and right solution main focus on winning the right solution
To promote the Company’s products and systems, solutions by regularly visiting key customers (based on Company guidelines and customer classification)
