title:
Demand Planning Assistant Manager
- job post
description:
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES

Lead O+O Planning activities aiming at the best customer service while optimizing costs and improving stocks quality:
Size the structures and necessary resources (global budget and operating costs): Plan and manage Budget and resources of demand planning team
Coordinate the Demand Planning activities in order to guarantee the sales forecasts accuracy and to participate to the business planning
Be responsible for the reliability and accuracy of the products database
Coordinate the Supply planning activities taking care of the optimization of flows and procurement parameters
Participate to projects impacting Supply Chain which are initiated by the DG of Operations, the Supply Chain Manager and its entity
Be responsible for the implementation of best practices, the achievement of objectives. Pilot and follow the progress of improvement plans
Coordinate the Supply Chain Planning activities with the internal and external actors and relay the industrial constraints to them
Recruit, develop and manage his/her team taking care of the transfer of know-how and of the development of expertise. Implement organizational changes
Contribute to develop and deliver department's target
Ensure O+O sales forecasts accuracy and the building of turnover through the piloting of the sales forecast process.
Be responsible for the catalog management and contribute to its rationalisation
Manage the sales forecasts quality
Manage the global monthly sales forecast process
Build the baseline forecast
Challenge and consolidate the promotions and launches sales forecasts projected by the Sales and Marketing teams
Ensure the global sales forecast consistency, through the building of a consensus between the commercial forecasts, the financial trend and the sales history
Participate to the improvement of the sales forecast practices
According to the organization: recruit, develop and manage his/her team taking care of the transfer of know-how and of the development of its expertise. Implement organisational changes
For the "professional field expert ("Local Business Owner"): Contribute to the improvement of the processes and information systems related to his/her activity and be the referent of his/her job in his/her country. Animate and train the Supply Chain community to the best practices and tools related to his/her area of expertise
Ensure the smooth execution of the O+O planning process in order to guarantee the availability of the product while optimising Customer Service, Available to Purchase, OSA and cost and while improving the quality of stocks.
Build the Supply plan of the entity based on the validated sales forecasts, the co-packing plan and the stocks and supply/procurement parameters.
Check the logistic feasibility through the analysis of the stocks equation. And exchange with the MSL about the long-term issues (capacity, gap between capacity and demand)
Determine the stock and supply parameters according to the objectives of service rate, costs and global targeted stock.
Manage the replenishment process through the evaluation of the shortage risks and by communicating priorities to the MSL.
Manage stock levels in accordance with the objectives of the country and analyze obsoletes and slow movers. Define and implement action plans.
Decrease shortages by the analysis of the causes, the definition of the action plans and the challenges of suppliers about the MAD dates of products which are out of stock.
Define and follow the Key Performance Indicators (out of stock, service rate, stock) and communicate them internally and to the MSL.
Build the budgeted stock according to the stock and supply parameters.
Participate to the best practices improvement
For the field expert ("Local Business Owner"): Contribute to the improvement of the processes and information systems related to his/her activity and be the referent of his/her job in his/her country. Animate and train the Supply Chain community to the best practices and tools related to his/her area of expertise.

REQUIREMENTS
4 to 7 years of experience of Demand and Supply planning in international FMCG or eCommerce platform (Lazada, Shopee, etc.)
Experience in people management and development is a plus
Experience in Ecommerce, understanding platform
Computer skills - SAP, advance excel, SQL, PBI or other programming is preferable

You can apply to up to three jobs within a rolling 30-day window.
You cannot withdraw your application once you applied, so please make sure to choose a job that matches your dreams.
Please visit "Your Application Space" to see the jobs you have already applied to.
Please don’t create another account with a different email. If you do so, your account might be merged and your application record will be deleted.

title:
Employer Branding & Sourcing Senior Executive
- job post
description:
Job Purpose:
The job holder will be responsible of promoting Guardian employer brand to attract candidates and support recruitment needs aligned with the company's strategy, and also ensure the availability of workforce in assigned departments and areas.
Responsibility:
Employer branding:
Drive and enhance the employer brand identity across multiple channels and digital platforms by developing engaging communication materials such as images, videos, taglines, etc... via the Career page, Facebook, LinkedIn, YouTube, TikTok, or other potential channels.
Be a content creator on various channels by staying updated on market trends and practices in employer branding.
Establish and maintain positive relationships with universities/ colleges to communicate, organize activities, or join recruitment events: job fairs, company/store visits, workshops, internships, and management trainee programs.
Together with the Talent Acquisition team maintain Guardian's image at every candidate touchpoint: attraction, interview, onboard, etc.
Support the Talent Acquisition team by collaborating with Leadership Teams and the regional Sourcing team to fine-tune the Employee Value Proposition (EVP) to ensure its relevance and effectiveness.
Assist the Talent Acquisition team in inspiring employees as primary ambassadors who showcase their employee experience to help attract candidates/ followers.
Continuously review past projects for improvement, provide feedback on these results to stakeholders, and make data-driven decisions about future Employer Branding activities.
Sourcing:
Set up and manage talent pools for recruiting demand, especially for mass hiring.
Together with the Talent Acquisition team to create, propose, and deliver plans for special recruitment campaigns in order to support business growth and transformation.
Screen resumes and applications for suitability; conduct initial screening interviews, both telephone and personal; make hiring recommendations based upon the eligibility criteria provided for assigned areas.
Ensure accurate and timely delivery of recruitment reports.
Ensure that the recruitment database is maintained effectively and the recruitment process.
Maintain the recruitment database and follow company policies.
Analyze sourcing approaches and tools to increase efficiency.
Perform other duties as assigned by the line manager or Head of People & Culture.

Requirement:
Minimum 3 years of branding/marketing experience, with employer branding and communication preferred.
Bachelor’s degree in Business, HR, Marketing or related field preferred
Have experience in event organizing, creating and managing materials on social platforms (Facebook, LinkedIn, Tik Tok and other platforms).
Proficiency in design tools: Canva, video making tools…
Excellent verbal and written communication skills (both English and Vietnamese); must be able to write and tell compelling story
Ability to identify market trends in employer branding.
Strong attention to detail, prioritization, and time management skills.
Preferred experience in Retail/F&B/Hospitality industries.
Ability to work under pressure with a positive attitude.
APPLICATION:
Interested candidates please send your application package to email tuyendung@guardian.com.vn

title:

- job post
description:
Job Description
ROLE PURPOSE
The Marketing Supervisor plays an essential supporting role to Senior Marketing Manager and Head Of Marketing for the brand management and communications of the brands and products initiated in Apollo’s new projects to grow domestically and internationally.

1. Brand management: Develop, sign off, audit, and provide guidance regarding brand materials
2. Communication (nationwide and center level): Plan & execute communications for offline channels: POSM, center deco, center activities, OOH, event, PR
3. Product Marketing: Be the product expert & develop all content relating to the product
4. Partnership & Sponsorship (International & Local): Build win-win partnerships that enhance our brand positioning
Job Requirements
Bachelor’s degree, preferably in Business or Marketing
Minimum 3 years of working experience in a branding or communication position
Project management skills with an ability to handle multiple tasks within the timeline
Ability to work independently with some level of guidance
Good communication skills and be able to collaborate with internal departments and external agencies
Proficiency in English (reading, writing, and speaking) is a must
Job Location
Hà Nội

title:
Digital Marketing Executive - Vietnam
- job post
description:
Digital Marketing Executive
Overview
We are looking for a highly motivated and experienced Digital Marketing Executive to join our team. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in digital marketing, with a proven track record of delivering successful campaigns across a range of channels. As a Digital Marketing Executive, you will be responsible for developing and executing digital marketing strategies that drive traffic, engagement, and revenue for our business.
What you’ll do:
· Develop and implement a content driven strategy to drive inbound lead generation through LinkedIn and the brand's website
· Manage and optimize LinkedIn campaigns to increase lead generation, engagement, and conversion rates
· Optimize the brand's website for lead generation through effective landing page design, user experience, and SEO
· Develop and execute a content marketing plan to generate brand awareness and engagement across multiple platforms
· Create visually compelling content for use across digital platforms, including website, social media, and email marketing campaigns
· Analyze data and metrics to measure the effectiveness of campaigns and identify opportunities for optimization
Who are you?
· Proactivity and entrepreneurial in nature – this will be a self-driven role.
· 3+ years of experience in B2B digital marketing, with a focus on inbound lead generation through LinkedIn and website optimization.
· Proficiency in graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, and Sketch
· Strong English written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create compelling content across multiple platforms
· Knowledge of SEO best practices and website optimization techniques
· Proven track record of success in developing and executing digital marketing campaigns that drive results
· Ability to work independently and collaboratively in a fast-paced, dynamic startup environment
· Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Communications, or related field is a plus
Who are we?
Abdoolally Ebrahim Housewares Limited (AEH) is part of the Abdoolally Ebrahim Group, which was established in Hong Kong in 1842. Innovating for 180 years, the company has grown into a market leading product development house and has extensive sourcing knowledge in the Housewares and Kitchenware industry.
Job Type: Full-time
Salary: From 15,561,000₫ per month
Application Question(s):
Are you able to work from home (WFH)?
Do you have experience in developing and implementing a content driven strategy to drive inbound lead generation through LinkedIn and the brand's website?
Do you have experience in developing and executing a content marketing plan to generate brand awareness and engagement across multiple platforms?
Do you have 3+ years of experience in B2B digital marketing?
Are you familiar with graphic design tools such as Adobe Creative Suite, Canva, and Sketch?
Do you have strong English written and verbal communication skills, with the ability to create compelling content across multiple platforms?

title:

description:

title:
Chuyên Viên Truyền Thông Thương Hiệu Tuyển Dụng (Employer Branding)
- job post
description:
Phúc Lợi
Bảo hiểm
Du Lịch
Thưởng
Chăm sóc sức khỏe
Đào tạo
Tăng lương
Mô Tả Công Việc
MỤC TIÊU VỊ TRÍ
Xây dựng & quản lý nội dung truyền thông thương hiệu Nhà tuyển dụng trên các nền tảng mạng xã hội và phương tiện kỹ thuật số nhằm tăng nhận diện thương hiệu tuyển dụng và thu hút ứng viên
Triển khai các chiến dịch truyền thông thu hút nguồn ứng viên phục vụ công tác tạo nguồn và phát triển nguồn nhân lực
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
1. Xây dựng nội dung truyền thông thương hiệu Nhà tuyển dụng trên các kênh mạng xã hội
Xây dựng và phát triển nội dung truyền thông thương hiệu Nhà tuyển dụng trên các nền tảng mạng xã hội
Thiết kế ấn phẩm cho các nội dung truyền thông thương hiệu tuyển dụng
Lên kế hoạch và trực tiếp triển khai các chiến lược marketing đối với từng nền tảng mạng xã hội (tối ưu nhận thức thương hiệu, thu hút ứng viên tiềm năng)
Nghiên cứu thị trường mạng xã hội, duy trì các kênh mạng xã hội hiện tại và phát triển các kênh mạng xã hội mới phù hợp với xu thế của thị trường Tài chính đầu tư
2. Quản trị nội dung kênh truyền thông thương hiệu tuyển dụng
Tăng cường tương tác tích cực giữa thương hiệu tuyển dụng với CBNV Nội bộ và các ứng viên bên ngoài, giám sát để ngăn ngừa và xử lý các tương tác tiêu cực
Giám sát nội dung trên các kênh mạng xã hội, đảm bảo tính nhất quán về nhận diện thương hiệu phù hợp với chiến lược kinh doanh của Công ty từng thời kỳ
3. Xây dựng Marketing tuyển dụng:
Lập kế hoạch và tổ chức triển khai các phương án tiếp cận, thu hút ứng viên tiềm năng theo yêu cầu tuyển dụng ngắn & trung hạn
Xây dựng, đề xuất phương án gia tăng hiệu quả hoạt động marketing tuyển dụng
Định kì triển khai hoạt động khảo sát thị trường lao động thuộc ngành nghề hoạt động của công ty nhằm đưa ra các phương án và chiến lược tiếp cận, cạnh tranh tuyển dụng phù hợp
Đề xuất phát triển các công cụ, hệ thống giúp tự động hóa tối đa về quản trị, khai thác hiệu quả nguồn dữ liệu ứng viên.
4. Nhiệm vụ khác:
Các công việc khác theo sự phân công của quản lý trực tiếp
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
1. Trình độ học vấn:
- Tốt nghiệp đại học trở lên, ưu tiên chuyên ngành Marketing - Truyền thông, Báo chí, Quản trị nhân lực
2. Kiến thức/chuyên môn có liên quan
- Kinh nghiệm từ 2 năm trong lĩnh vực truyền thông tuyển dụng, ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm tại các tổ chức tài chính - ngân hàng
Có kinh nghiệm tổ chức, triển khai job-fair.
Có khả năng cập nhật về các channel tuyển dụng và xu hướng tìm kiếm việc làm của đa dạng nhóm nhân sự
Có kinh nghiệm truyền thông nội bộ là một lợi thế
3. Kỹ năng
Kỹ năng giao tiếp và thuyết trình tốt
Kỹ năng thiết kế hình ảnh, video
Ngoại ngữ: sử dụng tiếng anh cơ bản trong công việc
Kỹ năng viết báo cáo giải trình; kỹ năng phân tích, đánh giá và báo cáo số liệu
4. Năng lực
Năng lực sáng tạo và xây dựng nội dung marketing
Năng lực quản lý, tổ chức giám sát các hoạt động marketing thương hiệu
Năng lực quản trị rủi ro & xử lý khủng hoảng truyền thông
QUYỀN LỢI
1. Cộng đồng những người làm nghề chính trực và dấn thân phụng sự
Môi trường làm nghề tài chính chuyên nghiệp
Làm việc với tinh thần làm chủ, sáng tạo và thách thức (IPAM-4C)
2. Thu nhập theo năng lực
Thu nhập xứng đáng theo năng lực và giá trị đóng góp
Thử việc 100% lương nếu đạt yêu cầu; xem xét thay đổi thu nhập hàng năm
Tham gia bảo hiểm sức khỏe, bảo hiểm y tế, bảo hiểm tai nạn 24/24
3. Tổ chức học tập và văn hóa sôi nổi
Không gian làm việc mở với trang thiết bị hiện đại
Các hoạt động văn hóa, thiện nguyện phong phú và sôi nổi

Nhân viên

Kinh Nghiệm
2 - 5 Năm

title:
Marketing & Communications Manager (B2B), Vietnam
- job post
description:
Responsibilities
Company Introduction
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us
Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.
Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.
At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.
Join us.

Team Introduction
Join our Global Business Solutions, Vietnam team and be at the forefront of crafting and executing world-class B2B marketing campaigns that drive awareness and adoption of TikTok's suites of marketing solutions amongst the advertisers, marketers and agencies in the dynamic Vietnam market!

Responsibility
1. B2B Marketing planning and executing: Develop and implement comprehensive B2B marketing strategies to expand TikTok's advertising business in Vietnam.
2. Engage Advertisers and Agencies: Create compelling messaging, narratives, and marketing collaterals to effectively engage and attract advertisers and agencies in the Vietnamese market.
3. Localization and Trans-creation: Collaborate with regional and global marketing teams to localize marketing campaigns for the Vietnam market, including trans-creation of creative assets to ensure cultural relevance.
4. Cross-Functional Collaboration: Work closely with sales, PR, product, and other cross-functional teams to drive B2B marketing programs and initiatives tailored to the Vietnamese market.
5. Integrated Marketing Campaigns: Develop and activate integrated marketing campaigns, including events, training sessions, case studies, and collaterals to showcase TikTok's advertising solutions.
Qualifications
1. Minimum of 3 years of experience in marketing, communications, consulting, or business strategy.
2. Industry Expertise: Experience in the media, advertising, or technology industries is highly desirable.
3. Partner Marketing: Experience in driving Advertisers and Agencies marketing or sales programs is preferred.
4. Language Skills: Excellent written and verbal communication skills in both English and Vietnamese.
5. Cross-Functional Collaboration: A proven track record of working collaboratively with and influencing sales and other cross-functional teams.
6. Marketing Strategy: Experience in developing integrated marketing strategies and executing go-to-market plans.
7. Industry Knowledge: Strong understanding of TikTok's solutions, the advertising industry, and the nuances of the Vietnam market.

TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

title:
Compliance Marketing Analyst - Vietnam
- job post
description:
Location
Vietnam - Remote
Type
Full time
Department
Compliance
Compliance

Building the Future of Crypto
Our Krakenites are a world-class team with crypto conviction, united by our desire to discover and unlock the potential of crypto and blockchain technology.
What makes us different?
Kraken is a mission-focused company rooted in crypto values. As a Krakenite, you’ll join us on our mission to accelerate the global adoption of crypto, so that everyone can achieve financial freedom and inclusion. For over a decade, Kraken’s focus on our mission and crypto ethos has attracted many of the most talented crypto experts in the world.
Before you apply, please read the Kraken Culture page to learn more about our internal culture, values, and mission.
As a fully remote company, we have Krakenites in 60+ countries who speak over 50 languages. Krakenites are industry pioneers who develop premium crypto products for experienced traders, institutions, and newcomers to the space. Kraken is committed to industry-leading security, crypto education, and world-class client support through our products like Kraken Pro, Kraken NFT, and Kraken Futures.
Become a Krakenite and build the future of crypto!
Proof of work

The Team
The Marketing Compliance Team plays a critical role in protecting both Kraken’s reputation and consumer trust. Our team works closely with our Marketing content creators and writers to ensure that Kraken’s brand remains unique while simultaneously adhering to regulatory requirements. This team is responsible for reviewing the language, accuracy, and the presence of applicable disclaimers on all marketing content. Our mission is to protect the integrity of Kraken’s brand and maintain the highest level of consumer trust.

The Opportunity
Verify accuracy, language, disclosures, and transparency in each marketing review
Contribute to the development and implementation of compliance marketing policies and procedures
Stay informed of relevant regulations and industry trends for marketing compliance and client interactions
Maintain accurate records of compliance reviews
Collaborate with multiple groups of internal stakeholders
Manage and track various communication channels and provide timely responses to all stakeholders
Provide key support to various internal teams across multiple time-zones
Escalate material compliance risks to Regional Compliance Officers (RCOs), as appropriate.
Act as a subject matter expert (SME) and provide support for Marketing teams on Compliance related issues
Communicate effectively to coordinate cross-functional projects
Identify and develop workflow efficiencies, when/if required
The skills you should HODL
1-3 years’ experience in a compliance role at a financial institution or equivalent
Ability to work EST / PST times (12:00 pm - 8:00 pm UTC or 3:00 pm - 11:00 pm UTC)
Foundational knowledge and understanding of compliance and regulations specific to the financial and cryptocurrency industries
Fluent in assessing regulatory and financial language
Ability to work independently, multitask and prioritize projects in a deadline intensive environment
Excellent analytical/problem solving, critical thinking, verbal and written communication, and organization skills
The ability to balance competing priorities on a daily basis
Proficient in Microsoft Excel and Word
Attention to detail and strong organizational skills
Ability to take ownership of work product and consistently deliver results
Adaptability to global business needs
Ability to work in a rapidly changing regulatory environment
This is a location specific role. We can only consider applications from the following locations: Philippines or Vietnam

The ideal working hours for this role to be within EST / PST time zone (12:00 pm - 8:00 pm UTC or 3:00 pm - 11:00 pm UTC)
Kraken is powered by people from around the world and we celebrate all Krakenites for their diverse talents, backgrounds, contributions and unique perspectives. We hire strictly based on merit, meaning we seek out the candidates with the right abilities, knowledge, and skills considered the most suitable for the job. We encourage you to apply for roles where you don't fully meet the listed requirements, especially if you're passionate or knowledgable about crypto!
As an equal opportunity employer, we don’t tolerate discrimination or harassment of any kind. Whether that’s based on race, ethnicity, age, gender identity, citizenship, religion, sexual orientation, disability, pregnancy, veteran status or any other protected characteristic as outlined by federal, state or local laws.

title:
Sale Admin Mua Hàng
- job post
company: Công ty CP XNK Hóa chất và Thiết bị Kim Ngưu
description:
Mô tả công việc Hoàn thành các nhiệm vụ sau:
Hỗ trợ phòng mua hàng làm việc với các nhà cung cấp cũ giảm giá hàng mua. Thu thập thông tin thị trường, nhận thông tin phản hồi của nhà cung cấp, trả lời những thắc mắc của nhà cung cấp, liên hệ với các bộ phận khác xử lý khiếu nại của nhà cung cấp nhanh chóng, hiệu quả, chính xác.
Phối hợp KD xây dựng kế hoạch mùa hàng từ bộ phận bán hàng tháng, theo dõi, đôn đốc bộ phận kinh doanh gửi kế hoạch.
Thực hiện quy trình mua hàng: các thủ tục đặt hàng từ nhà cung cấp, nhập hàng vào kho, lưu trữ chứng từ.
Soạn thảo và quản lý các loại hợp đồng của Phòng mua hàng hóa chất công nghiệp. Thực hiện hợp đồng, làm đơn hàng, xuất nhập hàng hóa, liên hệ với nhà cung cấp, lên kế hoạch nhập hàng cho bộ phận kho, lên kế hoạch giao nhận.
Đối soát chi phí mua hàng, làm thủ tục thanh toán nội bộ; thanh toán khác cho nhà cung cấp.
Theo dõi, làm việc với kế toán tiến độ trả tiền nhà cung cấp, làm việc với nhà cung cấp kéo dãn công nợ
Theo dõi quá trình nhập hàng của nhà cung cấp, lượng hàng bán ra, tổng hợp hàng tồn kho , cung cấp thông tin cho bộ phận kinh doanh có cơ sở kiểm soát hàng hóa.
Cập nhật dữ liệu mua hàng, báo cáo hiệu quả mua hàng theo tuần/tháng/quý/năm, thực hiện báo cáo chi tiết công nợ với nhà cung cấp.
Các công việc khác theo phân công của BGĐ Quyền lợi được hưởng BHXH, BHYT, BHTN; Hỗ trợ ăn ca đầy đủ
Chế độ nâng lương: định kỳ hàng năm
Chế độ phúc lợi: Thăm hỏi ốm đau, sinh nhật, hiếu, hỷ; Du lịch nghỉ mát …
Thưởng các dịp Lễ, Tết; Lương tháng 13; Thưởng cổ phần Esop
Quà 08/3, 01/6, Trung thu, Tết …
Khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm Yêu cầu công việc - Yêu cầu tốt nghiệp từ Cao Đẳng trở lên ngành về: Hóa chất, Quản trị kinh doanh, thương mại, ngân hàng, marketing, ngoại ngữ, tài chính….
Kỹ năng giao tiếp
Kỹ năng làm việc nhóm
Kỹ năng lập mục tiêu và quản lý công việc cá nhân
Kỹ năng quản lý công việc
Cẩn thận, trung thực, nhiệt tình với công việc.
Khả năng chịu áp lực công việc, xử lý công việc nhạy bén và hiệu quả Yêu cầu hồ sơ 1. Thông tin ứng viên theo mẫu của VIETCHEM
2. Sơ yếu lý lịch cá nhân;
3. Thẻ căn cước hoặc giấy CMND;

4. Văn bằng, chứng chỉ có liên quan.Lưu ý:
Chấp nhận hồ sơ phô tô.
Ưu tiên các ứng viên nộp hồ sơ sớm.
Hồ sơ không hoàn lại và chỉ thông báo với các ứng viên đạt yêu cầu

Lead a team of digital marketing professionals, providing guidance and support to ensure goals and deadlines are met.
Train and mentor team members, fostering their professional growth and development.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams, such as marketing, sales, and IT, to align digital marketing efforts with overall business objectives.
Conduct market research and competitive analysis to identify opportunities for growth and development.
Manage and maintain relationships with external vendors and agencies, ensuring deliverables are met within budget and timeline.
Stay informed about relevant laws and regulations related to digital marketing and ensure compliance in all activities.
Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Bachelor's degree in marketing, business, or a related field.
Proven experience in digital marketing, preferably in a leadership role.
In-depth knowledge of digital marketing tools, such as Google Analytics, SEO tools, social media management platforms, and marketing automation software.
Strong analytical and problem-solving skills, with the ability to interpret data and make data-driven decisions.
Experience managing multi-channel digital advertising campaigns.
Excellent communication and interpersonal skills, with the ability to effectively collaborate with cross-functional teams.
Up-to-date knowledge of digital marketing trends, strategies, and best practices.
Ability to prioritize and manage multiple projects and deadlines.
Leadership and team management experience.
Strong attention to detail and organization skills.
WHY US!
1. Community of professionals who work with integrity and devotion
Professional financial working environment.
Working with initiative, creativity and challenges.
2. Competency - based compensation
Competitive and attractive compensation package based on performance and contribution.
Receive the deducted income if passing the probation (2-month probationary period with 85% salary) and annual salary review.
Social/ Medical/ Unemployment insurances.
Premium insurances: Healthcare insurance and 24/24 personal accident insurance.
3. Organization with vibrant and learning – centralized culture
Open working space with modern equipment.
Diverse, energertic internal and volunteer activities.

title:
Category Management Analyst, Shopee
- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentBusiness Development and Partnerships
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Business Development and Partnerships teams at Shopee are dynamic and energetic. The teams are always looking to acquire business opportunities to drive Shopee to be the No. 1 e-commerce platform in Southeast Asia and Taiwan. The aim of the Business Development and Partnership teams is to provide Shopee’s buyers with a wide variety of product listings at the best prices.
Job Description:
Translate data into valuable insights and present results and recommendations
Evaluate market conditions and competitor data to identify emerging trends and to recommend learnings and action points to optimize results
Identify new commercial opportunities through deep analysis and innovative research methods
Regularly review and analyze key commercial metrics to develop report, drive continual optimization and improve campaign efficiency
Provides data-driven, actionable insights and recommendations for improving social media engagement, acquisition, retention and conversion across all channels
Supports additional projects as requested for the Category
Requirements:
Minimum Bachelors Degree in Marketing, BBA or related fields from well-known universities
1 - 2 years experienced, e-commerce industry would be a plus
Strong communication skills in both written and verbal format
Good command of English
Good team player, positive attitude and eager to learn
Creative, well-organised and self-motivated
Proficiency in Microsoft Excel, Word and PowerPoint
Extra skills in Adobe Photoshop & Adobe Illustrator is an advantage

title:
THÔNG BÁO : Tuyển dụng vị trí Chuyên viên Digital Marketing
- job post
description:
Nhằm đáp ứng nhu cầu phát triển, mở rộng hoạt động kinh doanh, Công ty Cổ phần Dược Phẩm Hà Tây thông báo tuyển dụng như sau:

Mô tả công việc:
Hoạch định kế hoạch, phân tích và thực hiện hoạt động Digital Marketing, Social Media:
Phụ trách phát triển các chương trình PR, quảng cáo trên trên các phương tiện truyền thông online để quảng bá thương hiệu và các sản phẩm của Công ty.
Lập kế hoạch SEO, SEM, Google Adwords tối ưu hóa thứ hạng của website Công ty trên các trang tìm kiếm. Thường xuyên thống kê và phân tích từ khóa định kỳ.
Định vị và phát triển thương hiệu và sản phẩm trên các website, forum, facebook, wordpress... và các mạng xã hội khác,…
Triển khai quảng bá qua Email Marketing và Mobile Marketing.
Viết tin, bài quảng bá và chịu trách nhiệm quản lý nội dung website của Công ty.
Thu thập, phân tích thông tin thị trường, thông tin về sản phẩm, thông tin về các chương trình Digital Marketing, Social Media của đối thủ cạnh tranh.
Đề xuất và thực hiện các chương trình khuyến mại, truyền thông, quảng bá và xây dựng thương hiệu cho công ty và các sản phẩm của công ty.
Thực hiện các công việc hỗ trợ khách hàng tiếp cận với sản phẩm trên Fanpage; website Công ty, giải đáp thông tin về sản phẩm cho khách hàng.
Làm việc với Nhà cung cấp, tư vấn cho cấp trên lựa chọn Nhà cung cấp tốt nhất với chi phí hợp lý nhất.
Các công việc khác sẽ trao đổi khi phỏng vấn.
Yêu cầu tuyển dụng:
Tốt nghiệp đại học chuyên ngành Marketing/ Kinh tế/ Công nghệ thông tin…hoặc các ngành có liên quan.
Có kinh nghiệm ít nhất 2 năm trong lĩnh vực Digital Marketing, Social Media.
Có kiến thức về internet, sử dụng thành thạo công cụ đăng bài trên web, có hiểu biết về HTLM, biết SEO và Code web là một lợi thế.
Có khả năng học hỏi nhanh, thường xuyên cập nhật các kiến thức mới đáp ứng công việc.
Có khả năng làm việc nhóm và làm việc độc lập
Chịu được áp lực công việc.
Nhanh nhẹn, hoạt bát.
Quyền lợi được hưởng
Lương thỏa thuận theo năng lực.
Được tham gia đầy đủ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN ngay sau khi được tuyển dụng chính thức
Được hưởng đầy đủ các chính sách theo Luật lao động Việt Nam
Được tặng quà sinh nhật, chế độ nghỉ mát và các chính sách phúc lợi khác của Công ty.
Được làm việc trong môi trường làm việc thân thiện, năng động, chuyên nghiệp và nhiều cơ hội phát triển, thăng tiến.
Được trang bị các vật dụng cần thiết theo yêu cầu để thực hiện công việc.
Hồ sơ ứng tuyển bao gồm:
Đơn ứng tuyển
CV theo mẫu của Công ty gửi vào mail: minhducdht1971@gmail.com hoặc nộp hồ sơ giấy tại Phòng TCHC – Số 10A Quang Trung, Hà Đông, Hà Nội. Liên hệ Mr Đức – TP. TCHC: 0433 824 489
Hạn nộp hồ sơ: Hết ngày 26/5/2017

title:
Chuyên viên Marketing
- job post
company: Cơ Quan Xúc Tiến Thương Mại Và Đầu Tư Hàn Quốc KOTRA Hanoi
description:
Giới thiệu:
KOTRA- Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency (https://kotra.or.kr), trực thuộc Bộ Thương mại Công nghiệp và Năng lượng Hàn Quốc, ra đời nămvà có mặt trên 69 quốc gia trên thế giới. KOTRA giữ vai trò là người dẫn đường trong hoạt động xúc tiến thương mại và đầu tư của Hàn Quốc và cung cấp các dịch vụ hỗ trợ kinh doanh và đầu tư ở nước ngoài cho các doanh nghiệp Hàn Quốc.KOTRA Hanoi được thành lập nămvà hiện nay là trụ sở chính của khu vực Đông Nam Á và Châu Đại Dương.
Giới Thiệu
KOTRA- Korea Trade-Investment Promotion Agency ( www.kotra.or.kr ), trực thuộc Bộ Thương mại Công nghiệp và Năng lượng Hàn Quốc, ra đời năm 1962 và có mặt trên 69 quốc gia trên thế giới. KOTRA giữ vai trò là người dẫn đường trong hoạt động xúc tiến thương mại và đầu tư của Hàn Quốc và cung cấp các dịch vụ hỗ trợ kinh doanh và đầu tư ở nước ngoài cho các doanh nghiệp Hàn Quốc.
KOTRA Hanoi được thành lập năm 1996 và hiện nay là trụ sở chính của khu vực Đông Nam Á và Châu Đại Dương

[KOTRA] Recruitment Announcement
Marketingsales (Marketing 2 Team)

Job Description
Salary : VND 12,500000 (Gross salary based on experience)
Term of Contract : from 1st June, 2023 to 31st July, 2023 (extendable to 31st December, 2023 based on performance)
Working as member of Marketing 2 Team
Telesales + Direct Sales + Market Research + Buyer Search for Korean Companies
Find and maintain contact with potential customers (business counterparty or buyer)
Consult potential customers with product information and keep mutual connection between Korean and Vietnamese buyers
Writing report about relevant industry and product, buyer search and meetings arrangement
Finding order inquiry, collecting data statistics
Working Days : 5 days a week (Monday~Friday)
Working Hours : 8:30 ~ 17:30
Working Place : Mainly Hanoi
Compensation benefit : Social Insurance Contribution
Only shortlisted candidate will be notified for an interview.
This recruitment shall be governed by the local law.
Job Requirements
Have good skills of negotiation, problem solving, communication and stress management
Be responsible of, good working attitude, active, enthusiastic, good level of ethics and honest
Have good knowledge of International Trade and Marketing
Can work under pressure, and be a good team player
Can write a report in English
Those who have no reason to be disqualified for a trip to Korea or abroad
Those who can legally work in Vietnam
Working Experience : None
Communication in English or Fluent in Korean
Degree : Bachelor or above
Major : International Trade or Marketing related preferred
If there is a false fact in the document, employment shall be revoked.
*** If there is no qualified candidate, we may not hire.
The Title of the attached file should be “ CV-MarketingSales-Your Full Name ”

Lương: 12500K VND một tháng
Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian
Yêu cầu: Chứng Minh Nhân Dân (CMND), Cover Letter
Quyền lợi: Chế độ bảo hiểm
Hạn nộp: 2023-12-05
Kinh nghiệm: Không yêu cầu kinh nghiệm làm việc
Bằng cấp: Đại học
Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Marketing
Số lượng cần tuyển: 5

title:
Marketing Lead
- job post
description:
Mức Lương: 10 - 15 triệu VNĐ
Xây dựng chiến lực, sáng tạo nội dung để phát triển hệ thống Social (Facebook, Instagram ... ETC )
Lên kế hoạch Marketing cụ thể cho Tuần, Tháng chi tiết bằng PP
Theo dõi, nghiên cứu và phân tích hoạt động của các đối thủ cạnh trên trên thị trường trên các kênh Social Media
Thu nhập, phân tích số liệu và Insight của người dùng trên các trang mạng xã hội để tối ưu hợp lý nhất có thể
Báo cáo, phân tích hiệu quả qua các Campaign/ tuần để đánh giá hiệu quả và có phương án, đề xuất cụ thể cho công ty
Dẫn Dắt Team để sản xuất ra được các hình ảnh chất lượng và phù hợp với chiến dịch
Quản lý website Công ty, chịu trách nhiệm về hình ảnh và nội dung được cập nhật mới nhất
Phân tích, đánh giá và báo cáo hiệu quả theo tuần, tháng, theo từng chiến dịch.
Chức Vụ : Marketing Leader
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi:
- Thu nhập: (lương cứng 10-15tr) + KPI
- Hệ thống KPIs rõ ràng, minh bạch
- Định hướng phát triển nghề nghiệp theo năng lực cá nhân. Sẵn sàng thưởng và tăng lương khi hoàn thành tốt nhiệm vụ.
- Được làm việc trong môi trường làm việc trẻ trung, năng động, sáng tạo, nhiều cơ hội thăng tiến và phát triển toàn diện tại công ty. Ban lãnh đạo trẻ trung, chuyên môn cao, luôn quan tâm, lắng nghe ý kiến nhân viên.
- Hưởng các chính sách ưu đãi mua hàng dành riêng cho CBNV.
- Được nghỉ và thưởng các ngày lễ - tết đầy đủ theo quy định Công ty.
- Công ty thường xuyên có các hoạt động giao lưu, liên hoan, teambuilding, du lịch định kỳ hằng năm, tiệc tổ chức sinh nhật,...
- Thử việc: 2 tháng nhận 85% lương
Yêu cầu bằng cấp ( tối thiểu ): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
Ứng viên có kinh nghiệm từ 2-3 năm từng làm vị trí tương tự
Tốt nghiệp Đại học, chuyên ngành MKT/ Báo chí, truyền thông hoặc các chuyên ngành liên quan
Có thể chịu được áp lực cao
Chủ động, sáng tạo trong công việc
KPI cụ thể rõ ràng minh bạch cho từng tháng
Kỹ năng giao tiếp và làm việc nhóm tốt
Tinh thần trách nhiệm
Thông tin liên hệ:
Gửi CV qua email: vulturevn.co@gmail.com

title:
Partnership & Brand Communication Specialist (6 Months)
- job post
company: Công Ty TNHH Thương Mại Dịch Vụ Vexere
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: Thỏa thuận)
Responsible for partnership development strategy and execution to grow sale and drive new business opportunities (60%)
Reaching out to potential clients to sell vouchers, collaborate across-marketing, promotion, select payment gateway services…and maintain positive long-term relationships
Analyze and negotiate payment gateway fees and contracts for business
Identify and develop new business opportunities
Coordinate with internal & external stakeholders to track, manage performance business and brand
Be in charge of communication activities to enhance brand awareness, trust, and health. (40%)
Research and analyze market, customer trends, and competitor to propose new initiatives
Build plan and implement PR, activation, events, branding activities BTL, ATL, OOH
Create plan and implement influencers activities: develop creative campaign, booking, work with agency, KOL,…to deliver brand message and product USP
Closely work with internal & external stakeholders to ensure high-quality delivery of communication campaign and make sure all materials are consistent with brand positioning, brand image, guideline, product USP
Create templates to collect and analyze data, track and monitor performance, budget
Conduct research to measure and monitor brand health and awareness
Chức vụ: Nhân Viên/Chuyên Viên
Hình thức làm việc: Toàn thời gian
Quyền lợi được hưởng:
Competitive salary + KPI-based quarterly bonuses (up to 8 months per year).
Annual General Health Check
Opportunity to become a full-time employee with a long-term labor contract (based on performance)
Flexible workplace without timekeeping, hybrid working, and democratic environment
Opportunities to take initiatives, make an impact and become a true leader/ permanent staff
Entrepreneurial environment with young and ambitious colleagues
Up to 30% discount for Vexere members and their family/relatives when buying bus tickets to travel within Vietnam
Company trips, Teambuilding, Year-end party, and other festivities
Other benefits are further discussed at the final interview
Yêu cầu bằng cấp (tối thiểu): Đại Học
Yêu cầu công việc:
At least 2 – 3 years of experience in planning & running marketing campaigns (Branding & Promotion campaigns), mar-com activities.
Good working knowledge of various marketing channels
Strong project management & communication skills
Strong analytical, negotiation and problem-solving skills
Excellent logical skill, creative, proactive
Yêu cầu giới tính: Nam/Nữ
Ngành nghề: Quản Trị Thương Hiệu (Branding),Quảng Cáo/Marketing,Truyền Thông/Báo Chí,Truyền Thông/PR

2 - 3 năm

Sản xuất nội dung ấn phẩm, tư liệu phục vụ việc quảng bá thương hiệu;
Lập báo cáo, theo dõi và phân tích chỉ số nhận diện thương hiệu hiệu quả.

Yêu Cầu Công Việc
Tốt nghiệp Đại học loại Khá trở lên các chuyên ngành về Marketing,... hoặc các chuyên ngành có liên quan;
Có từ 03 - 05 năm kinh nghiệm trở lên liên quan đến công việc
Ngoại ngữ: Tiếng Anh giao tiếp lưu loát. Ưu tiên ứng viên có thêm ngoại ngữ khác (Tiếng Hoa, Tiếng Nhật, Tiếng Hàn)
Thành thạo vi tính văn phòng: Excel, Word, Power Point,...
Kỹ năng làm việc độc lập, làm việc nhóm.
Kỹ năng xử lý vấn đề, giải quyết công việc.
Thông tin liên hệ:
Phòng Tuyển dụng Tập đoàn Hoa Sen
Địa chỉ: Số 183 Nguyễn Văn Trỗi, P.10, Q. Phú Nhuận, TP. HCM
Hotline: 0332.116.161
Email: tuyendung@hoasengroup.vn

title:
Marketing Manager - ABM Specialist (VN)
- job post
description:
Are you someone looking to join a company that’s making a positive impact on the world. If you want to be part of something bigger than all of us, then please check out this opportunity!

About Sharesource:
We are a social enterprise dedicated to connecting global opportunities with talented individuals. Currently, we serve Australian clients and aim to empower businesses to thrive by accessing the talent they need worldwide. Our mission is to support individuals in achieving success in their careers while fostering a company culture that embodies our values.

https://www.sharesource.com.au/
What are we looking for?
As the Marketing Manager - Account Based Marketing Specialist, you will play a crucial role in driving the success of our ABM initiatives. You will work closely with the sales team to identify high-value accounts, create personalised content, and execute targeted campaigns. Your ability to leverage marketing automation tools and CRM software will be essential in tracking and optimising campaign performance.
What are you expected to do?
Plan and execute account-based marketing campaigns using channels such as email, social media, webinars, and events
Collaborate with the sales team to identify high-value accounts and develop customised content and promotional materials
Monitor and analyse account engagement, continuously optimising campaigns for maximum ROI
Utilise CRM and marketing automation tools (e.g., Salesforce, HubSpot) to track account activity and assess campaign effectiveness
Develop detailed account profiles and personas to create highly targeted messaging
Generate reports on ABM performance metrics to share with stakeholders
Manage the budget and resources effectively to ensure efficient campaign execution
You’ll be a great fit if:
2-5 years of experience in account-based marketing (must have international experience, preferably Australian)
Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Business, or a related field
2-5 years of experience in B2B marketing (must have international experience, preferably Australian)
Proficiency in CRM software like Salesforce, HubSpot, or equivalent
Exceptional written and verbal communication skills
Strong project management skills with the ability to manage multiple projects concurrently
Analytical mindset, comfortable with data analysis and reporting
Self-starter with a strong work ethic
Here are your benefits from joining our team:
Competitive salary and professional development
Collaborative client partnerships and a fun, inclusive work environment
Opportunities for leadership, expertise, and global client exposure
Monthly coaching, training, and career development
Remote work flexibility and a flexible hybrid model
Engage in social impact activities and industry impact
Achieve work-life balance and flexibility to support personal commitments
Benefit package such as: 15 annual leave days/year, 13 months of salary, insurance based on full salary
___________________
Why work for Sharesource?
Our clients come from all walks of life and so do we. We hire hundreds of skillful individuals from a wide variety of backgrounds, genders, ages, and personalities to live out our diverse culture and make a positive impact on the world!
Our 5 Values:
Make a social impact: We balance between our work for client teams and for the society by constantly making good impacts.
Be proactive: We encourage brave thinking, continuous improvement, and drive change through action.
Create value: We create measurable values for our stakeholders: our teams, partners, suppliers, investors, and communities.
Be fair, open and honest: We foster equality and inclusivity in a supportive environment that embraces diversity and celebrates achievements.
Add fun, passion and love: We prioritise fun and passion, fostering higher engagement and a positive can-do attitude.
What makes us different?
Our culture code. You will be a part of our vibrant company culture and experience a workplace where your contributions are valued, your growth is encouraged, and your opinion is respected:
Challenged, autonomous, momentum
Learning, growth mindset
Lead by our values
Heard, cared for, make good friends
___________________
What happens after you submit your application?
The whole process takes around 4 weeks:
There will be 3-4 interviews and a possible assessment from our client partner. You will undergo an initial interview, a culture interview, and 1-2 interviews with our cool client. This will run for about 1-2 weeks but we will let you know if we need to ramp it up. Be yourself and have fun.
We will constantly communicate with you as to the development of your application. You can also directly communicate with us to ask us about the status of your application.
If all goes well, we complete the reference check and provide other necessary requirements so we can offer you the job right away.
We would be grateful if you have these already:

Health Check Up
Identification Card/Passport
Social Insurance Number
Personal Income Tax Number
Character references with contact info
At Sharesource, we believe in the value of diversity and inclusion. We are committed to creating a diverse, respectful, and inclusive workplace, and we do not discriminate based on factors such as race, gender, religion, sexual orientation, or disability.

title:
Associate Marketing Manager, Game Entertainment,
- job post
description:
VNGGames is Vietnam’s No.1 mobile game publisher by gross revenue. Our focus is on delivering the most engaging content and experience to our global community of gamers, fans and publishers.
We partner with leading global game developers such as Tencent and Kingsoft, publish their hardcore online games for users across Southeast Asia and Greater China, and help to grow the popularity of the games in each market by leveraging our publishing and marketing capabilities, unapparelled local knowledge and technical know-how.
We develop and publish proprietary mobile card and board games for casual gamers through our ZingPlay platform in various markets across Southeast Asia and Latin America, including India, Brazil, Argentina and Mexico.
Self-developed and published 60+ mobile card and board games
ZingPlay ranked No.1 in mobile card and board games genre among peer companies in LatAm in 2021
People and technology are at the core of VNG’s identity. We are committed to the growth and well-being of our employees and focused on creating a stimulating environment where employees feel inspired to be their best to unlock their full potential.
Join us to explore the best place in Vietnam for people to work, learn and grow.
As a Marketing (Brand) Manager, your role involves various responsibilities related to:
Develop content strategies and manages marketing campaigns from conceptualisation to implementation across all platforms
Develop branding strategies and ensuring brand consistency across the organisation’s platforms.
Develop & manage marketing strategies and plans:
Develop integrated marketing and communications strategies
Manage social media platforms and review alignment of other digital marketing channels with branding strategies
Review brand consistency issues in collaterals across digital marketing platforms
Develop branding strategies to enhance brand reputation based on current brand positions and market awareness
Develop branding implementation plans to align with branding strategies
Manage marketing and communication channels
Develop communication channels for stakeholders on industry/ product updates
Review effectiveness of all communication channels and identify areas of improvement
Develop marketing communications plans and content marketing initiatives across digital platforms
Manage marketing campaigns and events
Facilitate cross-functional collaboration across departments for the development of integrated marketing campaigns
Develop content strategy aligned with short-term and long-term marketing goals
Review developed campaign collaterals to ensure alignment with marketing campaign themes
Manage implementation of the multi-channel marketing campaigns in line with marketing objectives and strategy
Develop measures to improve future marketing campaigns based on identified areas of improvement
Yêu cầu
3+ years of experience in Marketing, Branding, Communications, and/or Content and Social.

1. Functional Competencies:
Ability to scale between big picture strategic thinking and tactical executional planning, with strong attention to detail
Strong presentation and organizational skills, to capture and cascade information that provides values to internal and external stakeholders; ability to clarify and summarize complicated concepts
Able to align a diverse group of stakeholders with conflicting priorities; ability to work in a remote and collaborative environment with teams in different time zones
2. Softskills/ Leadership Competencies
Self-motivated problem solver; adaptive and willing to challenge yourself and try new things;
Analytical and able to think strategically about issues, leading to recommendations and action plans
Exceptional written and verbal English language skills
English language skills of at least IELTS 6.5

title:
Branding & Communication Specialist (Vietnam, E-Commerce)
- job post
description:
Responsibilities
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us

Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.

Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.

At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.

Join us.

The e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies, and its future growth cannot be underestimated.

With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users. We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our Integrated Marketing Team, together we can build an e-commerce ecosystem that is innovative, secure and intuitive for our users.

We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our E-Commerce Integrated Marketing team. In this role, you are expected to build and develop marketing plans for TikTok Shop to boost both brand equity and business

Responsibilities:
Deeply understand audience insight, including: shopper, seller, creator etc.. and market insights to discuss, brainstorm and input for Marketing annual plan/activities/execution of brand plan
Lead in planning and executing marketing activities to build brand equity and meet business objectives, including but not limited to: mega campaigns, TikTok Shopping Center campaigns, seller/creator programs, CSR activities, etc
Be champion of trend & competitor monitoring under agile e-commerce landscape and execute rapid responses to stay competitive
Execute flawless brand experience across touch points with on time-in full manner
Monitor and evaluate brand performance to recommend both ATL and BTL activities to win the battle.
Coordinate with cross-functions: local teams (Campaign, Creator, Merchants..), regional teams (Marketing, Product...), and external teams (agencies) and ensure project deliverables
Accountable for budget analysis and management
Qualifications
At least 4 years working in Marketing, Communications, or a related field.
Well understand marketing principles and be able to implement MKT activities/tool properly such as creative asset production, social communication, media, KOL and PR etc.
Proven track record in planning and executing marketing campaigns - give example for TTS Tet campaign
Creativity and strong design sensibilities.
Can-do attitude with clear point of view and influencing skill, delivering the results and able to make change
Flexibility to adapt to evolving trends and priorities.
Excellent at project management & communication.
TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

title:

description:
Job Descriptions:
Assists in the development of the Brand Marketing Plan by developing an understanding of the drivers of brand growth and brand health and identifying key issues and opportunities;
Lead innovation/activation projects deployment and the integrated activity schedule ensuring consistency with Brand Key Vision and Brand Vision Plan including communication strategy;

Strong business mindset, analytical power and good communication skill
Passion to growth and strong time management skill to work in a changeable environment, ability to manage workload and multiple projects
Open-minded, practical creativity and result-oriented

Unilever is an organisation committed to equity, inclusion and diversity to drive our business results and create a better future, every day, for our diverse employees, global consumers, partners, and communities. title:
Business Development Executive (Key Account)
- job post

Senior Manager / Director - Marketing & Commerce (Automotive Industry) 1
- job post
description:
Senior Manager / Director - Marketing & Commerce (Automotive Industry) 1
Date: 22 Nov 2023
Type of Employment: Permanent Full Time
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, Ho Chi Minh City, VN
Hanoi, Hanoi, VN
At Deloitte, we offer a unique and exceptional career experience to inspire and empower talents like you to make an impact that matters for our clients, people and community. Deloitte offers you a highly inclusive, collaborative workplace and unrivalled opportunities to realize your full potential. We are always looking for people with the relentless energy to push themselves further, and to find new avenues and unique ways to reach our shared goals.

Work you will do
This role sits within the Customer and Marketing (C&M) team of Deloitte Southeast Asia, which is a part of Deloitte that uses technology and creativity to better connect the customer with the business.
Better known as Deloitte Digital, we use emergent technology to imagine, deliver, and run entirely new business futures. We create innovative ventures, digital platforms, and more meaningful experiences.
As part of Marketing and Commerce (M&C), you will work with team to help our clients with their Creative Design and Innovation, Advertising and Branding, Digital Marketing, Digital Commerce and Customer Experience Platform


You will:
Responsible for developing and implementing segment marketing strategies and programs across the region, with a focus on the automotive sector.
Through tight alignment with the sales, business and product organizations, develop and lead on market expansion initiatives to unlock new revenue channels, provide valuable market and customer insights for business growth. Be a key advisor to M&C on go-to-market strategies.
With regional business and marketing directions in mind, the role will define our business plans to tap into the growth potential in the region with alignment to the go-to-market plan.
Communicate plans across cross-functional teams, execute and monitor success. Provide counsel and insight to the team and corporate campaign marketing in the design of marketing initiatives.
Understand and identify key market opportunities. Deliver coordinated marketing programs to get results with good customer experience. Work with regional heads of Digital functional team, corporate marketing, country sales to plan a wide range of programs. Successfully driving the execution of those programs in the country.
Lead marketing insights projects by analyzing client channel strategy, data and performance and effectively communicating findings
Help clients identify the right marketing key performance indicators (KPIs), highlight areas of improvement, and influence strategy
Build strong relationships with client digital and marketing leaders to provide strategic advice on channel expansion, optimization, and business growth
Lead junior team members by coaching them to both provide leverage on projects and grow their technical and communication skills
Accountable for leading a cross functional team to put in place a marketing management system to enable target setting and performance tracking.
Manage sales to fulfil vertical revenue with a focus on pipeline development, management, and closure to meet targets
Develop cross-sector go-to-market strategy in close alignment with M&C Service Offering.

Your role as a leader
Lead and act as an exemplary role model for leaders at all levels, whilst continuously promoting a sense of loyalty and energizes others to act.
Build and sustain a high performance culture by cultivating and amplifying individual and team strengths.
Develop and sustain long-term, trust-based relationships with stakeholders, clients and team.
Manage the sustainable development of a strong pipeline of talent for current and future success, by driving a talent experience that differentiates Deloitte.
Lead behavioral and cultural change through a supportive, collaborative and highly inclusive environment where team members feels supported, respected and engaged.

Enough about us, let's talk about you
If you are someone with:
Tertiary qualification in a relevant technology, business, or marketing discipline.
Strong background in selling and delivering E-commerce and/or Marketing based projects, including experience with the automotive sector
Ability to bring, build industry and partner network to build and drive business growth. Strong track record in building, managing / exceeding sales target
Experience in designing and implementing Martech or commerce technologies in an enterprise or consulting environment.
Experience designing and implementing technology-enabled business solutions in client-facing and team leadership roles (e.g. Programme lead, business transformation lead, solution architect, project manager). Experience defining, developing requirements, designing and prototyping, testing, training, defining support procedures, and implementing practical business solutions.
Experience in selling professional services
Ability to fostering strong relationships and operating rhythms with leaders inside and outside client and product team to implement effective user experiences.
Willing to push beyond the current capabilities and find the best solution for the business and our customers.
Drive, tenacity, client focused and results oriented.
Proven demonstration of sound business acumen, teamwork and leadership qualities.
An appreciation of the consulting lifestyle and ability to travel (both locally and abroad)

Next Steps
So what are you waiting for? Join the winning team now.

Due to volume of applications, we regret only shortlisted candidates will be notified.
#LI-AZ
Requisition ID: 101379
In Vietnam, the services are provided by Deloitte Vietnam Company Limited and other related entities in Vietnam ("Deloitte in Vietnam"), which are affiliates of Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd. Deloitte Southeast Asia Ltd is a member firm of Deloitte Touche Tohmatsu Limited. Deloitte in Vietnam, which is within the Deloitte Network, is the entity that is providing this Website.

Yêu Cầu Công Việc

Tối thiểu 10 năm kinh nghiệm liên quan trong lĩnh vực triển khai digital Marketing, trong đó có 5 năm kinh nghiệm quản lý trở lên, team tối thiểu 10 người.

Có kinh nghiệm xây dựng chiến lược ngắn hạn, dài hạn và triển khai quản trị, vận hành chiến lược Marketing

Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với đối tác quốc tế, đa văn hóa hoặc tại các thị trường quốc tế là 1 lợi thế
HƯỚNG DẪN NỘP HỒ SƠ
Đặt tên file Đơn đăng ký ứng tuyển như sau: HO - Khối NHS - QL Digital Marketing - Họ và tên
Ứng tuyển hồ sơ trực tiếp tại website hoặc gửi Đơn đăng ký ứng tuyển về địa chỉ email tuyendung@lpbank.com.vn với tiêu đề thư như sau: HO - Khối NHS - QL Digital Marketing - Họ và tên
Yêu cầu: Hồ sơ hợp lệ là hồ sơ theo mẫu của Ngân hàng, định dạng file excel và đặt tên file theo đúng hướng dẫn trên.
LPBank có quyền từ chối tuyển dụng đối với các ứng viên nộp hồ sơ không theo quy định của LPBank hoặc ứng viên khai thông tin không chính xác.
LƯU Ý:
Căn cứ số lượng, chất lượng ứng viên ứng tuyển, yêu cầu công việc,… Ngân hàng sẽ thông báo đến các ứng viên đủ điều kiện theo quy định để tham gia các vòng tuyển dụng (ứng viên không nhận được thông tin mời tuyển dụng từ Ngân hàng được hiểu là chưa phù hợp/chưa đáp ứng yêu cầu tuyển dụng).
Việc tuyển dụng tại Ngân hàng Bưu điện Liên Việt là hoàn toàn công bằng, minh bạch, khách quan, không qua bất cứ cá nhân trung gian và không thu bất cứ khoản chi phí tuyển dụng nào.
Các ứng viên đạt vòng sơ tuyển (sơ loại, thi nghiệp vụ....) sẽ được Ngân hàng liên hệ mời tham dự vòng tiếp theo thông qua điện thoại/Email/tin nhắn SMS...Kết quả tuyển dụng sẽ được thông báo đến từng ứng viên tham gia dự tuyển bằng Email sau khi kết thúc chương trình tuyển dụng từ 7 - 10 ngày.
Trường hợp Ông/Bà phải mất bất cứ chi phí nào trong quá trình tuyển dụng, xin vui lòng phản ánh trực tiếp tới địa chỉ email: thongbaotuyendung@lpbank.com.vn
Trường hợp Ông/Bà phải mất chi phí tiêu cực trong quá trình tuyển dụng mà không thông báo cho Ngân hàng và/hoặc Ngân hàng phát hiện ra, Ngân hàng sẽ từ chối tuyển dụng (đối với trường hợp đã trúng tuyển nhưng chưa tiếp nhận) hoặc buộc thôi việc (đối với các trường hợp đã tiếp nhận), kể cả với trường hợp bên nhận chi phí đang là CBNV của Ngân hàng.

Được học hỏi, lĩnh hội những kiến thức chuyên sâu.

Được thử sức trong môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, thử thách và nâng cao trình độ bản thân.

title:
Associate Trade Marketing Manager - Consumer Health
- job post
description:
Associate Trade Marketing Manager




Global Job purpose

Associate Trade Marketing Manager (TMG) is responsible for developing and coordinating implementation all trade marketing plans & activities at Modern Trade Channel, Pharmacy Chain Key Accounts & E commerce
The Jobholder ensures the translation of Marketing and Company strategy into Channel strategy and business plan in coordination with Sales departments for implementation. The Jobholder also need to ensure the trade strategy is following Customer Excellence standard for assigned channel

The TMG must collaborate closely with MT Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, Medical Affairs, Legal, QA, Distribution.

This position reports directly to the Head of Trade MKT (HoTM) of Vietnam Consumer Health and is a key role within the Vietnam Consumer Health Commercial Team.

Geographical scope - Vietnam


Major tasks and responsibilities

Trade Marketing Operations

Channel dedication
Identifies growth opportunities for Modern Trade, Pharmacy Chain KAM, Ecommerce, New channel
Develops and submits the annual plan of business plan and trade promotional activities by brand, period, and price for above channels in cooperation with the MT sales department and Marketing department
Develop JBP plan base win-win partnership, in collaboration with MT Sales & Marketing
Manage, tracking, evaluate the trade spending in MT & KAM to be more effectively and aligned with channel strategy
Work closely with the cross-functional team – Sales, Marketing, Supply Chain, Medical Affairs, Legal, QA, and Distribution to flawlessly execute fully integrated marketing thematic campaigns
Align with Digital & Marketing to ensure consistency in brand communication at point of sale of KAM
Optimize in-store execution and presentation of Bayer CH brands to drive brand preference, increase conversion and basket size through best-in-class assortment, promotions, and merchandising in MT & KAM
Ensure trade merchandising guidelines and category management principles are being followed in the trade (POSM, Right Planogram for MT channel/PH Chain).
Ensure all trade activations comply with Bayer compliance standards and are cost-effective and executed within the defined budget.

Customer Management
Work with sales team to deliver customer-centric solutions supported with strong shopper and consumer insights.
Apply Net Revenue Management principles to drive profitability in customer trading terms

Net Revenue Management
Align & sync with HoTM on trade term (GTN and P&I for Trade) budget spending to ensure maximum cost effectiveness and profitability for MT, PH chain KAM and Ecommerce
Review the return on investment for all projects pre- and post- implementation to ensure profitability and draw learning’s for future activations.
Trade spend planning and tracking vs actual trade spend for assigned channel

Reporting and Analytics
Work with sales team to consolidate standard reports on distribution and availability, Bayer CH trade activations and competitive intelligence.
Be a strategic thought partner to the sales and marketing team to identify actionable emerging market and shopper trends and capitalize on account-specific sales opportunities.

Work relations

Internal partners: Country Division Head, HoTM, Sales, Marketing, Controlling, Supply Chain, QA, Medical, RA, LPC, HR
External partners : Trade / business partners – Distributor and 3rd party partners (ie. Pharma chaines and other key retail establishments)

Qualifications (education, skills, experiences)

Bachelor’s Degree or higher qualifications in business administration or related courses.
Minimum 5 years working experience, with at least 3 years in trade marketing. and at least 2 years experience at the supervisory level
Minimum 3 years working experience with Modern Trade/Pharmacy Chain/Ecommerce
Strong leadership and people management skills directly leading a team
Excellent verbal, written, negotiation, and interpersonal communications skills
High level of commercial acumen, with strong analytical and presentation skills


Local regulations and legal requirements vary per country of hire and will be discussed with considered candidates individually based on their potential of hire.

Bayer is an Equal Opportunity Employer/Disabled/Veterans



Bayer is committed to providing access and reasonable accommodations in its application process for individuals with disabilities and encourages applicants with disabilities to request any needed accommodation(s) using the contact information below.



If you meet the requirements of this unique opportunity, and want to impact our mission Science for a better life, we encourage you to apply now. Job postings will remain open for a minimum of ten business days and are subject to immediate closure thereafter without additional notice.


IMPORTANT NOTE for POTENTIAL CANADIAN CANDIDATES: This position requires full vaccination against COVID-19.


IMPORTANT NOTE for POTENTIAL GERMAN CANDIDATES: Applications from employees in Germany who may be affected by personnel reduction will treated favorably from other candidates in Germany.


IMPORTANT NOTE for POTENTIAL US CANDIDATES: Bayer expects its employees to be fully vaccinated against COVID-19. Bayer active employees are also expected to disclose their vaccination status and if fully vaccinated, provide proof of vaccination status to Occupational Medicine. Bayer defines fully vaccinated in alignment with CDC which is two weeks after completing the two-dose vaccine regimen or two weeks after completing the one-dose regimen. Additionally, Bayer employees are also required to comply with state, local and customer requirements.

title:
THÔNG BÁO Vv: Tuyển dụng vị trí Trưởng nhóm Admin
- job post
description:
Nhằm đáp ứng nhu cầu phát triển, mở rộng hoạt động kinh doanh Công ty Cổ phần Dược Phẩm Hà Tây thông báo tuyển dụng như sau:
Mô tả công việc:
Kiểm soát thông tin hoạt động kinh doanh toàn hệ thống
Lập kế hoạch tiếp nhận và quản lý toàn bộ yêu cầu, đơn đặt hàng từ đội ngũ kinh doanh ở các địa bàn theo từng giai đoạn tháng/quý/năm.
Là đầu mối kiểm soát toàn bộ dữ liệu thông tin kinh doanh trên hệ thống (danh sách khách hàng, mục tiêu, chỉ tiêu kinh doanh, hàng bán, khuyến mại, công nợ…)
Lưu trữ các tài liệu kinh doanh, thương mại, hợp đồng của Công ty một cách có hệ thống.
Thực hiện các báo cáo, phân tích dữ liệu kinh doanh định kì làm cơ sở hỗ trợ Trưởng phòng ra các quyết định kinh doanh kịp thời.
Trợ giúp hoạt động kinh doanh Công ty
Trợ giúp, tham mưu cho Trưởng phòng trong việc bao quát, kiểm soát toàn bộ quá trình triển khai hoạt động kinh doanh Công ty tại các đơn vị.
Hỗ trợ thúc đẩy việc đảm bảo tiến độ, hiệu quả thực hiện các mục tiêu, kế hoạch kinh doanh.
Xây dựng tuyến làm việc hiệu quả cho đội ngũ bán hàng.
Đánh giá hiệu quả hoạt động của đội ngũ bán hàng, hoạt động kinh doanh và Marketing.
Tổng hợp toàn bộ thông tin thị trường về đối thủ cạnh tranh, chương trình, giá, dịch vụ của đối thủ ở các địa bàn nhằm tư vấn cho Trưởng phòng về chương trình, chính sách kinh doanh phù hợp cho từng đơn vị.
Các công việc khác sẽ trao đổi khi phỏng vấn.
Yêu cầu tuyển dụng:
1. Kiến thức:
Tốt nghiệp Cử nhân kinh tế chuyên ngành Kế toán, quản trị kinh doanh, …
Có từ 3 đến 5 năm kinh nghiệm làm việc ở vị trí tương đương
Ưu tiên ứng viên đã từng làm việc tại các Công ty trong lĩnh vực phân phối dược phẩm hoặc FMCG.
2. Kỹ năng:
Thành thạo vi tính văn phòng (Word, Excel, Power Point,…)
Kỹ năng giao tiếp, thuyết phục tốt.
Kỹ năng phân tích, giải quyết vấn đề tốt.
Có khả năng làm việc độc lập và theo nhóm.
Có khả năng làm việc dưới môi trường nhiều áp lực.
Có phong cách/ tác phong làm việc chuyên nghiệp.
3. Tố chất:
Có sức khỏe tốt.
Có lý lịch rõ ràng, trung thực (ưu tiên có nhà ổn định tại Hà Nội).
Có tinh thần trách nghiệm và tính kỷ luật cao.
Chăm chỉ, năng động và kiên trì thực hiện mục tiêu được giao.
Tư duy tốt và cẩn trọng trong xử lý công việc.
Quyền lợi được hưởng
Lương thỏa thuận theo năng lực và có thưởng hiệu quả công việc.
Làm việc từ thứ 2 – thứ 6 và theo yêu cầu của công việc.
Được tham gia đầy đủ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN ngay sau khi được tuyển dụng chính thức
Được hưởng đầy đủ các chính sách theo Luật lao động Việt Nam
Được hưởng chế độ lương và thưởng cho tất cả các ngày lễ Tết trong năm.
Được tặng quà sinh nhật, chế độ nghỉ mát và các chính sách phúc lợi khác của Công ty.
Được làm việc trong môi trường làm việc thân thiện, năng động, chuyên nghiệp và nhiều cơ hội phát triển, thăng tiến.
Được trang bị các vật dụng cần thiết theo yêu cầu để thực hiện công việc.
Hồ sơ ứng tuyển bao gồm:
Đơn ứng tuyển
CV theo mẫu của Công ty gửi vào mail: minhducdht1971@gmail.com hoặc nộp hồ sơ giấy tại Phòng TCHC – Số 10A Quang Trung, Hà Đông, Hà Nội. Liên hệ Mr Đức – TP. TCHC: 0433 824 489

title:
Platform Campaign Livestream associate (Vietnam, E-Commerce)
- job post
description:
Responsibilities
TikTok is the leading destination for short-form mobile video. Our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. TikTok has global offices including Los Angeles, New York, London, Paris, Berlin, Dubai, Singapore, Jakarta, Seoul and Tokyo.

Why Join Us

Creation is the core of TikTok's purpose. Our platform is built to help imaginations thrive. This is doubly true of the teams that make TikTok possible.

Together, we inspire creativity and bring joy - a mission we all believe in and aim towards achieving every day.
To us, every challenge, no matter how difficult, is an opportunity; to learn, to innovate, and to grow as one team. Status quo? Never. Courage? Always.

At TikTok, we create together and grow together. That's how we drive impact - for ourselves, our company, and the communities we serve.

Join us.

The e-commerce industry has seen tremendous growth in recent years and has become a hotly contested space amongst leading Internet companies, and its future growth cannot be underestimated.

With millions of loyal users globally, we believe TikTok is an ideal platform to deliver a brand new and better e-commerce experience to our users. We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our Integrated Marketing Team, together we can build an e-commerce ecosystem that is innovative, secure and intuitive for our users.

We are looking for passionate and talented people to join our E-Commerce Integrated Marketing team. In this role, you are responsible to develop the campaign program for livestream sales on TikTok Shop to identify and incentivize top livestreamers. This role also includes expertise in performance marketing, and KOL/KOC marketing.

Responsibilities:
Develop the program to recruit top live rooms from top sellers and creators, including but not limited to: scheduling, budgeting, target setting of GMV and ads revenue, rewards and penalty, etc.
Implement the program on a bi-monthly basis and other adhoc occasions. Coordinate as the key contact point with cross-functional POCs from seller management, creator management, and campaign management teams.
Stay tuned for platform governance and collaborate with operational teams (eg: Legal, PR, GNE, Risk Control...) to ensure smooth and error-free operations for the high-performing live rooms
Utilize analytics tools to monitor program performance and provide insights for optimization
Conduct performance reports in a diligent and timely manner
Qualifications
Minimum 3 years experience in E-commerce, digital marketing, performance marketing, or similar positions at top digital companies. Experience in influencer marketing and livestream production is a plus.
Outstanding project management skills, especially problem-solving, stakeholder management, communication, and progress management
Strong proficiency using computer-based applications (Excel, PowerPoint, Word)
Flexibility to adapt to evolving trends and priorities
Eagerness to learn and contribute to a fast-paced environment
TikTok is committed to creating an inclusive space where employees are valued for their skills, experiences, and unique perspectives. Our platform connects people from across the globe and so does our workplace. At TikTok, our mission is to inspire creativity and bring joy. To achieve that goal, we are committed to celebrating our diverse voices and to creating an environment that reflects the many communities we reach. We are passionate about this and hope you are too.

title:

- job post

· Thành thạo tin học văn phòng./Proficient in Microsoft Office
