Quỹ Đầu Tư Bb Capital là công ty Cổ phần đang hoạt động lĩnh vực Marketing tại Hà Nội. Hiện tại chúng tôi đang cần tuyển vị trị trí "Marketing Facebook Ads Thị Trường Đông Nam Á" với các kỹ năng như Facebook Ads, Marketing. Bạn sẽ được hưởng các chế độ phúc lợi như Chế độ bảo hiểm khi làm việc tại Quỹ Đầu Tư Bb Capital.

1. Nội dung công việc:
Chịu trách nhiệm xây dựng và triển khai, báo cáo đánh giá các chiến dịch quảng cáo trên nền tảng Facebook
Quản lý chi phí, kiểm soát và tối ưu chi phí trên cơ hội bán hàng, chi phí trên đơn hàng
Quản lý ngân sách của chiến dịch quảng cáo theo KPI mà công ty yêu cầu
Đề xuất phát triển và trực tiếp triển khai các kênh
Lên kế hoạch triển khai đánh giá được tất cả các định dạng quảng cáo trên nền tảng Facebook
Chủ động phát triển các nội dung phục vụ cho các chiến dịch quảng cáo
Tham gia xây dựng các chương trình marketing tổng thể và các chiến dịch hàng tháng của Công ty.
Thực hiện các công việc khác được Ban lãnh đạo giao.
2. Quyền lợi được hưởng
Lương cứng 7.000.000 - 10.000.000đ + % doanh thu + thưởng nóng
Hỗ trợ vé gửi xe hàng tháng.
Xét tăng lương 6 tháng/lần theo kết quả công việc
Lương tháng 13, đóng bảo hiểm đầy đủ, thưởng cuối năm theo kết quả kinh doanh chung của Công ty.
Thưởng Tết, thưởng tháng 13, thưởng sinh nhật, hiếu, hỷ, du lịch và các hoạt động phong trào do Công ty tổ chức: Sinh nhật Công ty, 20/10, 8/3, Men#39;s Day, Gala cuối năm,… tối thiểu 1 lần/năm, team building hàng tháng,…
Ngày phép: 12 ngày/năm (Ngoài các ngày nghỉ lễ theo lịch nhà nước)
Được công ty đầu tư tham gia các khóa đào tạo nâng cao trình độ chuyên môn nghiệp vụ
Thời gian: Từ thứ 2 - thứ 7 (Sáng: 9h -12h, Chiều: 13h30 - 17h30), Nghỉ Chủ nhật và 2 ngày thứ 7 trong tháng.
3. Yêu cầu công việc
Biết chạy QC chuyển đổi, có kinh nghiệm chạy FB ads tối thiểu 6 tháng
Biết chỉnh sửa ảnh, cắt ghép video đơn giản
Biết đo lường hiệu quả và bám sát KPI
Ham học hỏi, chăm chỉ, cầu tiến
Có trách nhiệm, quyết liệt với công việc
Địa điểm làm việc: Hà Nội
Lương: 10000K - 30000K VND một tháng
Loại hình công việc: Thỏa thuận thời gian
Yêu cầu: Chứng Minh Nhân Dân (CMND), Cover Letter
Quyền lợi: Chế độ bảo hiểm
Hạn nộp: 2023-11-29
Kinh nghiệm: 1 - 2 năm
Bằng cấp: Không yêu cầu
Lĩnh vực: Bán hàng, Kinh Doanh -Marketing
Số lượng cần tuyển: 4
Giới tính: Không yêu cầu

title:
MARKETING EXECUTIVE - YAKUZEN RESTAURANT (ROHTO-MENTHOLATUM VN)
- job post
description:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC:
Mục tiêu/Objective:
Chuyên viên Marketing phụ trách xây dựng và triển khai các phương án trong việc quảng bá thương hiệu nhà hàng hiệu quả nhằm thúc đẩy doanh thu, mang lại lợi nhuận cho công ty/ A restaurant marketer who is responsible for effectively promoting her eatery in order to generate sales.
Nhiệm Vụ/ Tasks
Hiểu và truyền đạt các chiến lược và mục tiêu marketing với Giám đốc điều hành, quản lý nhà hàng và nhân viên/ Understand and communicate marketing strategy and objectives to the CEO, restaurant management and staff
Phối hợp với Quản Lý Nhà Hàng và các bộ phận liên quan triển khai các chiến lược marketing, chiến lược PR, phương án quảng bá thương hiệu cho công ty/ Coordinate with Restaurant Manager and related departments to implement marketing strategies, PR strategies, brand promotion plans for the restaurant
Hiểu biết và triển khai các nội dung truyền thông trên website, fanpage, mạng xã hội, email…/ Deploy web, social media, email, collateral, merchandise, and other communications effectively with corporate support team
Lập kế hoạch và thực hiện các dự án truyền thông, chương trình khuyến mãi, quà tặng ... của nhà hàng với mục tiêu thúc đẩy kinh doanh/ Plan and execute marketing events in coordination with restaurant
Thu thập và xử lý dữ liệu khách hàng cũng như nghiên cứu các sản phẩm và dịch vụ của đối thủ cạnh tranh và phân tích xu hướng thị trường F&B để đưa ra các ý tưởng mới nhằm thu hút sự chú ý của khách hàng và cải thiện chương trình truyền thông/Collect and analyze data to improve marketing programs
Luôn cập nhật các công nghệ và xu hướng hiện tại trên mạng xã hội, các công cụ thiết kế và ứng dụng. / update current technologies and trends in social media, design tools and apps.
Thực hiện các công việc khác theo yêu cầu của cấp trên/ Other tasks by Line Manager
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC:
Thành thạo tiếng Anh, biết tiếng Nhật là 1 lợi thế/ Fluent in English, Japanese language equivalent to N3 is preferable
Có kinh nghiệm Marketing, Quan hệ Công chúng, Sales trong lĩnh vực ẩm thực, nhà hàng hoặc kinh doanh bán lẻ/ Emphasis is placed on work experience in the food and beverage industry
Ưu tiên ứng viên đã từng làm ở các nhà hàng ăn nhanh bình dân (fast casual restaurants)/ Industry experience in managing/ marketing fast casual restaurant concepts is a big plus
Có tinh thần kinh doanh và sáng tạo, nắm bắt xu thế và tư duy marketing/ Must possess an entrepreneurial spirit and be creative and innovative with marketing approaches
Khả năng vi tính tốt/ Proficient in Microsoft Office
Biết phân tích và xử lý dữ liệu/Skilled at analyzing data
Am hiểu về các kênh truyền thông trực tuyến như Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Wordpress, đồng thời phải đón đầu và áp dụng các xu hướng mới nổi ,…/ Knowledge of online technology and implementation with particular interest in blogs, social networks, virtual worlds, wiki’s, mobile and other emerging trends- including but not limited to Facebook and Twitter, Instagram, and Wordpress etc.
Có khả năng phát triển cộng đồng trên các trang mạng xã hội, blog, forum,… cho một tổ chức hoặc công ty/ Management of a professional blog for an organization and/or business
Am hiểu về Social Media landscape, networks, toolsets/ Superior knowledge of Social Media landscape, networks, toolsets
THÔNG TIN KHÁC:
PHÚC LỢI:
Thử việc: 2 months of probation with full salary
Thời gian làm việc: 08:00 - 17:00, Monday to Friday
Địa điểm làm việc: 37 Tôn Đức Thắng, Q1, Tp. HCM
Cơ hội huấn luyện:
A2E skill training
Pre-mortems
Prioritization
Problem solving
Owner’s mindset
Idea generation
Coaching
Influencing
Courageous conversations
Effective communication
Presenting with impact
Closed-loop conversations
Creating business value
Effective meetings
Effective emailing
Organizational health
Đồng nghiệp: Friendly & supportive
Ngày nghỉ:
15 working days: from full 1 year to less than 3 years;
16 working days: from full 3 years to less than 7 years;
22 working days: from full 7 years or more to less than 37 years.
Phúc lợi:
Bao Minh Health Insurance 2000 USD for Staffs over 2 years contribution
Company trip, Team building activities
Holiday events
Phụ cấp khác: Parking fee

title:
MX Customer Marketing Offline Senior Executive
- job post
description:
Position Summary
1. Review each sales processes including contract, PO(Purchase Order), supply projection, invoice, inventory, and other sales tasks and provide guidance to relevant sales team to make them comply with these processes.
2. Aggregate monthly performances of each year and month and analyze the gap between the actual and the target to share the results with the sales team and set their new targets.
3. Check the validity of the marketing budget and adjust the budget expenditure of each sales departments.
4. Improve the accuracy of supply projection and optimize the logistics process.
Role and Responsibilities
Be responsible for end-to-end integrated channel marketing communication (IMC) campaigns on Offline Retailer/Partners platforms (Thegioididong, FPT Shop, Viettelstore…), from planning to reporting.
Manage and follow up with Partners and collaboration with Sales Team to ensure execution, performance and timeline of Channel Marketing campaign.
Manage and follow up with relevant marketing agencies to ensure execution, performance and timeline together with Partners
Understand customer behaviour via data analysis to implement appropriate action plans to enhance user experience (UX).
Give recommendations for Sales team based on data-driven insight to accelerate performance of related channels or platforms together with all Marketing activities
Collaborate with platforms & Sales Team/ Partner to improve Operation Excellence in terms of related execution along with liquidation.
Skills and Qualifications
2-5 years of experience of marketing, digital or channel marketing.
Digital knowledge/ understanding is a plus.
Critical thinking and data analytical thinking are highly required.
Good verbal and written communications to efficiently work with various stakeholders.
English is a must.
Bachelor’s degree in marketing or business administration is a plus.
#Li-SAVINA #Li-Midsenio

title:
Phát triển sản phẩm Media
- job post
description:
Phát triển & cải tiến các giải pháp quảng cáo và truyền thông (Adnetwork, Gói giải pháp,...)
Lên plan, tư vấn theo nhu cầu của khách hàng và xu hướng truyền thông quảng cáo của thị trường.
Đóng gói tính toán inventory, giá bán, xây dựng Profile sản phẩm, salekit…
Thực hiện các hoạt động marketing và đẩy bán tới Bộ phận Kinh doanh và Khách hàng của Admicro: Training, Workshop, Product tour…
Hỗ trợ các hợp đồng Marketing cho nội bộ và khách hàng.
Hỗ trợ sale, account tư vấn sản phẩm, lên plan/ proposal chào bán sản phẩm.
Phối hợp với các bộ phận liên quan trong việc triển khai, đánh giá, tối ưu hóa sản phẩm và các hoạt động liên quan.

YÊU CẦU

Tốt nghiệp Đại học chuyên ngành Marketing, báo chí truyền thông,..( Chấp nhận junior)
Thông minh, linh hoạt, máu lửa, cầu tiến, làm việc khoa học, có kế hoạch.
Có khả năng nghiên cứu, tư duy nhạy bén với các thông tin thị trường và nắm bắt nhu cầu của khách hàng, bắt trend thị trường tốt.
Có khả năng research và tư duy chiến lược sản phẩm.
Có tư duy về giải pháp Digital.
Ưu tiên: Hiểu biết cơ bản về SEO, biết làm về media plan, proposal, giải pháp livestream.
Có kinh nghiệm tại các vị trí tương đương; hoặc có góc nhìn tốt về thị trường cũng như lĩnh vực truyền thông quảng cáo nói chung là một lợi thế.

QUYỀN LỢI

1. Lương, thưởng:

Môi trường trẻ trung, năng động, sáng tạo

title:
[COM] Corporate Communication Intern (Events & Media)
- job post
description:
Company Description

The Bosch Group is a leading global supplier of technology and services. It employs roughly 394,500 associates worldwide (as of December 31, 2020). According to preliminary figures, the company generated sales of 71.6 billion euros in 2020. Its operations are divided into four business sectors: Mobility Solutions, Industrial Technology, Consumer Goods, and Energy and Building Technology.
The Bosch Group comprises Robert Bosch GmbH and its roughly 440 subsidiaries and regional companies in some 60 countries. If its sales and service partners are included, then Bosch is represented in roughly 126 locations. This worldwide development, manufacturing, and sales network is the foundation for further growth.
BGSV – Bosch Global Software Technologies Company Limited (Previous name: RBVH - Robert Bosch Engineering and Business Solutions Vietnam Company Limited) is 100% owned subsidiary of Robert Bosch GmbH.

BGSV has started its operations from 19th October, 2010 at E-Town2 in HCMC. This engineering development center will be engaged in developing embedded systems and software, mechanical design and simulation, and will provide IT (SAP Consulting, JAVA Development….) and Business Services (Finance and accounting, Economics, Purchasing, Logistics, Translations Japanese-English-Japanese, Information Security ) solutions to the Bosch group of companies globally.

Job Description

POSTITION SUMMARY:
We are seeking a motivated and dynamic intern to join our Corporation Communication team. The ideal candidate will be responsible for assisting with various communication initiative and projects. This internship offers the opportunity to gain real-world experience in a fast-paced corporate environment and develop essential skills in corporate communication.
Social Media:
Assist in creating engaging & informative content for various communication channels.
Support the creation of multimedia content, including videos and animations for internal & external use.
Social media savvy
Love to be on screen
Internal Communication:
Assist in drafting and editing communication materials such as emailer, presentations, newsletter and more
Assist in designing artwork, infographic, illustrations for communication materials to effectively convey key messages
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to gather content and ensure accurate & timely delivery of internal communication.
Provide administrative support to the Corparate Communication team as needed.
Events Coordination:
Assist in planning and organizing company events, event logistics and onsite event management
Assist in communication around event management including BEOs, timelines, calendars, reports, presentations, diagrams
Capture engaging photos and/or videos to support internal & external events
Support set up broadcasting equipment (sound and lighting)
Support livestream set, keep track of comments and engagements on livestream platform (OBS Studio)

Qualifications
Currently pursuing a degree in graphic design, visual communication, marketing, or a related field.
No previous working experience required, although having experiences in content creation, social media management and/or event coordination is a plus.
Eloquent in English and Vietnamese
Proficient in graphic design software such as Adobe Creative Suite (Photoshop, Illustration) and familiarity with video editing software is a plus
Ability to create visually appealing and impactful designs and illustrations
Proactive in staying updated with design and social media trends and tools
Strong knowledge and understanding of social media platforms and their use in a corporate setting
Familiar with operating digital camera, video equipment and systems
Excellent written and verbal communication skills with a keen eye for details.
Good interpersonal and organization skills
Can-do attitude, urge in learning and development
Ability to work in multicultural teams
Creative, proactive, independent
Understanding of broadcasting and live video delivery systems

Additional Information
Monthly Internship allowance + Meal & Parking allowance
1 day of paid leave per month
Good benefits of Trade Union activities, team building and company trip.
Opportunity to work in global projects of fast developing company and being a part of innovation team contributing initiative ideas to the hi-tech world.
Engage in our diverse training programs which surely help strengthen both your personal and professional skills

title:

- job post
description:
Apply Now
DepartmentOperations
LevelExperienced (Individual Contributor)
LocationVietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
The Operation teams at Shopee covers the operational end-to-end process, from when the buyer searches for a product listed on the Shopee platform, to the moment the buyer receives the products. The team analyses and monitors operational KPIs across the region and conducts root cause analysis when operation performance fluctuates. The Operations team comprises Customer Service, Payment, Listings, Warehouse, Logistics, Seller Operations and Fraud.
Job Description:
Developing business development strategies for Merchants focused on campaign joined rate and financial gain
Oversee, evaluate performance from both gathering of relevant project data and conducting researches to identify Merchant needs, release more growth initiatives (both operational & commercial related)
Managing resource forecast or creating a resource capacity plan towards urging commercial deals performance
Work in the coordination and implementation of marketing strategies, and delegate tasks that achieve deal-hunting/business performance goals
Assist Line Manager in other tasks assigned

Requirements:
Proficiency with data analysis, forecasting and budgeting
Bachelor’s degree in business or management
Successful track record in B2B or B2C sales and negotiation
Working experience with sales techniques
Proven ability to plan and manage resources
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Good interpersonal and multi-tasking skills

title:
Nhân viên tổ chức sự kiện (Event Executive)
- job post
description:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
Làm việc dưới sự giám sát của Account Manager và báo cáo trực tiếp cho Account Manager.
Tiếp xúc trực tiếp với khách hàng để nhận thông tin và trình bày ý tưởng, thuyết phục khách hàng.
Nghiên cứu về khách hàng, sản phẩm/dịch vụ và các mục tiêu marketing
+ Xây dựng, quản lý cơ sở dữ liệu khách hàng
+ Sàng lọc, tiếp cận khách hàng tiềm năng
+ Tiến hành trao đổi, đàm phán và chuyển đổi thành công khách hàng tiềm năng thành khách hàng mua dịch vụ/giải pháp của công ty
Chăm sóc khách hàng:
+ Tìm hiểu, tiếp nhận và hỗ trợ các yêu cầu từ khách hàng liên quan tới dịch vụ/sản phẩm của công ty, đàm phán hợp đồng, phối hợp với bộ phận quản lý dự án xử lý các yêu cầu của khách hàng
Xây dựng ý tưởng, lập kế hoạch và triển khai sự kiện:
Phối hợp với bộ phận nội dung và bộ phận thiết kế
Đề xuất lên cấp quản lý trực tiếp những ý tưởng sự kiện mới.
Theo dõi, đo lường hiệu quả của các dự án truyền thông.
Quản lý KPI, theo sát deadline và yêu cầu của khách hàng, làm báo cáo
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
Nam/nữ từ 22- 35 tuổi
Tốt nghiệp CĐ, ĐH ngành quản trị kinh doanh, kinh tế, đối ngoại, marketing hoặc quan hệ công chúng.
Đọc hiểu và giao tiếp tiếng Anh thành thạo
Sử dụng thành thạo máy vi tính, Internet, Email, MS Office…
Óc thẩm mỹ tốt, tư duy sáng tạo, chủ động trong công việc. Khả năng thuyết phục khách hàng, đàm phán và thương lượng tốt.
Có tối thiếu 01 năm kinh nghiệm (ưu tiên ứng viên có kinh nghiệm trong ngành bảo hiểm nhân thọ, bất động sản, booking báo chí...)
Khả năng phối hợp làm việc nhóm và độc lập.
Chịu được áp lực tốt, tư duy tích cực, cẩn thận, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao.
CHẾ ĐỘ ĐÃI NGỘ
Lương, thưởng thoả thuận theo năng lực làm việc.
Làm việc 8 tiếng (8h30 – 17h30). Từ thứ 2 - thứ 6. Thứ 7 (8h30 – 12h) nghỉ CN.
Làm việc trong môi trường chuyên nghiệp, quốc tế, trẻ trung và năng động. Có cơ hội giao lưu đa văn hóa, học hỏi cọ xát thông qua các chương trình hội chợ, triển lãm, sự kiện trong nước và quốc tế
Được hưởng các chính sách đãi ngộ theo Luật lao động Việt Nam (được tham gia BHXH, BHYT và BHTN) và theo quy định của Công ty.
Cơ hội hưởng các chế độ đãi ngộ hấp dẫn khác: 1 kỳ nghỉ nước ngoài/năm, tham gia các hoạt động teambuilding, được khám sức khỏe định kỳ hàng năm tại các bệnh viện lớn…
Tham gia đầy đủ BHXH, BHYT, BHTN.
Nơi làm việc: Hà Nội
Thời gian bắt đầu làm việc: Ngay sau khi trúng tuyển

HỒ SƠ XIN VIỆC GỒM:
Đơn xin việc viết tay bằng tiếng Việt hoặc tiếng Anh có dán ảnh 4x6
Sơ yếu lý lịch .
CMTND (photo)
Bằng tốt nghiệp
Các văn bằng chứng chỉ liên quan
LIÊN HỆ:
Công ty cổ phần hành lang truyền thông lobby Comm
Địa chỉ: Phòng 2203 - Tháp A tòa nhà Hà Thành Plaza 102 Thái Thịnh. P Trung Liệt Q Đống Đa - Hà Nội.
Gửi CV về địa chỉ trên hoặc qua email: huongntt@lobbycomm.vn
Ms. Hương 0901727890

title:
Nhân viên Trade Marketing
- job post
company: Công ty TNHH Công nghệ Di Động Việt
description:
Thu nhập: Thỏa thuận
Hạn nộp hồ sơ: 31/12/2023
Số lượng: 2
Địa điểm làm việc: 79 Đồng Khởi, Bến Nghé, Quận 1

Yêu cầu
Đã từng tham gia tổ chức các sự kiện, các hội nghị, các hoạt động tại điểm bán.
Sáng tạo, năng động, trẻ, chịu được áp lực công việc cao.
Ưu tiên các bạn có kinh nghiệm về vị trí Trade thuộc hệ thống bán lẻ.
Đam mê kinh doanh, quảng cáo, tiếp thị và bán lẻ.
Cẩn thận, nhanh nhẹn, nhiệt tình, có tinh thần trách nhiệm cao trong công việc.
Ưu tiên có kỹ khả năng sử dụng Photoshop cơ bản.
Quyền lợi
Được làm việc trong môi trường thân thiện, năng động, trẻ trung và chuyên nghiệp, có cơ hội học hỏi, phát triển bản thân.
Được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ chính sách về (BHXH, hiếu, hỉ, phép năm ... ) theo Luật lao động hiện hành.
Được mua các sản phẩm của Công ty với giá ưu đãi.
Thời gian làm việc: 8h30 - 17h30, T2 đến T7, Nghỉ cố định 02 ngày thứ 7 trong tháng và các ngày chủ nhật.
Chi tiết công việc
Quản lý, phân phối các POSM về hệ thống các cửa hàng.
Giám sát, đánh giá hoạt động trưng bày POSM, quảng cáo triển khai đủ và đúng tiến độ đề ra.
Giám sát, đánh giá hoạt động trưng bày hàng hóa, đảm bảo thực hiện đúng quy định, đúng thiết kế của Công ty.
Đề xuất ý tưởng và triển khai tổ chức thực hiện các chương trình, sự kiện trong tháng nhằm thu hút khách hàng và đẩy mạnh doanh thu.
Thực hiện các công việc được giao khác từ cấp trên.

title:
Nhân Viên Sàn Thương Mại Điện Tử Lazada (Vận Hành + Marketing)
- job post
description:
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC
2. Triển khai kế hoạch Marketing Thương Mại Điện Tử (TMĐT)
- Quản lý gian hàng của công ty trên sàn Lazada, xây dựng và thực thi kế hoạch bán hàng, tối ưu các chỉ số bán hàng
- Triển khai và giám sát các campaigns trên các sàn TMĐT, xây dựng các chương trình promotion để thu hút khách hàng, tăng traffic và conversion
- Đề xuất, thực thi chiến lược đa chức năng giúp phát triển, tăng doanh số, leo top trên sàn TMĐT Lazada
- Xây dựng chiến lược đẩy mạnh affiliate, booking KOC/KOL, phối hợp cùng team tổ chức các buổi livestream
- Cập nhật thường xuyên các xu hướng biến đổi mới, các CTKM, đối thủ, từ khóa ngành hàng…
- Phối hợp cùng team để hoàn thành công việc và hướng dẫn nhân sự intern
2. Các hoạt động báo cáo vận hành để liên tục tối ưu kênh
- Theo dõi và điền báo cáo ngày và báo cáo tuần, tháng về doanh thu, số lượng đơn hàng, traffic, tỷ lệ chi phí mkt, các bộ tỷ lệ của từng kênh,... để liên tục tối ưu chi phí và tối đa doanh thu
- Thường xuyên cập nhật các thay đổi liên quan trong quy định, chính sách bán hàng của các sàn.
- Phối hợp với bộ phận Kho vận, Sales để xử lý các vấn đề phát sinh
- Giờ làm việc: 08h30 - 17h30 (Làm từ T2- T7, Nghỉ Chủ Nhật). Mỗi tháng có 2 ngày làm online thứ 7 tính công bình thường
- Địa điểm làm việc: Hoàng Cầu, Đống Đa, Hà Nội
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC
- Nam/ Nữ tuổi 23 - 30. Tốt nghiệp Cao đẳng trở lên
- Tối thiểu 1 năm kinh nghiệm vị trí tương đương trên các kênh thương mại điện tử Lazada (Ưu tiên biết các kênh khác)
- Có khả năng kiểm soát chi phí tốt
- Ưu tiên ứng viên đã từng làm trong các ngành hàng thời trang, mỹ phẩm hoặc bán lẻ, hàng tiêu dùng
- Thành thạo các công cụ phân tích dữ liệu trên các kênh thương mại điện tử.
- Thành thạo tin học văn phòng (word, excel, powerpoint)
- Nhạy cảm với mạng xã hội và các thông tin về xu hướng, thời trang.
- Giao tiếp tốt, Chăm chỉ, thông minh, nhanh nhẹn và cầu tiến.
- Có laptop làm việc
QUYỀN LỢI
● Lương cứng deal: 8.000.000 VND - 11.000.000 VND + %HH.
● Thử việc 1 tháng hưởng 85% lương
● Các cơ chế BHXH theo quy định của nhà nước, doanh nghiệp đóng 100% bảo hiểm cho nhân sự sau 04 tháng gắn bó
● Môi trường làm việc chuyên nghiệp, năng động, thân thiện và cởi mở
● Thưởng lương tháng 13, thưởng các ngày Lễ đặc biệt trong năm bao gồm 30/4, 1/5, 2/9, tết dương lịch, sinh nhật, hiếu hỉ...
● Chế độ nghỉ dưỡng kết hợp team building 2-3 lần/ năm
● Công việc ổn định và lâu dài.
Loại hình công việc: Toàn thời gian
Lương: 10.000.000₫ - 15.000.000₫ một tháng
Trình độ học vấn:
Cao đẳng (Ưu tiên)
Kinh nghiệm làm việc:
vị trí tương đương trên các kênh thương mại điện tử: 1 năm (Ưu tiên)

company: TRUYỀN THÔNG VÀ DỊCH VỤ NEWSTA
description:
Giới thiệu:
Truyền Thông Và Dịch Vụ Newsta là công ty Trách nhiệm hữu hạn đang hoạt động lĩnh vực Marketing tại Hà Nội. Bạn sẽ được hưởng các chế độ phúc lợi như Cơ Hội Phát Triển, Môi Trường Năng động khi làm việc tại Truyền Thông Và Dịch Vụ Newsta.

Theo dõi, phân tích, và đánh giá các chỉ số đo lường hiệu quả của content marketing, và nghiên cứu insight khách hàng để tối ưu hiệu quả.

title:
Customer Strategy & Planning Manager
- job post
description:
Job Descriptions:
Lead the development and implementation of trade category plan for assigned channel:
Develop customer & shopper insights for assigned channel. Translate insights into business building opportunities within specific customers/channels
Build account/channel specific trade plans to align with total trade category plan to deliver category/brand objectives.
Identify trade spend opportunities and allocate funds for each sector while analyzing risks.
Match brand objectives with customer/market needs
Work with field sales team to ensure excellence in in-store activation
Ensure sales team to execute the most efficient JBP and trade spends
Work out monthly rolling forecast for assigned channel:
Prepare promotion sell-out volume with attention to market intelligence information
Prepare input for brand and build incremental sales volume
Co-work with marketing team in launch/ re-launch and consumer promotion activities:
Allocate promotion volume to assigned channel/ customers in charge
Work out the brief for BTL agencies and sales team
In charge of in-store POSM design, briefing POSM/Activation team for production and installation in store
4. Co-work with Shopper Marketing team in developing and executing category/ schematic shopper promotions:
Lead scheme proposal and execution
Lead the communication to internal and external stakeholders on the scheme
Follow up with POSM production gift sourcing and delivery to stores OTIF
Conduct ROI and post-promotion evaluation
Job Requirements:
At least 3 years experiences as managing level
Customer Management experience in focus account crucial.
Strong analytical & data analyst skills
Unilever is an organisation committed to equity, inclusion and diversity to drive our business results and create a better future, every day, for our diverse employees, global consumers, partners, and communities. We believe a diverse workforce allows us to match our growth ambitions and drive inclusion across the business. At Unilever we are interested in every individual bringing their ‘Whole Self’ to work and this includes you! Thus if you require any support or access requirements, we encourage you to advise us at the time of your application so that we can support you through your recruitment journey.

title:
Trưởng Phòng Sản Phẩm Du Lịch -Tourism Product Manager
- job post
description:
Hạn nộp: 31/12/2023 Mức lương: 20 - 30 triệu
Nộp hồ sơ ứng tuyển
THÔNG TIN CƠ BẢN
Số lượng
1
Nơi làm việc
Quận Ba Đình - Hà Nội
Giờ làm việc
Giờ hành chính
Loại hình
Khách sạn/ Khu căn hộ Resort/ Khu Du lịch Công ty Du lịch, lữ hành, phòng vé
Ngành nghề
Lữ hành/ Du lịch
Vị trí
Giám đốc, phó giám đốc Bộ phận/ Trưởng phòng/ Tổ trưởng
Cập nhật
25/11/2023 08:48
MÔ TẢ CÔNG VIỆC

Cải tiến các sản phẩm tour hiện có phù hợp với từng dòng khách.
Khảo sát tìm kiếm sản phẩm tour mới ở các địa phương/vùng sâu vùng xa.
Phối hợp với các bộ phận sale, op để tìm hiểu nhu cầu của khách hàng và xu hướng sản phẩm du lịch.
Giao dịch tìm các nhà cung cấp phù hợp với sản phẩm du lịch tạo ra tại các địa phương
Sàng lọc sản phẩm du lịch của đối thủ cạnh tranh
Kết hợp với Marketing để quảng cáo sản phẩm/hành trình mới.
THỜI GIAN LÀM VIỆC:
Làm việc tại văn phòng Hà Nội - 5 ngày/ tuần và 0.5 ngày online vào thứ 7 (Nếu không có kế hoạch đi thực tế)
Thời gian bắt đầu làm việc: Được lựa chọn từ 08h00- 09h00.
Địa chỉ làm việc: 125 Hồng Hà, Ba đình, Hà nội.
QUYỀN LỢI ĐƯỢC HƯỞNG

Lương cứng lên tới 20 triệu/tháng (Theo khả năng của ứng viên)+Thưởng hàng tháng/kết quả kinh doanh + Thưởng cuối năm.
Bảo hiểm (3 loại).
Du lịch 2 lần mỗi năm (kỳ nghỉ đông và nghỉ mát mùa hè) trong nước và nước ngoài.
Đồng nghiệp trẻ trung, năng động, thân thiện và đầy nhiệt huyết.
Có nhiều cơ hội học tập, phát triển và thăng tiến trong môi trường năng động.
Các quyền lợi khác (Tham gia training nâng cao, đào tạo nhân tài, các phần thưởng khác…)
YÊU CẦU CÔNG VIỆC

Kỹ năng nói và viết tiếng Anh tốt
Có kinh nghiệm du lịch, đã từng làm sản phẩm du lịch/sale/điều hành tour/hướng dẫn viên quốc tế.
Kiến thức tốt về sản phẩm du lịch ở Việt Nam/Đông dương
Có kinh nghiệm làm việc với khách hàng Âu/Mỹ/Á.
Sức khỏe tốt, linh hoạt, sẵn sàng đi công tác thường xuyên (tối đa 15 ngày liên tục, kể cả vùng sâu, vùng xa)
Sáng tạo, ham học hỏi, tự chủ và có ý thức đánh giá sản phẩm tốt
Tính cách dễ chịu, lịch sự, cởi mở, kỹ năng giao tiếp tốt, đam mê
Kỹ năng tổ chức tốt và kiến thức cơ bản về xử lý dữ liệu (PC, Microsoft Software)
YÊU CẦU HỒ SƠ
Các ứng viên quan tâm vui lòng gửi hồ sơ trực tuyến trên Hoteljob.vn

title:
Content Marketing Executive
- job post
company: Công Ty Cổ Phần Việt Nam Tickets
description:
Mô tả công việc
Viết bài PR, SEO, bài post fanpage và kịch bản video phục vụ cho hoạt động Marketing của công ty.
Tạo, chỉnh sửa, xuất bản và chia sẻ nội dung, thiết lập tối ưu hóa để tăng khả năng hiển thị.
Hợp tác với các bộ phận để xây dựng kế hoạch bài viết, biên tập nội dung tiếp thị cho các sản phẩm dịch vụ của công ty.
Xây dựng quản lý nội dung trên Website, Fanpage và các trang mạng xã hội khác của công ty.
Cập nhật, phân tích nhu cầu của khách hàng và đề xuất nội dung mới để phát triển.
Đóng góp ý tưởng, phối hợp với các bộ phận khác để xây dựng content theo chiến dịch marketing.
Yêu cầu ứng viên
Tốt ngiệp các ngành về truyền thông, PR, Marketing là một lợi thế.
Có kinh nghiệm, kiến thức về tiêu chuẩn bài SEO, đăng bài, tối ưu bài website

title:
Marketing & Growth Specialist
- job post
description:
At The Wise Seeker, we are looking for a Marketing & Growth Specialist to work with one of our clients located in Ho Chi Minh: a social platform designed to help you save time and actually meet worthwhile people in person as smoothly as possible, thanks to
a suite of innovations in privacy, reputation scoring, and financial tools.
Location: Ho Chi Minh
Sector: Sales

Tasks
Responsible for user growth of a dating product, including overall planning and strategizing for annual user growth
goals. Break down and establish executable objectives focused on DAU (Daily Active Users).
2. Proficient in the underlying logic and methodologies of user growth. Implement refined user operation strategies,
customize various user incentive programs, ensure the timeliness and effectiveness of operational strategies, and improve
user satisfaction and retention rates.
3. Develop user profiles through user research, industry benchmarking, data analysis, etc. Gain deep insights into user
needs, construct and monitor platform user funnel metrics, analyze user behavior, and understand the driving factors
behind conversions.
4. Drive growth through data analysis, construct an efficient user conversion funnel, and optimize specific nodes in the
funnel to enhance conversion rates.
5. Establish applicable growth models and activity configurations. Take responsibility for activity results and improve the
app's market penetration.
6. Coordinate traffic acquisition and distribution both within and outside the platform. Collaborate across teams, provide
operational strategies, and work towards shared goals.
7. Oversee user growth, establish and cultivate a multinational business team. The first market will be Vietnam, and then
we expand to other Southeast Asian, Eastern European, Latin American markets.

Requirements

1. Heavy user of dating products.
2. Over 3 years of experience in user growth operations for social networks and dating apps in the Internet industry.
Proficient in user growth models with successful practical experience.
3. Sharp user insights, strong data analysis abilities, logical rigor, and skilled at utilizing data analysis to explore business
growth points.
4. Strong abilities in resource integration, crossteam collaboration, project management, and communication.
5. Entrepreneurial mindset, strong sense of goals, selfmotivation, strong execution, and resultsoriented; flexible work
schedule.
6. Relevant experience in Southeast Asian markets.
7. Understanding of blockchain, cryptocurrency, Web3 culture.

Benefits
12 annual leave days
Workfromhome policy (23 days per week)
Performance bonus
Flexible working time

title:
Senior Account Executive
- job post
description:
WHO ARE WE
TotallyAwesome is a Youth-first specialist marketing and media platform focused on connecting brands with youth in a safe, relevant and effective way. We are driven to make a positive impact for our Youth in the digital world. At the heart of everything we do is Youth.

TotallyAwesome offers Youth-first, Youth-safe engagement across thousands of YouTube channels, apps, games and websites. Our extensive research gives us a deep understanding of Gen Z and Gen Alpha, while our ‘zero- data’, contextual intelligence solutions enable safe digital engagement with a Youth audience. Our Youth-first curated and human moderated technology solutions reach more than 500 million active monthly users across Asia Pacific. From content creation to innovative gaming solutions, we bring excitement to the digital world of our Youth.

Our headquarter is in Singapore, with offices in Australia, Indonesia, Japan, Korea, Philippines and Vietnam.

JOB RESPONSIBILITIES
Overview: We are seeking a motivated individual with a sharp eye for attention to detail and ambition for growth within the youths' media space.

The Senior Account Executive works in lockstep with the Sales team and is responsible for campaign delivery, client servicing and project management with the goal of driving client satisfaction and retention.

How will YOU contribute to the Team?
Campaign Management / Client Servicing
Manage campaign execution end-to-end in collaboration with internal teams such as Campaign Operations, Studio and Publisher/Suppy teams.
Ownership of client communications for on all aspects of client-related campaigns, including post-campaign analysis, report and reviews
Address client queries effectively and in a timely manner
Identify campaign learnings and provide actionable insights and recommendations for future campaigns
Work alongside the Sales team to provide solutions to optimise clients’ spend and upsell
Project manage the client portfolio: coordinating with internal departments across our teams in the APAC region

Supporting Tasks
Create market case studies
Support internal process / document updates that feed into clients’ communication materials
Support the launch of new media solutions
DESIRED SKILLS AND EXPERIENCE
Do YOU have what it takes to succeed?
You’re a self-starter, you can clearly demonstrate your ability to get things done without direct supervision and understand what it means to deliver excellence to clients.
You have at least 2 years Advertising/ Marketing/ Media experience in digital media/marketing, with a good understanding of media planning and strategy, and some experience working with creative/production teams.
You have an unstoppable ability to develop and maintain key relationships with clients - they should be your biggest fans!
You’re insanely well-organised with excellent communication and stakeholder management skills and a high level of attention to detail.
You have highly developed project management skills and are able to work on multiple projects/campaigns simultaneously.
You are able to work with different teams across multiple geographic regions and time zones.
You’re extremely driven to learn and succeed in the digital media industry.
You think logically, even under pressure, and come up with innovative solutions to problems.
You’re analytical and have a great head for numbers.
Excellent written and spoken English, and one additional Asian language (preferable, but not required).

OUR ETIQUETTE

At TotallyAwesome, we work together to give everyone the power to share their story, explore what they love, and connect with one another in the process. In our culture, we live by the following values:
Commitment to care
Purposeful curiousity
Play with integrity
Human by design is in our DNA
Empower “Awesome” in everyone

Our people are at the heart of what we do at TotallyAwesome and the driving force behind our growth and success. We value our culture as the lifeblood of our business and work hard every day to maintain this as we continue to grow and scale our team. We believe in offering opportunities to learn and grow every day and we’ve got a strong track record in developing great people.

We are proud to be an equal opportunity workplace. We review job applications without regard to their race, color, religion, gender identity, national origin, citizenship, age, marital status.

Finally, we are a team of passionate experts. We are not just leading in this industry, we are defining it.

PERSONAL ATTRIBUTES
You are a self-starter, independent and problem solver. You consider yourself a high-performance personality
Understand what it means to deliver excellence.
Good sense of humor and ability to stay calm under pressure.
Well-organised with excellent communication and time management skills.

Chịu trách nhiệm quản lý các sản phẩm của danh mục/ brand, đánh giá và phát triển chiến lược tổng thể danh mục/ brand để thúc đẩy doanh số và đạt được các mục tiêu về thị phần, lợi nhuận, vòng quay hàng tồn kho.

Kết nối, làm việc giữa các phòng ban để lên kế hoạch, triển khai các hoạt động phát triển kinh doanh nhãn hàng mình phụ trách
Dẫn dắt lên kế hoạch nhóm phát triển chiến lược bán hàng để quản lý giá bán lẻ, chạy các chiến dịch, chương trình bán hàng & tiếp thị khác và tối ưu hóa đạt được các mục tiêu về thị phần, lợi nhuận, vòng quay hàng tồn kho.
Là mắt xích điều phối, theo dõi tiến độ các bộ phận để theo đúng kế hoạch, timeline đề ra
Tổng hợp thông tin báo cáo của ngành hàng trong việc rà soát hàng hóa , phân tích dữ liệu

title:
2017 - PPR Việt Nam tuyển dụng nhân viên PR Exe...
- job post
company: CÔNG TY CỔ PHẦN PPR VIỆT NAM
description:
PPR TUYỂN DỤNG VỊ TRÍ PR EXECUTIVE
Nếu bạn mong muốn được làm việc trong một môi trường chuyên nghiệp về PR và phát triển thương hiệu, được thoả mãn niềm đam mê thế giới PR và thương hiệu thông qua trải nghiệm với các chiến dịch truyền thông, marketing cho các thương hiệu trên thị trường, được đào tạo và phát triển bền vững về nghề nghiệp, đây sẽ là cơ hội mà bạn không thể bỏ qua. PPR Việt Nam tuyển dụng vị trí PR Excecuive với những yêu cầu như sau:

1- Mô tả công việc
Xây dựng kế hoạch PR và phát triển thương hiệu trong ngắn hạn và dài hạn cho các nhãn hàng, sản phẩm, doanh nghiệp.
Viết bài PR
Trực tiếp triển khai các hoạt động Marketing và PR cho các nhãn hàng, thương hiệu như: Facebook Marketing, Google, bài PR, Event, các chương trình Marketing trực tiếp...
Điều phối tổ chức công việc và giám sát triển khai của các đối tác outsourcing.
Củng cố & phát triển các mối quan hệ của công ty với khách hàng & đối tác.

2- Yêu cầu
Nam/nữ, tốt nghiệp Đại học chính quy, Báo Chí Ngoại thương, KHXH&NV… chuyên ngành Báo Chí, quan hệ công chúng, phát triển thương hiệu, marketing, truyền thông
Có kinh nghiệm tối thiểu 1 năm trong lĩnh vực truyền thông.
Có tư duy sáng tạo, kỹ năng viết tốt.
Có kỹ năng thuyết trình, giao tiếp và thuyết phục tốt.
Biết thiết kế hình ảnh và photoshop
Thành thạo về việc sử dụng và liên kết các mạng xã hội: Facebook, Forum…
Có khả năng phối hợp, làm việc nhóm.



3- Quyền lợi
Môi trường làm việc cởi mở, thân thiện, phát huy tính chủ động của cá nhân.
Được thăng tiến lên những vị trí quản lý trong thời gian ngắn dựa trên kết quả.
Được đào tạo về kỹ năng làm việc và nâng cao chuyên môn, phát triển nghề nghiệp.
Được làm việc với nhiều khách hàng lớn, chuyên nghiệp và được trao quyền quyết định.
Được hưởng đầy đủ các chế độ lao động liên quan.
Thu nhập từ 5 – 11 triệu/tháng tùy theo năng lực. Được thưởng doanh thu theo dự án, được hưởng phụ cấp công việc và tiền nghỉ hè, thưởng tháng lương thứ 13...vv

title:
Performance Marketing Associate
- job post
description:
Italic is creating a world of luxury without labels. We believe that luxury today is exclusionary and all about marketing that hurts its customers and manufacturers. Our mission is to create a new model that enables manufacturers to bypass the legacy luxury supply chain and deliver luxury goods with equivalent or better quality directly to consumers. Our customers come to rely on Italic for our quality, timeless design, and radical value.
We are seeking a talented and experienced Performance Marketing Associate to join our team as a Media Buyer across multiple channels. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in paid search and paid social advertising, with experience managing campaigns across multiple channels, including Meta, Google Ads, Bing Ads, and other advertising platforms. As a Performance Marketing Associate, you will work collaboratively with our marketing team to develop and execute paid media strategies that drive traffic, revenue, and ROI.
Responsibilities:
Media Buying (Paid Social + Search)
Build and manage paid media campaigns across multiple platforms, including Meta, TikTok, Google Ads, Bing Ads, and others.
Conduct keyword research and analysis to identify relevant search terms and optimize campaign performance for paid search.
Develop comprehensive ad briefs outlining campaign objectives, target audience, messaging strategy, and creative requirements for various digital channels.
Monitor budgets, pacing, and performance metrics to ensure campaigns are meeting goals and making data-driven optimizations across multiple channels.
Stay up to date with the latest paid social media trends, technologies, and best practices to drive innovation and performance
Data Analysis and Reporting
Analyze campaign data and metrics to identify trends, opportunities, and areas for optimization.
Develop and present regular reports on campaign performance to the marketing team and senior leadership.
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to ensure effective communication and coordination.
Testing and Experimentation
Develop and execute A/B and multivariate testing strategies to improve campaign performance.
Stay up-to-date with emerging trends and best practices in paid search advertising and apply them to our campaigns.
Requirements:
Soft Skills:
Excellent communication, collaboration, and interpersonal skills.
Strong problem-solving skills and ability to think creatively.
Ability to work independently and manage multiple projects with tight deadlines.
Positive attitude and willingness to learn and adapt to changing priorities.
Technical Skills:
Proficiency in Meta, TikTok, Google Ads, Bing Ads, and others with a deep understanding of campaign setup, optimization, and performance analysis.
Experience with Google Analytics, Google Merchant Center, Shopify, and other performance marketing related platforms.
Familiarity with A/B and multivariate testing methodologies and tools.
Mentality:
Proactive and self-motivated with a willingness to take initiative.
Strong attention to detail and accuracy.
Flexibility to adapt to changing priorities and deadlines.
Passion for performance marketing and eagerness to stay up-to-date with emerging technologies and best practices.
Experience:
Minimum of 3 years of experience in paid media advertising, with a proven track record of driving results for e-commerce or online businesses.
Demonstrated experience in managing campaigns across multiple platforms and channels.
This is a full-time position with a competitive salary and benefits package. If you meet the qualifications and are interested in this opportunity, please submit your resume and cover letter for consideration.
Please let me know if you have any further questions or need any assistance.
Culture
Great Brands Start With Great People
Our culture focuses on performance, integrity, and longevity. We believe that the best brands are not grown through sheer force but rather through deliberate decision-making and persistent effort over a long period of time. We are committed to creating a workplace where talented individuals can thrive in building an enduring, beloved brand that we all take pride in.
Inputs Over Outputs
We value the effort and work that goes into achieving results rather than just the end result. We believe that investing in our people and processes will lead to better outcomes while also creating a more sustainable and enjoyable environment.
Flat Hierarchy
Our company has a flat hierarchy and values the input and ideas of all team members. We believe that everyone has the potential to make a significant contribution to the success of the company.
Small Team, Big Opportunities
As a small team, all employees are expected to take ownership in their work. Some might move faster while others are fine with a slower pace. Those who seek to move faster in their career will be able to do so based solely on merit, contribution, and performance.

title:
Medical Content Specialist
- job post
description:
Site Name: Vietnam - Ho Chi Minh City
Posted Date: Nov 6 2023

Medical Content Specialist will beresponsible for copy approval of LOC generated materials. Global Medical’s vision is to understand the current and future needs of patients, clinicians and healthcare systems to most effectively generate and communicate evidence that informs on the benefits, risks, and overall value of our medicines.
This Medical Content Specialist role will provide the opportunity to lead key activities to progress career. These responsibilities include some of the following:
Copy Approval
Leads and acts as LOC medical signatory related to detailing materials requiring copy approval for pharma and vaccines.
Ability to checks medical science accuracy of materials, medical review and localization (where applicable).
Able to carry out day to day activities effectively without supervision.
Scientific & Product Expertise
Demonstrate knowledge of concepts of scientific and clinical data in one or more therapeutic areas and related GSK products, including the related clinical studies and their desired positioning in the market for such products.
Understands the risk/benefit profiles of GSK medicines and vaccines.
Understands TA/product strategy for key products.
Partner with Content Manager to review global integrated campaigns, identify gaps and coordinate generation of content to address gaps.
Understands the populations and endpoints selected and the claims they (are intended to) support.
Demonstrate strong understanding of the interpretation of clinical studies results.
Medical Governance
Medical review and approval of LOC materials in accordance with GSK policy/standards and local regulations.
Work with Commercial/Medical affairs teams to ensure that materials used in local markets are in line with GSK requirements and to the required standard.
Ensures full compliance with governance principles whilst seeking appropriate business solutions, at LOC level.
Demonstrates a high level of personal accountability and integrity.
Conduct MM (Management monitoring) and CAPA Tracking per LOC plan.
Applies good judgment: seeks solutions that meet business needs whilst remaining compliant with GSK Values and principles.
Operational Excellence
Demonstrates a high level of personal accountability and integrity.
Partner with Commercial/Medical affairs to apply metrics effectively to ensure delivery and to communicate progress to stakeholders.
Able to identify process improvement opportunities to business problems.
Effective communication
Effective interpersonal relationship with stakeholders.
Effective networking and collaboration skills to achieve business results.
Business Skills
Strong business mindset .
Built corporate behavior adding value to the business.
People Management
Train and coach others on copy approval process for one or more therapeutic areas
Why you?
Basic Qualifications:
We are looking for professionals with these required skills to achieve our goals:
University degree, Medical Doctor or Pharmacist degree
Sound medical knowledge of basic sciences, but also disease areas such as infectious disease, respiratory, vaccine preventable illness
At least one -two years of experience in similar role.
Preferred Qualifications:
If you have the following characteristics, it would be a plus:
Fluent in English and Vietnamese
Strong collaboration and communication skills.
Highly resilient with demonstrated learning agility.
Why GSK?
LI-GSK
Why Us?
GSK is a global biopharma company with a special purpose – to unite science, technology and talent to get ahead of disease together – so we can positively impact the health of billions of people and deliver stronger, more sustainable shareholder returns – as an organization where people can thrive. Getting ahead means preventing disease as well as treating it, and we aim to positively impact the health of 2.5 billion people by the end of 2030.

Our success absolutely depends on our people. While getting ahead of disease together is about our ambition for patients and shareholders, it’s also about making GSK a place where people can thrive. We want GSK to be a place where people feel inspired, encouraged and challenged to be the best they can be. A place where they can be themselves – feeling welcome, valued and included. Where they can keep growing and look after their wellbeing. So, if you share our ambition, join us at this exciting moment in our journey to get Ahead Together.
Important notice to Employment businesses/ Agencies
GSK does not accept referrals from employment businesses and/or employment agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site. All employment businesses/agencies are required to contact GSK's commercial and general procurement/human resources department to obtain prior written authorization before referring any candidates to GSK. The obtaining of prior written authorization is a condition precedent to any agreement (verbal or written) between the employment business/ agency and GSK. In the absence of such written authorization being obtained any actions undertaken by the employment business/agency shall be deemed to have been performed without the consent or contractual agreement of GSK. GSK shall therefore not be liable for any fees arising from such actions or any fees arising from any referrals by employment businesses/agencies in respect of the vacancies posted on this site.

title:
Business Development Manager
- job post
description:
Business Development Manager

Date: 17 Nov 2023
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, East Asia, VN
Company: British Council
We support peace and prosperity by building connections, understanding and trust between people in the UK and countries worldwide.

We work directly with individuals to help them gain the skills, confidence and connections to transform their lives and shape a better world in partnership with the UK. We support them to build networks and explore creative ideas, to learn English, to get a high-quality education and to gain internationally recognised qualifications.

Working with people in over 200 countries and territories, we are on the ground in more than 100 countries. In 2021–22 we reached 650 million people.

Pay Band – 6
Contract Type – Indefinite
Location - Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
Locally Recruited: Applications are welcomed from candidates with a right to work in Vietnam for an employment purpose.

Role Purpose
The purpose of this role to actively pursue Examinations Business in the country, converting opportunities into business. This includes all aspects of examinations, but with a strong focus on business development across various products and services.

Main opportunities/challenges for this role:
Understanding and foreseeing country conditions to spot and act on opportunities.
Providing timely feedback on commercial planning scenario's that have changed.
Achieving sales/ account targets and ensuring customer satisfaction.

Main accountabilities:
Commercial pl anning
Carries out routine monitoring and standard reporting on commercial data involving sales, profitability and/or co-funding and sponsorship opportunities using an agreed set of corporate processes, techniques and report templates.
Market and customer intelligence
Collects, reports and uses Customer/ Market Intelligence from what is seen/heard on the ground and link to Marketing on Insights.
Inputs into innovation and business development plan/targets.
Winning business
Identifies Opportunities
Converts short-list opportunities.
Generates new leads through networking/relationship development.
Analyses customer needs and ensure customer is kept informed throughout process.
Develops value propositions with support from Head of Business Development, Marketing Manager and Account Manager.
Manages tender submissions.
Analysis and Reporting
Uses standard procedures and templates, regularly records, analyses and reports on operational activity levels and performance data, to support senior managers in making timely and effective business decisions that respond to operational needs.
Conducts research, using a range of information channels, into business activities, challenges and key personnel in target customer, partner or sponsor organisations to support developing new business and cultural relations opportunities.
Coordinates and organises contact with stakeholders in key client/partner/sponsor organisations – e.g. meetings, conference slots, sending targeted marketing or thought leadership materials etc.
Brand/product knowledge and promotion
Maintains an up-to-date and sound overview of the suite of British Council products, programmes and services to enable the provision of informed business development support to internal colleagues and ensure the British Council brand is promoted accurately and professionally in any communications with actual/prospective customers and partners.
Within agreed corporate processes, contributes data and/or administrative support, as required, to enable the development and distribution of high quality, customer and market-focused marketing collateral (via a range of channels) to promote the British Council’s offer externally.
Leadership and management
Prioritises own work activities, from long terms plans into day to day activities.
Builds relationships and uses influence to work with others internally to grow the business.

Role specific knowledge and experience:
Proven experience working in a compliant and regulated environment
Business Development
Contract management
Market research and horizon scanning of sector
Monitor Ministry changes which will impact on business
Experience of working with regulatory bodies
Building and maintaining stakeholder relationships

Role Specific Skills and Qualifications:

University degree in Business or Marketing (Professional qualification in Marketing is desirable).
Proven work experience in a Managerial role.
Good written and verbal communication skills in English (IELTS 6.5 or above is desirable)
Good written and verbal communication skills in Vietnamese
Competent IT skills
Excellent communication and customer relation skills
Very good problem solving skills

Closing Date for Application: 01st December 2023, 23:59 Vietnam Time (GMT+08)

A connected and trusted UK in a more connected and trusted world.

Equality , Diversity, and Inclusion (EDI) Statement

The British Council is committed to policies and practices of equality, diversity and inclusion across everything we do. We support all staff to make sure their behaviour is consistent with this commitment. We want to address under representation and encourage applicants from under-represented groups, in particular, but not exclusively, on grounds of ethnicity and disability. All disabled applicants who meet the essential criteria are guaranteed an interview and we have Disability Confident Employer Status. We welcome discussions about specific requirements or adjustments to enable participation and engagement in our work and activities.

The British Council is committed to safeguarding children, young people and adults who we work with.

We believe that all children and adults everywhere in the world deserve to live in safe environments and have the right to be protected from all forms of abuse, maltreatment and exploitation as set out in article 19, UNCRC (United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child) 1989.

Appointment to positions where there is direct involvement with vulnerable groups will be dependent on thorough checks being completed; these will include qualification checks, reference checks, identity & criminal record checks in line with legal requirements and with the British Council’s Safeguarding policies for Adults and Children.

If you have any problems with your application please email askhr@britishcouncil.org

Please note: Applications to this role can only be considered when made through the Apply section of our careers website. Our ‘ASK HR’ email is only to be used in case of a technical issue encountered when applying through the careers website. Emails with supporting statements and CV/Resumes sent to this email address will not be reviewed and will be deleted.

title:
Part-time Teacher of English
- job post
description:
Part-time Teacher of English

Date: 21 Nov 2023
Location: Ho Chi Minh City, East Asia, VN
Company: British Council
We support peace and prosperity by building connections, understanding and trust between people in the UK and countries worldwide.

We work directly with individuals to help them gain the skills, confidence and connections to transform their lives and shape a better world in partnership with the UK. We support them to build networks and explore creative ideas, to learn English, to get a high-quality education and to gain internationally recognised qualifications.

Working with people in over 200 countries and territories, we are on the ground in more than 100 countries. In 2021–22 we reached 650 million people.
Role Purpose
To maintain and enhance professional development and academic quality in the teaching centre, through the management of in-house teacher development programme and support
To promote and ensure quality teaching and effective learning of English
To provide learners with a rewarding and stimulating English language learning experience
To support the wider aims of British Council and its cultural relations mission

Job Overview
There is strong demand for English language learning in Vietnam, being driven by the country’s economic growth, increasing internationalisation and a government vision for the future which is predicated on significantly improving levels of English language proficiency.


As standards evolve, certifications like IELTS are also becoming essential for access to national and international study opportunities and qualifications and the wider employment market.


The British Council’s teaching presence currently counts three locations in Ho Chi Minh City and four in Hanoi, but four new centres are slated for opening in 2023 as part of an ambitious project to very significantly expand our presence over the coming years to respond to market demand and opportunity.


This is creating opportunities for employment in ELT in a country which is a dynamic, diverse and exciting place to live and work.


You will join in December 2023 or March 2024 or May 2024 and receive induction and orientation before being assigned a teaching schedule in one of our branches.


The teaching activity has a national management structure, with a Cluster Lead English supported by Two Cluster Academic Managers, Operations and other Business Support teams, 10 Senior Teachers and a similar number of Coordinators.


Teachers are usually assigned to work in one teaching location, although sometimes work in more than one location is required.


Teaching young learners (aged 5 to 17) represents over 70% of the activity nationally. The British Council currently delivers courses to around 4,500 young learners and 1,700 adults at any one time.

This is expected to grow substantially in the coming months and years, and the new centres will be dedicated mainly to young learner teaching.


New recruits will be joining a diverse international team of over 147 English teaching professionals supported by an extensive academic management team. The focus on professional development and effective teaching is strong, with a well-developed Continuing Professional Development (CPD) programme, involving both in-service training and support to pursue externally delivered qualification courses.


The opportunity to develop professionally within a supportive, experienced and diverse team is one of the strongest attractions for teachers, combined with the opportunity to experience life and work in a fast-developing country with a rich cultural heritage and international ambitions.

Accountabilities
Teaching classes according to agreed schedules and standards
Ensuring an effective learning experience
Ensuring teaching meets Teaching Quality standards and organisational expectations
Maintaining good relationships with customers and colleagues
Representing the British Council’s values and supporting its plans in Vietnam
Enhancing the reputation of UK English teaching

Responsibilities & Main Duties
To plan, prepare and deliver effective English language teaching that meets the needs of different learner groups
To monitor progress and provide regular feedback to help manage learners’ performance throughout the course, and to actively promote learner autonomy
To contribute to the development, evaluation, and improvement of English language courses, materials and related services, in order to best meet learners’ needs
To complete teaching-related administrative tasks to specified standards
To actively engage in professional development and performance management systems and procedures to assure high standards in teaching and learning
To contribute positively to the British Council’s reputation and position as a benchmark standard in best practice in the sector
To support marketing and promotional activities and to assist the teaching team in delivering excellent customer service
To ensure safeguarding standards are rigorously applied and upheld in line with applicable policy in the following areas:
Child protection
Equality, Diversity and Inclusion (EDI)
Health and safety
Qualification
Essentials
Undergraduate degree (BA or equivalent / higher)
Cambridge CELTA, Trinity CertTESOL or equivalent recognised entry-level qualification to teach English as a Foreign/Second Language
For Vietnamese nationals only: A BA or equivalent/ higher in ESL
Desirables
PGCE in Primary/Secondary or equivalent
Recognised diploma in EFL i.e. Cambridge DELTA/Trinity DipTESOL
CELT-YL extension/TYLEC

Work Experience
Essential
At least 1-year post-qualification experience (600 hours) covering at least two of the following age-groups
Young learners aged 6 to 10
Young learners aged 11 to 13
Young learners aged 14 to 17
Desirables
Experience of IELTS or Cambridge Exams Preparation
Experience in teaching Adults (500+ hours)
At least 600 hours’ experience in teaching two or more young learners age groups

Language Requirements
Full proficiency in English across all 4 skills, equivalent to CEFR C2 / IELTS Band 8/9 in each of 4 sections of the academic module
IELTS test report is a mandatory requirement except following nationalities: British, American, Irish, Canadian, New Zealander, Australian (plus South African and Filipino if working in Hochiminh)
Salary & Benefits
Salary: VND 34,922,500 to VND 38,357,500 gross per month, on the Part-Time Teacher salary scale. The salary quoted is the minimum base salary for 50 hours of teaching per month. Hours taught above this are paid additionally at the applicable hourly rate.
Location: Hanoi or Ho Chi Minh City. (Please state city preference in your application)
Annual Leave: 12 working days per annum plus Vietnamese public holidays (currently 11 days per year).
Reimbursable travel expenses if you are recruited from outside Vietnam: For employees taking up a part-time teaching role joining from outside Vietnam, any expenses incurred relating to travel to Vietnam, including airfare, baggage or temporary accommodation on arrival will be reimbursed against receipts up to a permissible allowance limit of USD1,500.
Employee Assistance Programme (EAP): offers practical information and emotional support for work and personal issues impacting any aspect of your life. This is a confidential and free of charge counselling and support service available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week.

Additional Information
Contract Duration: 24 Months
Contract Type – Fixed term
Renewable Period - Renewable
Contact Teaching Hours – 50 or more per month
Passport requirements/ Right to work in country: Applicants must be potentially eligible to work in Vietnam and must hold a passport which has at least two blank pages and at least 6 months’ remaining validity.
Vaccination Status - Need proof of double-vaccination to be eligible for Vietnamese work permit
Work schedule (as per operational needs): Teaching schedules typically involve both evening work and working on Saturdays and Sundays – the times at which most teaching activity takes place. Teachers may be required to work in one or more centres in the city they are based in, but scheduling policy is to restrict teaching to one location only on any given day. Schedules are subject to change periodically, but advance notice is given.
Part-time teachers are required to make themselves available to teach at least the monthly number of hours specified in their contract according to the schedule given. Should operational needs require, teacher may be asked to carry out teaching-related non-teaching tasks in lieu of teaching (e.g. developing teaching materials, administrative tasks etc.) as part of their scheduled hours. Part-time teachers may be offered more hours of teaching than in their core contract. If they accept, they will be paid additionally for these hours.
Closing Date – 28th November 2023, 23.59 (India Standard Time)


A connected and trusted UK in a more connected and trusted world.

Equality , Diversity, and Inclusion (EDI) Statement

The British Council is committed to policies and practices of equality, diversity and inclusion across everything we do. We support all staff to make sure their behaviour is consistent with this commitment. We want to address under representation and encourage applicants from under-represented groups, in particular, but not exclusively, on grounds of ethnicity and disability. All disabled applicants who meet the essential criteria are guaranteed an interview and we have Disability Confident Employer Status. We welcome discussions about specific requirements or adjustments to enable participation and engagement in our work and activities.

The British Council is committed to safeguarding children, young people and adults who we work with.

We believe that all children and adults everywhere in the world deserve to live in safe environments and have the right to be protected from all forms of abuse, maltreatment and exploitation as set out in article 19, UNCRC (United Nations Convention on the Rights of the Child) 1989.

Appointment to positions where there is direct involvement with vulnerable groups will be dependent on thorough checks being completed; these will include qualification checks, reference checks, identity & criminal record checks in line with legal requirements and with the British Council’s Safeguarding policies for Adults and Children.

If you have any problems with your application please email askhr@britishcouncil.org

Please note: Applications to this role can only be considered when made through the Apply section of our careers website. Our ‘ASK HR’ email is only to be used in case of a technical issue encountered when applying through the careers website. Emails with supporting statements and CV/Resumes sent to this email address will not be reviewed and will be deleted.

title:
Senior Director, Country Sales Business Planning & Operations
- job post
description:
Company Description

Visa is a world leader in digital payments, facilitating more than 215 billion payments transactions between consumers, merchants, financial institutions and government entities across more than 200 countries and territories each year. Our mission is to connect the world through the most innovative, convenient, reliable and secure payments network, enabling individuals, businesses and economies to thrive.
When you join Visa, you join a culture of purpose and belonging – where your growth is priority, your identity is embraced, and the work you do matters. We believe that economies that include everyone everywhere, uplift everyone everywhere. Your work will have a direct impact on billions of people around the world – helping unlock financial access to enable the future of money movement.
Join Visa: A Network Working for Everyone.

Job Description

The Business Planning and Operations (BPO) function oversees medium to long term strategy development, supports cross-functional teams in executing that strategy, drives thought leadership and ensures successful ongoing business operations. The function also partners with corporate functions within Visa to develop and enhance best practices leveraging the full suite of expertise that the business requires, such as Marketing, Legal, Finance, Technology, Risk, People, Client Services and Communications to support the market growth vision and objectives.
The Senior Director, BPO for Vietnam will be entrusted with a broad portfolio of responsibilities to accelerate growth, drive and mitigate both short and long-term opportunities and challenges to ensure the market business performance is optimized.
The successful candidate will also work in close collaboration with the corporate functions, to develop and manage scorecards and targets, performance management measures and metrics, as well as draft reporting and executive communication formats and cadences. This position reports to the Country Manager of Vietnam & Laos.
Key Responsibilities
Strategic development and refinement: Lead the development and refinement of the market's medium to long term strategy leveraging Visa's IPVMC, Asia Pacific and Global corporate strategy. Tailor the cluster strategy to local market contexts considering factors including but not limited to regulatory context, digital ecosystem evolution, client and stakeholder needs.
Strategic project execution: Support the execution of key strategic initiatives and support cross functional coordination required to successfully deliver complex projects, support Visa revenue growth targets and strategic objectives, develop an effective tracking mechanism that monitors progress towards these targets and objectives.
Business Performance Management: Lead the business performance management process, strategy development & preparation for the Quarterly Business Reviews and Management Business Reviews with Visa's executive management, regular performance reporting/dashboard for the country management view and across key strategic initiatives monitoring, drive disciplined tracking and curating agenda and material for leadership cascades.
Support Head of Sales in management of account portfolio via developing / monitoring Sales scorecard, AANR dashboard, Call report etc. as well as coordinating with IPVMC and AP region Sales support team for efficient sales management tools and best practices sharing to the market to assist sales team in achieving financial targets and succeeding team objectives.
Driving effective leadership and operations through management of key business processes, including coordination of financial forecasting review of proposed changes to Visa programs, rules or economics, and weekly reporting.
Enhancing the effectiveness of the country team by pursuing initiatives and process enhancements identified in annual planning sessions, performance audits, quarterly and monthly business reviews and issue-drive roadmaps.
Research, develop and implement research and communications tools to enhance Visa's business intelligence, Analyse business opportunities and emerging customer needs to identify issues, trends and growth opportunities for Vietnam.
Improve effectiveness of operational management of the country team through building strong and collaborative partnerships

Why this is important to Visa
The successful candidate will be a key member of the Vietnam leadership team, working closely with the Country manager and Functional leadership teams in the market, as well as key function leads at the IPVMC clusters, as well as their broader teams across the region, to communicate and update market landscape, assist with Go-to-Market strategies that can help accelerate growth in Vietnam, and execution of key strategic initiatives, including but not limited to business or market expansion, organizational re-design, multi-year strategic planning, and capability building.

What you will need:
Key Competencies
Ability to influence members of the organization across all levels.
Ability to manage complex strategic, analytical and organizational issues.
Be decisive and lead change, ability to prioritize and drive focus, execution.
Ability to articulate vision and motivate team members to achieve company priorities linked to the vision.
Ability to bridge gaps of knowledge, understanding and cultural backgrounds.
Characteristics
Experience and understanding of global, market practices and management of payments landscape.
Possesses strong financial acumen.
Excellent analytical, presentation and communication skills

Qualifications
At least 13 to 15 years of experience, preferably with payments and digital commerce background, strategic and business planning, project or program management, financial analysis and forecasting, and enterprise risk management, ideally from within a complex management organization or consulting firm
Proven track record of delivering high impact results working on projects in the areas of corporate strategy, growth initiatives and new market, segment, as well s business strategies will be an advantage.
Broad knowledge of payments industry, its products, services and technologies
Strong management skills appropriate to a fast-paced business environment is preferred
Proven ability to build creditability, influence and negotiate at the highest levels within international organizations.
Fluent in English and professional writing skills

Additional Information

Visa is an EEO Employer. Qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, sexual orientation, gender identity, disability or protected veteran status. Visa will also consider for employment qualified applicants with criminal histories in a manner consistent with EEOC guidelines and applicable local law.

title:
Trưởng Nhóm Marketing
- job post
company: Công Ty TNHH Thương Mại Dịch Vụ Xuất Nhập Khẩu Tiến Duyên
description:
Mô tả công việc:
(Mức lương: 15 - 18 triệu VNĐ)
Phân tích nhu cầu thị trường và đối tượng khách hàng, đưa ra các giải pháp marketing phù hợp để tăng doanh số bán hàng.
Xây dựng và triển khai chiến lược marketing, bao gồm việc lên kế hoạch quảng cáo, PR, chương trình khuyến mãi và các hoạt động tiếp thị khác.
Đảm bảo sự phát triển và nâng cao thương hiệu của công ty, giúp khách hàng nhận biết và tìm kiếm sản phẩm của công ty.
Quản lý và phát triển đội ngũ nhân viên marketing, đảm bảo hoạt động của phòng marketing được diễn ra hiệu quả và đạt được kết quả tốt nhất.
Theo dõi và đánh giá các hoạt động marketing, đưa ra các cải tiến và điều chỉnh để tối ưu hóa kết quả kinh doanh.
Tìm kiếm và khai thác các cơ hội mới trên thị trường, giúp mở rộng thị trường và tăng doanh số bán hàng.

title:
Lab Solutions Consultant
- job post
description:
The Position
Essential Duties and Responsibilities:
Lab solutions consulting
Play an expert role on consulting clinical labs by assessing the current state and creating optimized solution proposals, including but not limited to, product portfolios of Roche and beyond; site survey and workflow study for lean lab layout, workload analysis and data simulation in order to meet and exceed customer’s expected KPIs and satisfaction.
Align on final proposal, prepare project implementation plans and present to customer after internal performance evaluation and approval.
Conduct solution optimization through performance monitoring and scenario simulation, support on continuous improvement via periodically insightful report.
Customer engaging and lab quality management improving
Address different levels of complexity supporting the lab’s strategic goals and helping understand the value brought by Roche systems and solutions.
Continuously look for areas of improvement or optimization in terms of lab workflows and processes, giving new perspectives to customers, helping identify and interpret opportunities.
Deliver knowledge of relevant lab quality management and improvement through Lean concept and Six Sigma methodology implementation.
Capture the customer’s vision and desired value to design a holistic solution heading to a long-term partnership.
Interaction & Impact
Collaborate and align with Sales and Marketing to understand customer’s needs thoroughly in the buying cycle.
Support in the communication with the customer and making decisions through data driven analysis.
Support project’s key stakeholders (Sales, Marketing, Project Manager and Professional Service) in project planning and implementing as well as proposal evaluation process and early identification of potential complexity and risks.
Consulting portfolios management & training
Update Roche consulting portfolios’ strategy including add-on products and services to make Roche proposal comprehensive.
Provide internal training on lab workflow & operation to equip field force with relevant lab knowledge for suitable customer experience approach.
Career development for this position:
This position will give you the opportunities to learn the business and the innovative practices of leading MNC with experiences to apply them for business and lab consultancy development.
Roche can provide a wide variety of career development opportunities both domestically and internationally.
Education and Qualification:
Must be required:
Bachelor or Master Degree in Science/Health/Medical Laboratory Technology/Biomedical Engineering disciplines.
At least 2 years of experience in the diagnostics/ healthcare industry.
Nice to have:
Healthcare Lean or Six Sigma certification
Good record in lab project or health care related project
Work in lab workflow, sales, marketing, project management would be a plus
Other skills & abilities
Customer oriented, business acumen
High collaboration and problem solving mindset
Strong technical skill (understand Roche and competitors’ products, solution and lab operation, quality management, etc.)
Methodology and scientific approach
Good listening and persuasive skill
Influencing and negotiation skill
Ability to work under pressure of timing and complexity
Competencies.
Who we are
At Roche, more than 100,000 people across 100 countries are pushing back the frontiers of healthcare. Working together, we’ve become one of the world’s leading research-focused healthcare groups. Our success is built on innovation, curiosity and diversity.
Roche is an Equal Opportunity Employer.
